original: @13b bcom ldan 'das /🔽mtshams med pa lnga bgyis pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong pa rnams dang / 'phags pa spong ba rnams dang / mnar med pa la gzhol pa rnams dang / ma dang pha la snying ring ba rnams dang / tshangs pa 'gums pa rnams dang /
analyzed: @13b bcom ldan 'das / mtshams med pa lnga bgyis pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong pa rnams dang / 'phags pa spong ba rnams dang / mnar med pa la gzhol pa rnams dang / ma dang pha la snying ring ba rnams dang / tshangs pa 'gums pa rnams dang /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: ba lang dang / dgum pa 'gums pa'i sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur /
analyzed: ba lang dang / dgum pa 'gums pa'i sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur /
translated: how can one liberate those who have committed the five acts of immediate retribution, those who have abandoned the sublime Dharma, those who have rejected the noble ones, those who are headed for the Avīci hell, those who are ungrateful to their mothers and fathers, those who have killed brahmins,🔽and those who have killed cows and sheep?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: sems can de dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las ji ltar yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur /
analyzed: sems can de dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las ji ltar yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur /
translated: how can one liberate those beings from the sufferings of saṃsāra?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied:

original: 'jam dpal / sbyin pa gnyis byin pa'i sems can rnams 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / sbyin pa gnyis byin pa'i sems can rnams 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur te /
translated: Mañjuśrī, those beings who have given the two kinds of gifts will be completely liberated from the sufferings of saṃsāra.

original: de 'di ltar chos kyi sbyin pa dang / zang zing gi sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: de 'di ltar chos kyi sbyin pa dang / zang zing gi sbyin pa'o //
translated: They are the gift of Dharma and the gift of material things.

original: chos kyi sbyin pas ni skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos kyi sbyin pas ni skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
translated: Through the gift of Dharma, they will remember their births.

original: zang zing gi sbyin pas ni sems can thams cad la phan btags par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zang zing gi sbyin pas ni sems can thams cad la phan btags par 'gyur ro //
translated: Through the gift of material things, they will benefit all beings.

original: zang zing gi sbyin pas ni bkres pa dang / skom pa'i sdug bsngal yongs su sbyong ngo //
analyzed: zang zing gi sbyin pas ni bkres pa dang / skom pa'i sdug bsngal yongs su sbyong ngo //
translated: Through the gift of material things, they will purify the suffering of hunger and thirst.

original: chos kyi sbyin pas ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su 'grol to //
analyzed: chos kyi sbyin pas ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su 'grol to //
translated: Through the gift of Dharma, they will be completely liberated from the sufferings of saṃsāra in the hells, animal realm, and world of Yama.

original: 'jam dpal / sbyin pa gnyis po 'di byin na sbyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jam dpal / sbyin pa gnyis po 'di byin na sbyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur ro //
translated: Mañjuśrī, if these two gifts are given, all gifts are included.

original: 'jam dpal / gzhan yang sbyin pa lngas sbyin pa @14a *//
analyzed: 'jam dpal / gzhan yang sbyin pa lngas sbyin pa @14a *//
translated: Mañjuśrī, moreover, through five gifts,

original: dang nye ba'i sbyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur te /🔽lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: dang nye ba'i sbyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur te / lnga gang zhe na /
translated: All the gifts of the bodhisattvas are included in these five.🔽What are the five?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are

original: bzhon pa sbyin pa dang / gdugs sbyin pa dang / dar sbyin pa dang / gos sbyin pa dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad sbyin pa rnams kyis sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su sbyangs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bzhon pa sbyin pa dang / gdugs sbyin pa dang / dar sbyin pa dang / gos sbyin pa dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad sbyin pa rnams kyis sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su sbyangs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the gift of vehicles, the gift of parasols, the gift of silk, the gift of clothing, and the gift of Dharma robes, alms-bowls, bedding, seats, and medicines for illness.

original: 'jam dpal / yang sems can la la mtshams med pa lnga dag gam /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / yang sems can la la mtshams med pa lnga dag gam /
translated: Mañjuśrī, there are some beings who have committed the five heinous acts,

original: dam pa'i chos spong ba dag gam /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos spong ba dag gam /
translated: who have abandoned the sublime Dharma,

original: 'phags pa spong ba dag gam /
analyzed: 'phags pa spong ba dag gam /
translated: who have rejected the noble ones,

original: mnar med pa la gzhol ba dag gam /
analyzed: mnar med pa la gzhol ba dag gam /
translated: who are headed for the Avīci hell,

original: bskal bar gnas pa dag gam /
analyzed: bskal bar gnas pa dag gam /
translated: who will remain there for an eon,

original: sems can gang la la dkon mchog gsum la snying ring pa'am /
analyzed: sems can gang la la dkon mchog gsum la snying ring pa'am /
translated: who have no love for the Three Jewels,

original: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la gnod par byed pa'am /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la gnod par byed pa'am /
translated: who harm the Buddha, Dharma, and Saṅgha,

original: tshogs kyi nor la 'phrog pa dag gam /
analyzed: tshogs kyi nor la 'phrog pa dag gam /
translated: who steal the Saṅgha’s property,

original: chung du na lug gsod pa dag kyang rung /🔽phyag dar ba'ang rung /
analyzed: chung du na lug gsod pa dag kyang rung / phyag dar ba'ang rung /
translated: even if they are butchers of sheep,

original: sme sha can yang rung ste /
analyzed: sme sha can yang rung ste /
translated: sweepers, or outcasts,🔽Mañjuśrī,

original: 'jam dpal // sus shin tu rgyas pa chen po rmad du byung ba'i chos stug po'i rgyan rin po che 'di thos pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /
analyzed: 'jam dpal // sus shin tu rgyas pa chen po rmad du byung ba'i chos stug po'i rgyan rin po che 'di thos pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /
translated: those who hear this ornament of the dense thicket of extensive great marvelous Dharma, who write it down, who cause it to be written, who uphold it, who read it, who master it,

original: gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / chung du na yi ge gcig kyang rung ste brjod pa dang / su'ang chos de @14b smra ba la mchod cing rim gro byed pa dang / nang par langs nas ngo phrad par byed cing lta bar sngar smra ba sbyin par byed pa dang /
analyzed: gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / chung du na yi ge gcig kyang rung ste brjod pa dang / su'ang chos de @14b smra ba la mchod cing rim gro byed pa dang / nang par langs nas ngo phrad par byed cing lta bar sngar smra ba sbyin par byed pa dang /
translated: who teach it extensively to others, who even utter a single syllable of it, who make offerings to and serve those who teach the Dharma, who rise up in the morning to meet them and give them the first portion of their food,

original: lag pas reg par byed pa'i sems can de dag thams cad /
analyzed: lag pas reg par byed pa'i sems can de dag thams cad /
translated: and who touch them with their hands—all those beings🔽will attain

original: 'jam dpal / sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jam dpal / sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Mañjuśrī, they will be completely freed from all the sufferings of the hells, the animal realms, and the world of Yama.

original: 'jam dpal / sa'i phyogs gang na chos smra ba 'dug gam /🔽de'i dur ram //
analyzed: 'jam dpal / sa'i phyogs gang na chos smra ba 'dug gam / de'i dur ram //
translated: Mañjuśrī, in whatever place on earth a Dharma teacher resides,🔽whether in a charnel ground,🔽or in a place where there are corpses,

original: ro'am / ro bam pa zhig yod la /
analyzed: ro'am / ro bam pa zhig yod la /
translated: or in a place where there are skeletons,

original: de'i ngo mthong na'ang mtshams med pa'i las lnga rnams byang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i ngo mthong na'ang mtshams med pa'i las lnga rnams byang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: even if one sees his face, the five heinous actions will be purified.

original: 'jam dpal // rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na yi dvags lto dpag tshad brgya stong du mar skyes pa yod de /
analyzed: 'jam dpal // rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na yi dvags lto dpag tshad brgya stong du mar skyes pa yod de /
translated: Mañjuśrī, in the great ocean there are hungry ghosts born with bellies as large as hundreds of thousands of yojanas.

original: yi dvags de bdag gi las kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa'i tshor ba yod do //
analyzed: yi dvags de bdag gi las kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa'i tshor ba yod do //
translated: Those hungry ghosts experience the unbearable suffering of their own karma.

original: 'jam dpal / de bzhin du sems can su mdo sde chen po rin po che 'di spong ba de dag kyang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro; ;'jam dpal /
analyzed: 'jam dpal / de bzhin du sems can su mdo sde chen po rin po che 'di spong ba de dag kyang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro; ;'jam dpal /
translated: Mañjuśrī, likewise, those sentient beings who reject this great precious sūtra will experience suffering.

original: sus mdo sde rin po che 'di rim gror byas te /
analyzed: sus mdo sde rin po che 'di rim gror byas te /
translated: Mañjuśrī, whoever honors this precious sūtra

original: me tog dang / bdug spos dang / mar me dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan gyis mchod pa dang / chos smra ba de'ang mchod par bya ste /
analyzed: me tog dang / bdug spos dang / mar me dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan gyis mchod pa dang / chos smra ba de'ang mchod par bya ste /
translated: He should worship the Dharma teacher with flowers, incense, lamps, perfumes, garlands, ointments, powders, robes, parasols, banners, and divine flags.

original: ci ste chos smra ba de mtshams med pa lnga @15a *//
analyzed: ci ste chos smra ba de mtshams med pa lnga @15a *//
translated: Even if the Dharma teacher has committed the five acts with immediate retribution,

original: byed na'ang 'on kyang de'i sems 'khrugs par mi bya'o //
analyzed: byed na'ang 'on kyang de'i sems 'khrugs par mi bya'o //
translated: he should not be disturbed.

original: chung ngu na byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i ri dvags dang / bya gang la las chos smra ba de shi ba'i ro bam pa dur khrod na 'dug pa'i sha zos kyang de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te /
analyzed: chung ngu na byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i ri dvags dang / bya gang la las chos smra ba de shi ba'i ro bam pa dur khrod na 'dug pa'i sha zos kyang de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te /
translated: Even if animals, such as deer and birds, eat the flesh of the corpse of that Dharma teacher who has died,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will all become irreversible from supreme perfect enlightenment.

original: ri dvags dang bya gzhan po de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'di nyid du 'thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ri dvags dang bya gzhan po de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'di nyid du 'thob par 'gyur te /
translated: All those other animals and birds will attain this buddhafield of the Dense Array.

original: de la nem nur dang / the tshom dang / yid gnyis mi bya'o //
analyzed: de la nem nur dang / the tshom dang / yid gnyis mi bya'o //
translated: Do not doubt, be uncertain, or be of two minds about this.

original: sems can gang la la sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa /
analyzed: sems can gang la la sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa /
translated: Those sentient beings who have previously generated roots of virtue,

original: sngon byang chub sems dpas yongs su bzung ba /
analyzed: sngon byang chub sems dpas yongs su bzung ba /
translated: who have previously been taken hold of by bodhisattvas,

original: sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa bon las yongs su ma nyams pa de dag thams cad phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na mdo sde rin po che 'di thos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa bon las yongs su ma nyams pa de dag thams cad phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na mdo sde rin po che 'di thos par 'gyur ro //
translated: and who have not lost the seed of the bodhisattva from the past—all of them will hear this precious sūtra in a future time, in a future period.

original: thos nas kyang mchod pa chen pos mchod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thos nas kyang mchod pa chen pos mchod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having heard it, they will make offerings with a great offering.

original: mdo sde thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyan stug po rin po che las /
analyzed: mdo sde thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyan stug po rin po che las /
translated: From the Ornament of the Dense Array, the Compendium of All Sūtras,

original: sbyin pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////🔽mtha' yas yul can shin tu phra; ;bsam gtan mkhyen pa skyes bu'i mchog /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o //// mtha' yas yul can shin tu phra; ;bsam gtan mkhyen pa skyes bu'i mchog /
translated: this is the second chapter: the chapter on generosity.🔽With infinite objects, extremely subtle,🔽the knowledge of concentration, the supreme person,

original: dbang po 'das pa mngon sum pa //
analyzed: dbang po 'das pa mngon sum pa //
translated: the one who directly perceives the transcendence of the faculties,

original: chags dang dbang po rnam par spangs //
analyzed: chags dang dbang po rnam par spangs //
translated: Free from attachment and the senses,

original: bsam gtan bsam pa bsam @15b gtan pa'i //
analyzed: bsam gtan bsam pa bsam @15b gtan pa'i //
translated: The concentration of the concentrated,

original: de ni dgos pa'i tshul yin te //
analyzed: de ni dgos pa'i tshul yin te //
translated: This is the way of the necessary.

original: thub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnams //
analyzed: thub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnams //
translated: The sages, the skilled yogis,

original: kun gyi snying la gnas pa yin //
analyzed: kun gyi snying la gnas pa yin //
translated: All abide in the heart.

original: yod dang med kyi phyogs dang bral //
analyzed: yod dang med kyi phyogs dang bral //
translated: Free from the positions of existence and nonexistence,

original: sangs rgyas phyogs ni dri ma med //
analyzed: sangs rgyas phyogs ni dri ma med //
translated: The position of the Buddha is stainless.

original: blo dang shes bya bral ba ste //🔽tshang dang dbang po spangs pa yin //
analyzed: blo dang shes bya bral ba ste // tshang dang dbang po spangs pa yin //
translated: Free from mind and objects of knowledge,🔽Free from the senses and the sense faculties,

original: sems shes rnams kyi yul ma yin //
analyzed: sems shes rnams kyi yul ma yin //
translated: Not an object of the minds and consciousnesses,

original: de ni grol ba rnams kyi yul //
analyzed: de ni grol ba rnams kyi yul //
translated: It is the object of the liberated ones.

original: mtshan rnams kun kyang snang ba ste //
analyzed: mtshan rnams kun kyang snang ba ste //
translated: All the signs appear

original: de bzhin gshegs ni mtshan med pa'ang //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs ni mtshan med pa'ang //
translated: In the signless Tathāgata.

original: dregs can rnams kyi dregs med mdzad //
analyzed: dregs can rnams kyi dregs med mdzad //
translated: He makes the arrogant non-arrogant,

original: mnyam par bzhag cing gos pa med //
analyzed: mnyam par bzhag cing gos pa med //
translated: Meditative equipoise, unattached.

original: g-yo ba ma yin g-yo med min //
analyzed: g-yo ba ma yin g-yo med min //
translated: Not moving, not unmoving,

original: chags med lam la gnas pa ste //
analyzed: chags med lam la gnas pa ste //
translated: Abiding on the path of non-attachment,🔽The gods of the god realms,

original: lha yul byung ba'i lha rnams dang / dri za lha min mi'am ci //
analyzed: lha yul byung ba'i lha rnams dang / dri za lha min mi'am ci //
translated: Gandharvas, asuras, and kinnaras,

original: thub pa rnams dang mur 'dug gis //
analyzed: thub pa rnams dang mur 'dug gis //
translated: The sages, and the mūrtis,

original: bstod kyang rtag tu yong mi g-yo //
analyzed: bstod kyang rtag tu yong mi g-yo //
translated: Even if praised, they never waver.

original: de la ngo mtshar sred pa med //
analyzed: de la ngo mtshar sred pa med //
translated: They have no craving for such wonders.

original: 'gro ba gang na'ang g-yo ba med //
analyzed: 'gro ba gang na'ang g-yo ba med //
translated: They never move from the realm of beings.

original: sngon nas dag pa'i rnal 'byor gyi //
analyzed: sngon nas dag pa'i rnal 'byor gyi //
translated: From the very beginning, they are pure yogis.

original: de ni pha rol yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de ni pha rol yin pa'i phyir //
translated: Because they have gone beyond,

original: sangs rgyas 'phrul pa'i spyod pa yis //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'phrul pa'i spyod pa yis //
translated: they are buddhas.

original: bya ba tsam du lha rnams kyis //
analyzed: bya ba tsam du lha rnams kyis //
translated: The gods see them as merely emanations,

original: mthong yang de dang 'di na med //
analyzed: mthong yang de dang 'di na med //
translated: but they are neither here nor there.

original: ji bzhin nyi zla de dang 'dra //
analyzed: ji bzhin nyi zla de dang 'dra //
translated: They are like the sun and moon.

original: rnal 'byor yul du gnas pa ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor yul du gnas pa ni //
translated: Those who abide in the realm of yoga

original: dregs pa med mdzad 'gro bas mthong //🔽rnam par tha dad mur 'dug rnams //
analyzed: dregs pa med mdzad 'gro bas mthong // rnam par tha dad mur 'dug rnams //
translated: are seen by beings as being without pride.🔽Those who are in different places

original: gang la gang gis dbang gyur pa //
analyzed: gang la gang gis dbang gyur pa //
translated: are under the influence of different things.

original: de la de lta'i chos ston te //
analyzed: de la de lta'i chos ston te //
translated: They are taught the Dharma in accordance with that.

original: rnal 'byor bskyed pa'i 'od zer gyis //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bskyed pa'i 'od zer gyis //
translated: The light rays that arise from yoga

original: @16a *// rnal 'byor chos can rnam phye zhing //
analyzed: @16a *// rnal 'byor chos can rnam phye zhing //
translated: distinguish the dharmin of yoga.

original: rgyal po'i tshul dang gsum po dag /
analyzed: rgyal po'i tshul dang gsum po dag /
translated: The three are the king’s way.

original: rgyal po'am rgyal po'i 'khor rnams dang // rgyal po'i yul gyi bya ba dang // dka' thub tshul dang zhing rnams kyi //
analyzed: rgyal po'am rgyal po'i 'khor rnams dang // rgyal po'i yul gyi bya ba dang // dka' thub tshul dang zhing rnams kyi //
translated: The king, the king’s retinue, the king’s country, the king’s duties,

original: phun sum tshogs pa de las byung //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa de las byung //
translated: and the perfection of the fields arise from that.🔽Divine substances, space, and the pure source of jewels

original: lha rdzas rnams dang nam mkha' dang // rin chen 'byung khungs rnam dag pa //
analyzed: lha rdzas rnams dang nam mkha' dang // rin chen 'byung khungs rnam dag pa //
translated: are🔽blazing in the directions and countries

original: lha yi lha yi mthu yis na //🔽phyogs dang yul na 'bar ba yin //
analyzed: lha yi lha yi mthu yis na // phyogs dang yul na 'bar ba yin //
translated: through the power of the god of gods.

original: 'byung ba gsum gyi thabs rnams gang //
analyzed: 'byung ba gsum gyi thabs rnams gang //
translated: What are the methods of the three elements?

original: rnam pa sna tshogs mkhas rnams kyis //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs mkhas rnams kyis //
translated: The various kinds of skill

original: gang rnams byed gzhug bya ba dag /
analyzed: gang rnams byed gzhug bya ba dag /
translated: that are to be engaged by the wise

original: sangs rgyas lhun gyis grub 'bras bu //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lhun gyis grub 'bras bu //
translated: are the spontaneously accomplished result of the buddhas.

original: de ni mdo 'dzin 'gro ba yi //
analyzed: de ni mdo 'dzin 'gro ba yi //
translated: That is the purpose of the holders of the sūtras,🔽the ascetics, the learned, and the performers of

original: dgos dang dka' thub can rig dang // gad mo rtse ba'i sbyor ba dang // gar mkhan rnams la rtag tu'o //
analyzed: dgos dang dka' thub can rig dang // gad mo rtse ba'i sbyor ba dang // gar mkhan rnams la rtag tu'o //
translated: playful union, and always for the dancers.

original: dga' ldan gnas babs 'jig rten gyis //
analyzed: dga' ldan gnas babs 'jig rten gyis //
translated: The world sees the state of being in Tuṣhita

original: mthong ba bud med 'gro dang bcas //
analyzed: mthong ba bud med 'gro dang bcas //
translated: with the movement of the women.

original: 'phrog cing sbyin dang 'brel ba dang // cod pan can dang lag na gzhur //
analyzed: 'phrog cing sbyin dang 'brel ba dang // cod pan can dang lag na gzhur //
translated: And the one who is connected with giving, the one with the crown, the one with the bow in his hand,

original: dam pa rnams kyis kun tu mthong //
analyzed: dam pa rnams kyis kun tu mthong //
translated: The one who is seen by the good,

original: stug po nas ni de ma bral //
analyzed: stug po nas ni de ma bral //
translated: The one who is not separated from the dense,

original: yul 'di thub pa de yis te //
analyzed: yul 'di thub pa de yis te //
translated: The one who is the sage of this land,

original: thams cad na yang shin tu snang //🔽rab rib can gyi rab rib bzhin //
analyzed: thams cad na yang shin tu snang // rab rib can gyi rab rib bzhin //
translated: The one who is very visible everywhere,🔽Like the cataract of the one with cataracts,

original: ri dvags rnams kyi smig rgyu 'dra //
analyzed: ri dvags rnams kyi smig rgyu 'dra //
translated: Like the mirage of deer,

original: 'jig rten rnams kyis sgyu ma la //
analyzed: 'jig rten rnams kyis sgyu ma la //
translated: In the world, by the magic🔽As it is seen otherwise, and in a dream as another,

original: ji ltar gzhan du mthong ba dang // rmi lam na yang gzhan du ba'i //🔽rmi lam bzhin du @16b bus pas mthong //
analyzed: ji ltar gzhan du mthong ba dang // rmi lam na yang gzhan du ba'i // rmi lam bzhin du @16b bus pas mthong //
translated: The dream is seen by the one who is born.

original: khyad par rab tu mthong ba ni //
analyzed: khyad par rab tu mthong ba ni //
translated: The special one is seen

original: rnal 'byor can rnams log long bzhin //
analyzed: rnal 'byor can rnams log long bzhin //
translated: By the yogis as the one who is blind.

original: lha yi lha yi yul yin te //
analyzed: lha yi lha yi yul yin te //
translated: The land of the god of gods

original: de yi sras kyi dus kun tu //🔽mi sbyin gu lang tshangs pa dang // sa nan ta dang sa nan 'da'//🔽sa nan gzhon nu ser skya dang // ne tsho la sogs rnams bsams kyang //
analyzed: de yi sras kyi dus kun tu // mi sbyin gu lang tshangs pa dang // sa nan ta dang sa nan 'da'// sa nan gzhon nu ser skya dang // ne tsho la sogs rnams bsams kyang //
translated: In all the times of his sons,

original: de yi yul la rnam par bslad //
analyzed: de yi yul la rnam par bslad //

original: de dag rnal 'byor gyis mi mthong //
analyzed: de dag rnal 'byor gyis mi mthong //
translated: Are not seen by the yogi.🔽Those who have come, are coming,

original: thub pa gang dag 'byung ba dang // byung dang da ltar gang 'khod pa //
analyzed: thub pa gang dag 'byung ba dang // byung dang da ltar gang 'khod pa //
translated: And are present

original: de dag yul na gang yang min //
analyzed: de dag yul na gang yang min //
translated: Do not exist in any place.

original: lta ba'i bag chags g-yogs pa'i phyir //🔽sa dang sar ni rnam spyod pa'i //
analyzed: lta ba'i bag chags g-yogs pa'i phyir // sa dang sar ni rnam spyod pa'i //
translated: Because of being covered by the latent tendencies of views,🔽The vajra essence is taught

original: rdo rje'i snying po de la bstan //
analyzed: rdo rje'i snying po de la bstan //
translated: To those who practice on the stages and stages.

original: lha yi lhas ni byas pa yi //
analyzed: lha yi lhas ni byas pa yi //
translated: The one who is the god of gods

original: stug po'i zhing na yod pa yis //
analyzed: stug po'i zhing na yod pa yis //
translated: Exists in the buddhafield of Ghanavyūha.

original: 'di dag rdo rje'i snying po de //
analyzed: 'di dag rdo rje'i snying po de //
translated: This vajra essence

original: mnyam par bzhag la shin tu bstan //🔽rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor yul //
analyzed: mnyam par bzhag la shin tu bstan // rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor yul //
translated: Is well taught to those in equipoise.🔽The object of the yoga of the yogi

original: ji ltar gang gis 'byor pa dag /
analyzed: ji ltar gang gis 'byor pa dag /
translated: Is the yoga of whatever is appropriated.

original: dbyibs dang mdog dang khyad par dag /
analyzed: dbyibs dang mdog dang khyad par dag /
translated: The shape, color, and distinctions

original: bzo bor gyur pas byas pa ni //
analyzed: bzo bor gyur pas byas pa ni //
translated: Are made by the creator.

original: gces dang rdul phran dag gi ste //
analyzed: gces dang rdul phran dag gi ste //
translated: The precious and the particles

original: brtags pa'i dngos po yod pa min //
analyzed: brtags pa'i dngos po yod pa min //
translated: Do not exist as imputed things.

original: skye ba dag ni chos tsam ste //
analyzed: skye ba dag ni chos tsam ste //
translated: Birth is merely a phenomenon;

original: ldog par 'gyur ba'ang chos tsam mo //
analyzed: ldog par 'gyur ba'ang chos tsam mo //
translated: Also, cessation is merely a phenomenon.

original: kun tu phra ba'i bdag nyid kyi //
analyzed: kun tu phra ba'i bdag nyid kyi //
translated: The nature of the most subtle

original: yon tan dag tu dngos yod brtags //
analyzed: yon tan dag tu dngos yod brtags //
translated: And the qualities are imputed to be real.

original: mar me bzhin du gsal byed pa //
analyzed: mar me bzhin du gsal byed pa //
translated: Like a lamp, it illuminates.

original: rgyu rnams dgos pa grub pa dag /
analyzed: rgyu rnams dgos pa grub pa dag /
translated: The causes are established for a purpose.

original: mtshan nyid snga nas mi rnyed de //
analyzed: mtshan nyid snga nas mi rnyed de //
translated: The characteristics are not found before.

original: 'jig dang bral bas mi gnas pa'o //🔽'das pa 'das pa'i dngos @17a *//
analyzed: 'jig dang bral bas mi gnas pa'o // 'das pa 'das pa'i dngos @17a *//
translated: It does not abide due to being free from destruction.🔽The past does not exist as a past entity.

original: por yang // yod pa ma yin 'byung ba med //🔽rkyen du bya rnams med par yang //
analyzed: por yang // yod pa ma yin 'byung ba med // rkyen du bya rnams med par yang //
translated: It does not arise.

original: brtag pa'i dngos po gang yang med //
analyzed: brtag pa'i dngos po gang yang med //
translated: Without the conditions, there are no entities to be examined.

original: rkyen rnams yin te 'dus pa la //
analyzed: rkyen rnams yin te 'dus pa la //
translated: The conditions are not the assemblage.

original: dngos po yod pa ma yin te //
analyzed: dngos po yod pa ma yin te //
translated: The entity does not exist.

original: rkyen rnams gang gi rkyen du 'gyur //
analyzed: rkyen rnams gang gi rkyen du 'gyur //
translated: For what conditions would the conditions be?

original: yod dang med pa'i dngos mi snang //
analyzed: yod dang med pa'i dngos mi snang //
translated: The entity of existence and nonexistence does not appear.

original: med pa'ang snang ba yod ma yin //
analyzed: med pa'ang snang ba yod ma yin //
translated: Nonexistence also does not appear as existence.

original: phra ba'i bdag gis rnam par brtags //🔽phung po rdza ma ras la sogs //
analyzed: phra ba'i bdag gis rnam par brtags // phung po rdza ma ras la sogs //
translated: It is examined by the subtle self.🔽The aggregates are like a pot, cloth, and so on.

original: ri dvags skom gdungs smig rgyu bzhin //
analyzed: ri dvags skom gdungs smig rgyu bzhin //
translated: Like a mirage for a thirsty deer,

original: rmi lam dri za 'dra ba ste //
analyzed: rmi lam dri za 'dra ba ste //
translated: Like a dream, like a gandharva city,

original: gtsug lag nor ba dug dang bcas //
analyzed: gtsug lag nor ba dug dang bcas //
translated: The scriptures are mistaken and poisonous.

original: rab tu smra ba sum brgya yis //
analyzed: rab tu smra ba sum brgya yis //
translated: The three hundred proponents

original: 'jug pa dag dang phyir ldog dang // mya ngan 'da' ba gang yang med //
analyzed: 'jug pa dag dang phyir ldog dang // mya ngan 'da' ba gang yang med //
translated: There is no entering, no turning away, and no nirvana.

original: de nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par bkod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa sa'i dbang po //
analyzed: de nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par bkod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa sa'i dbang po //
translated: Then the earth lord, who teaches the arrangement of all the buddhas’ dharmas just as they are,

original: lag pa'i phreng ba tshad med pa /
analyzed: lag pa'i phreng ba tshad med pa /
translated: had immeasurable armlets,

original: lus dpe med pa /
analyzed: lus dpe med pa /
translated: had an incomparable body,

original: dpung rgyan dang / cod pan dang / gtsug gi nor bu dang / se mo dos shin tu chas pa stan las langs te /
analyzed: dpung rgyan dang / cod pan dang / gtsug gi nor bu dang / se mo dos shin tu chas pa stan las langs te /
translated: and was well adorned with armlets, crowns, head jewels, and necklaces, rose from his seat,

original: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
analyzed: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
translated: put his upper robe over one shoulder, and knelt on his right knee.

original: theg pa gsum dang 'jig rten dang mi 'gal ba //
analyzed: theg pa gsum dang 'jig rten dang mi 'gal ba //
translated: He was not in conflict with the three vehicles or the world,

original: lta ba'i chos la bdag gi so so rang rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rig pa'i spyod yul bde ba la gnas pa rdo rje snying po'i dbang po rnal 'byor chen po'i rnal 'byor can /
analyzed: lta ba'i chos la bdag gi so so rang rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rig pa'i spyod yul bde ba la gnas pa rdo rje snying po'i dbang po rnal 'byor chen po'i rnal 'byor can /
translated: and he was a great yogin who had the domain of knowledge of the individual self-awareness of the view of the dharma, who was abiding in bliss, and who had the vajra essence.

original: rnal 'byor gyi mkhan po sa dang sa'i mtshams thams cad mi 'gal bar @17b ston pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi mkhan po sa dang sa'i mtshams thams cad mi 'gal bar @17b ston pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: The master of yoga, who teaches all the levels and their boundaries without contradiction, said the following:

original: rdo rje'i dbang po khyod skye ba thams cad dang / rgyal po'i 'khor dag tu cod pan dag la chos ston pa yin te /
analyzed: rdo rje'i dbang po khyod skye ba thams cad dang / rgyal po'i 'khor dag tu cod pan dag la chos ston pa yin te /
translated: “O Vajra Lord, you teach the Dharma to all those born in the retinue of the king.

original: de'i phyir rgyal ba'i sras khyod la gsol ba gdab kyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyal ba'i sras khyod la gsol ba gdab kyi /
translated: Therefore, O Victorious Son, I request you:

original: bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rig pa'i spyod yul la bde bar gnas pa'i phyir 'phags pa lta ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par spyod pa'i gnas ston cig /
analyzed: bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rig pa'i spyod yul la bde bar gnas pa'i phyir 'phags pa lta ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par spyod pa'i gnas ston cig /
translated: For the sake of my own noble wisdom, which is the domain of awareness, please teach the noble view, the domain of happiness, which is the domain of practice that does not rely on others.

original: des bdag dang cod pan 'di dag gis bdag mngon sum du gyur pa'i spyod yul sangs rgyas kyi sa'i sgo'i bde ba nan tan gyis rab tu thob ste /
analyzed: des bdag dang cod pan 'di dag gis bdag mngon sum du gyur pa'i spyod yul sangs rgyas kyi sa'i sgo'i bde ba nan tan gyis rab tu thob ste /
translated: Through that, I and this crown will directly attain the happiness of the door to the level of buddhahood, the domain of practice.”

original: yid bzhin gyi lus rnam pa bcu la dbang sgyur zhing stobs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang gi gzhal med khang gi gnas gyur te /
analyzed: yid bzhin gyi lus rnam pa bcu la dbang sgyur zhing stobs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang gi gzhal med khang gi gnas gyur te /
translated: “Having attained mastery over the ten aspects of the wish-fulfilling body, and having attained the power of the bases of supernatural knowledge and the palace of the base of mastery,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas spangs te /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas spangs te /
translated: one abandons abiding in the limit of reality.

original: sna tshogs kyi lus yid bzhin nor bu dang 'dra ba'i rang bzhin du gyur te /
analyzed: sna tshogs kyi lus yid bzhin nor bu dang 'dra ba'i rang bzhin du gyur te /
translated: Having become a body of various forms, like a wish-fulfilling jewel,

original: rgyal po'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad dang stug por stug po na spyod pa rnams la chos sna tshogs ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyal po'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad dang stug por stug po na spyod pa rnams la chos sna tshogs ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: one teaches the various Dharmas to all the retinues of kings and to those who are practicing in the buddhafield of Ghanavyūha.

original: rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
analyzed: rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
translated: Vajragarbha said,

original: rgyal po smros shig /
analyzed: rgyal po smros shig /
translated: “Speak, O King!

original: dge'o dge'o // cod pan can la khyad par du //
analyzed: dge'o dge'o // cod pan can la khyad par du //
translated: Excellent, excellent!🔽The introduction to the Dharma of selflessness

original: chos la 'jug pa bdag med pa; ;stug po'i rgyan ni rab ston pa //
analyzed: chos la 'jug pa bdag med pa; ;stug po'i rgyan ni rab ston pa //
translated: teaches the ornament of Ghanavyūha.

original: sems kyi rang bzhin mtshan nyid dag /
analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin mtshan nyid dag /
translated: The nature and characteristics of the mind

original: rnam rtog spyod yul yin shes na //
analyzed: rnam rtog spyod yul yin shes na //
translated: are known to be the domain of conceptuality.

original: rnam rtog don las phyir ldog pa //
analyzed: rnam rtog don las phyir ldog pa //
translated: Having turned away from the object of conceptuality,

original: 'gro ba rnam rtog mthong nas te //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnam rtog mthong nas te //
translated: one sees the world as conceptuality.

original: @18a *// 'gro ba'i rang bzhin mthong nas kyang //
analyzed: @18a *// 'gro ba'i rang bzhin mthong nas kyang //
translated: And having seen the nature of beings,

original: ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur //🔽chos kyi ngo bo nyid bstan gyi //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur // chos kyi ngo bo nyid bstan gyi //
translated: They will abide in meditative concentration.

original: rgyal po nga la de nyon cig /
analyzed: rgyal po nga la de nyon cig /
translated: “King, listen to me as I teach🔽The essence of phenomena.

original: dpyid kyi smig rgyu ji bzhin pa //
analyzed: dpyid kyi smig rgyu ji bzhin pa //
translated: This world is like a mirage in the spring.

original: de yi rnam pa 'gro ba 'di //
analyzed: de yi rnam pa 'gro ba 'di //
translated: It is a mere appearance.

original: mtshan bzhi mtshan ma rgyu rnams las //
analyzed: mtshan bzhi mtshan ma rgyu rnams las //
translated: “The four characteristics and their causes

original: rnam par rtog pa rnam mi rtog /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa rnam mi rtog /
translated: Are conceptualizations, but they are not conceptualized.

original: blo dang rtogs byas bskyed pas te //
analyzed: blo dang rtogs byas bskyed pas te //
translated: They are produced by the mind and what is to be realized,

original: rtogs bya de yi khyad gyur pa //
analyzed: rtogs bya de yi khyad gyur pa //
translated: And they are different from what is to be realized.

original: gnyen por gyur pa gcig med pa //
analyzed: gnyen por gyur pa gcig med pa //
translated: “There is no single antidote

original: nyi ma dang ni grib ltar gnas //
analyzed: nyi ma dang ni grib ltar gnas //
translated: That remains like the sun and the shade.

original: sems med tsam po'ang yod pa min //
analyzed: sems med tsam po'ang yod pa min //
translated: There is no mere absence of mind,

original: tshad dang gzhal dang gnyis ka med //
analyzed: tshad dang gzhal dang gnyis ka med //
translated: And there is no measure or measurer.

original: rnam par rtog pa sems tsam ste //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa sems tsam ste //
translated: “Conceptualization is mere mind,

original: rnam par rtog pa rnam mi brtag /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa rnam mi brtag /
translated: But conceptualization is not conceptualized.

original: shes dang shes bya rnam rtog pa //
analyzed: shes dang shes bya rnam rtog pa //
translated: The conceptualization of consciousness and objects

original: sems tsam de ltar yin na ste //
analyzed: sems tsam de ltar yin na ste //
translated: Is mere mind in that way.

original: shes bya sems tsam yin pa ste //
analyzed: shes bya sems tsam yin pa ste //
translated: “If objects of knowledge are mere mind,

original: rtag tu tsam la shes yod min //
analyzed: rtag tu tsam la shes yod min //
translated: The mind that knows them is always absent.

original: sems chos kyi ni ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: sems chos kyi ni ngo bo nyid //
translated: The mind is the essence of the Dharma.

original: gang zag dag dang g-yo ba rnams //
analyzed: gang zag dag dang g-yo ba rnams //
translated: The person and the movements🔽Are the essence of the mind.

original: gang tshe sems la rnam brtags na //
analyzed: gang tshe sems la rnam brtags na //
translated: When the mind is examined,

original: rtog dang brtags pas spangs pa yin //
analyzed: rtog dang brtags pas spangs pa yin //
translated: It is abandoned through investigation and analysis.

original: brgyad po rnyed nas dag par 'gyur //
analyzed: brgyad po rnyed nas dag par 'gyur //
translated: Having attained the eight, one becomes pure.

original: dgu la bsam gtan spyod yul te //
analyzed: dgu la bsam gtan spyod yul te //
translated: On the ninth, the sphere of activity is meditative concentration.

original: bcu la sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyis //
analyzed: bcu la sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyis //
translated: On the tenth, the buddhas

original: dbang bskur rgyal bar 'gyur ba yin //🔽rgyal ba'i yul la chos rnams kyang //
analyzed: dbang bskur rgyal bar 'gyur ba yin // rgyal ba'i yul la chos rnams kyang //
translated: Confer empowerment and one becomes a victor.🔽In the domain of the Victor,

original: mi zad chos kyi skur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi zad chos kyi skur 'gyur ro //
translated: The dharmas become the inexhaustible dharmakāya.

original: nam mkha'i zad dang 'dra ba ste //
analyzed: nam mkha'i zad dang 'dra ba ste //
translated: Like the exhaustion of space,

original: sems dang rnam shes de bzhin te //
analyzed: sems dang rnam shes de bzhin te //
translated: The mind and consciousness are the same.

original: mi 'jigs pa yang ma yin zhing //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa yang ma yin zhing //
translated: It is not non-fear,

original: rtag cing @18b zhi ba bde ba brtan //
analyzed: rtag cing @18b zhi ba bde ba brtan //
translated: But permanent, peaceful, blissful, and stable.

original: 'dus ma byas pa'i ye shes ste /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas pa'i ye shes ste /
translated: It is the unconditioned wisdom,

original: stug po'i zhing na rnam par mdzes //
analyzed: stug po'i zhing na rnam par mdzes //
translated: Beautiful in the dense array.

original: rnam shes 'byung gsum 'das pa ste //
analyzed: rnam shes 'byung gsum 'das pa ste //
translated: Beyond the three appearances of consciousness,

original: sna tshogs gzugs kyi rin chen bzhin //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs kyi rin chen bzhin //
translated: Like a precious gem of various forms,

original: de bzhin sangs rgyas sa bsam med //
analyzed: de bzhin sangs rgyas sa bsam med //
translated: Likewise, the inconceivable buddha stage

original: stug bzhin rgyal ba'i gnas gyur pa //
analyzed: stug bzhin rgyal ba'i gnas gyur pa //
translated: Is the transformation of the Victor's abode.

original: ji ltar gyo mo rnams kyi rgyu //
analyzed: ji ltar gyo mo rnams kyi rgyu //
translated: Just as the cause of the potsherds

original: rdza ma chag pas bstan pa bzhin //🔽gyo mo rnams kyang rdul gyi ste //
analyzed: rdza ma chag pas bstan pa bzhin // gyo mo rnams kyang rdul gyi ste //
translated: is taught by the broken pot,🔽so the potsherds are of the dust,

original: rdul yang mchog phra'i de bzhin du //
analyzed: rdul yang mchog phra'i de bzhin du //
translated: and the dust is of the finest particles.

original: dngos po rnams kyi rkyen rnams la //
analyzed: dngos po rnams kyi rkyen rnams la //
translated: The causes of things

original: rgyu rnams ji ltar snang ba bzhin //
analyzed: rgyu rnams ji ltar snang ba bzhin //
translated: appear just like the conditions.

original: zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi //
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi //
translated: The cause of the uncontaminated

original: rgyu ni de bzhin zag bcas pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu ni de bzhin zag bcas pa'o //
translated: is likewise the contaminated.🔽Just as fire arises from wood

original: ji ltar shing las me 'byung ba; ;phyis kyang gzhan du 'bar bar bya //
analyzed: ji ltar shing las me 'byung ba; ;phyis kyang gzhan du 'bar bar bya //
translated: and later burns it,

original: de bzhin ye shes byung ba'i me //
analyzed: de bzhin ye shes byung ba'i me //
translated: so the fire of wisdom that arises

original: phyis kyang gzhan du 'bar bar bya //
analyzed: phyis kyang gzhan du 'bar bar bya //
translated: later burns the other.

original: gnas kyi lus las 'phos gyur cing //
analyzed: gnas kyi lus las 'phos gyur cing //
translated: Having transcended the body of the elements,🔽and having abandoned mind and concepts,

original: sems dang rtog pas rnam spangs pa; ;chags pa med pa'i ye shes ro //
analyzed: sems dang rtog pas rnam spangs pa; ;chags pa med pa'i ye shes ro //
translated: the taste of nonattached wisdom

original: stug po'i dbus na rnam par mdzes //
analyzed: stug po'i dbus na rnam par mdzes //
translated: is beautiful in the middle of the thicket.

original: bskyed med rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs //
analyzed: bskyed med rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs //
translated: The unborn, various forms

original: sa la gnas pa ma yin pa //
analyzed: sa la gnas pa ma yin pa //
translated: are not on the stage.🔽Having gone for refuge to selflessness,

original: lta ba thams cad zad byed pa'i //
analyzed: lta ba thams cad zad byed pa'i //
translated: which causes the exhaustion of all views,🔽the one who is skilled in the stage

original: bdag med nyid la skyabs su song //
analyzed: bdag med nyid la skyabs su song //
translated: should practice the yoga of the stage.

original: rgyud kyi rgyun rnams chad pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rgyud kyi rgyun rnams chad pa'i phyir //
translated: Because the continuum of the mind-stream is severed,

original: 'jig pa med cing 'byung med pas //
analyzed: 'jig pa med cing 'byung med pas //
translated: There is no destruction and no origination.

original: lta ba thams cad zag byed pa //
analyzed: lta ba thams cad zag byed pa //
translated: All views are defiled

original: bdag med nyid la skyabs su song //
analyzed: bdag med nyid la skyabs su song //
translated: By the selflessness of the person.

original: zhir gyur zhi ba zhir ma byas //
analyzed: zhir gyur zhi ba zhir ma byas //
translated: The peaceful, the peaceful, not made peaceful,

original: zhi bas zhi ba bden nyid du //
analyzed: zhi bas zhi ba bden nyid du //
translated: By the peaceful, the truth of peace,

original: lta ba thams cad rnam dag phyir //
analyzed: lta ba thams cad rnam dag phyir //
translated: All views are completely purified

original: bdag med nyid la skyabs su song //
analyzed: bdag med nyid la skyabs su song //
translated: By the selflessness of the person.

original: sa rnams sna tshogs byas pa ni //🔽bdag med pa @19a *//
analyzed: sa rnams sna tshogs byas pa ni // bdag med pa @19a *//
translated: The various stages of the earth

original: la bdag med pas //
analyzed: la bdag med pas //
translated: Are made by the selflessness of the person.🔽The impermanent is destroyed by the hammer,

original: mi rtag tho bas bcom pa dang / rnam par ston pa'i mdas kyang ste //
analyzed: mi rtag tho bas bcom pa dang / rnam par ston pa'i mdas kyang ste //
translated: And by the arrow of demonstration.

original: bsreg pa tshig pa'i me bzhin du //
analyzed: bsreg pa tshig pa'i me bzhin du //
translated: Like fire burns what is to be burned,🔽The self is made peaceful by the self.

original: bdag nyid zhir 'gyur de nyid du; ;de bzhin lta bas rnam brtags te //
analyzed: bdag nyid zhir 'gyur de nyid du; ;de bzhin lta bas rnam brtags te //
translated: In the same way, views are examined🔽By the selflessness of the person.

original: bdag med bsam gtan rab gnas pa //
analyzed: bdag med bsam gtan rab gnas pa //
translated: Abiding in the concentration on selflessness,

original: lta ba'i chos la ba der gnas kyi //
analyzed: lta ba'i chos la ba der gnas kyi //
translated: One abides in the view of the Dharma.

original: so so rang rig spyod yul la //
analyzed: so so rang rig spyod yul la //
translated: The object of the individual self-cognizer

original: thog ma med nas nyes dri med //
analyzed: thog ma med nas nyes dri med //
translated: Is without fault from beginningless [time].

original: 'phags pa rnams kyis la gnas //
analyzed: 'phags pa rnams kyis la gnas //
translated: The noble ones abide in that.

original: 'phags gnas 'jig rten pas spangs te //
analyzed: 'phags gnas 'jig rten pas spangs te //
translated: The āryas abandon the worldly abodes

original: 'jig rten 'das pa'i 'phags la gnas //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'das pa'i 'phags la gnas //
translated: And abide in the transcendent ārya state.

original: sems kyi sa las rab gyur te //
analyzed: sems kyi sa las rab gyur te //
translated: Having transcended the level of the mind,

original: stug po'i dkyil na rnam par mdzes //🔽mi bdag mi bdag dbang po rnams //
analyzed: stug po'i dkyil na rnam par mdzes // mi bdag mi bdag dbang po rnams //
translated: They are radiant in the midst of the thicket.🔽All the rulers and lords

original: thams cad kyis kyang yang smras pa //
analyzed: thams cad kyis kyang yang smras pa //
translated: Again spoke thus:

original: rdo rje'i snying po skyabs dang mgon //
analyzed: rdo rje'i snying po skyabs dang mgon //
translated: “The vajra essence, the refuge and protector,🔽To whom should we go for refuge?

original: gang la skyabs su mchi bar bgyi; ;sangs rgyas yod min med pa min //
analyzed: gang la skyabs su mchi bar bgyi; ;sangs rgyas yod min med pa min //
translated: The Buddha is neither existent nor nonexistent.

original: phung po'i skye shing rnam bsregs te //
analyzed: phung po'i skye shing rnam bsregs te //
translated: The tree of the aggregates is burned,

original: dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud bcom nas //
analyzed: dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud bcom nas //
translated: And having conquered Māra and his army,

original: stug po sangs rgyas sa la gnas //
analyzed: stug po sangs rgyas sa la gnas //
translated: They abide in the buddha stage of the thicket.

original: shes bya dri med zhi ba la //
analyzed: shes bya dri med zhi ba la //
translated: In the stainless peace of the knowable,

original: skyabs su song zhig grogs po dag /
analyzed: skyabs su song zhig grogs po dag /
translated: Go for refuge, O friends!

original: rtag dang chad las bral ba ste //
analyzed: rtag dang chad las bral ba ste //
translated: Free from eternalism and nihilism,

original: blo dang rtogs bya'i gnas ma yin //
analyzed: blo dang rtogs bya'i gnas ma yin //
translated: It is not the abode of the intellect and the knowable.

original: stug po'i dkyil bzhugs rnal 'byor can //
analyzed: stug po'i dkyil bzhugs rnal 'byor can //
translated: The yogins who dwell in the midst of the thicket,

original: de yang grogs po mgon skyabs so //
analyzed: de yang grogs po mgon skyabs so //
translated: They too are the refuge, the protector, the lord.

original: rnal 'byor can rnams kun gyi zhing //
analyzed: rnal 'byor can rnams kun gyi zhing //
translated: The field of all yogins,

original: zhing mchog bzang ba stug pa'o //
analyzed: zhing mchog bzang ba stug pa'o //
translated: The supreme field is the dense array of the good.

original: rnal 'byor ba ni mang pos gang //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba ni mang pos gang //
translated: It is filled with many yogis.

original: stug po de la skyabs su song //
analyzed: stug po de la skyabs su song //
translated: Go for refuge in that dense array.

original: spros pa kun dang @19b bral ba ste //
analyzed: spros pa kun dang @19b bral ba ste //
translated: Free from all conceptual elaborations,

original: lta ba'i nyes pa rnam par spangs //
analyzed: lta ba'i nyes pa rnam par spangs //
translated: Abandoning the faults of views,🔽Like a painting on a wall,🔽Like a barren woman’s son in a dream,

original: ri mo'i thag thug lta bu dang // rmi lam mo gsham bu 'byung dang // rmi lam bud med bzang mo ltar //
analyzed: ri mo'i thag thug lta bu dang // rmi lam mo gsham bu 'byung dang // rmi lam bud med bzang mo ltar //
translated: Like a beautiful woman in a dream,

original: thub pa rnams kyis 'gro ba mthong //
analyzed: thub pa rnams kyis 'gro ba mthong //
translated: The sages see the world.

original: dri za'i grong khyer spyod pa bzhin //
analyzed: dri za'i grong khyer spyod pa bzhin //
translated: Like a city of gandharvas,

original: skra phung mgal ba bskor ba ltar //
analyzed: skra phung mgal ba bskor ba ltar //
translated: Like a circle of hair on a tortoise,

original: smig rgyu ri dvags sred mtshungs su //
analyzed: smig rgyu ri dvags sred mtshungs su //
translated: Like a mirage, like a deer’s thirst,

original: yod dang med pa rnam par spangs //
analyzed: yod dang med pa rnam par spangs //
translated: Abandoning existence and nonexistence,🔽Like various illusory bodies,

original: sgyu ma'i lus gzugs sna tshogs dang // 'phrul pa'i sprul par de dag ni //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i lus gzugs sna tshogs dang // 'phrul pa'i sprul par de dag ni //
translated: Like magical emanations,

original: 'jig rten spyod tshe mthong ba ste //
analyzed: 'jig rten spyod tshe mthong ba ste //
translated: They are seen while engaging in worldly conduct.

original: sa dang sa la thub pa rnams //
analyzed: sa dang sa la thub pa rnams //
translated: On the various levels, the sages

original: bsdor med du ma'i gzugs gyur pa //
analyzed: bsdor med du ma'i gzugs gyur pa //
translated: Become many forms without comparison.

original: sgyu ma'i shing gi 'bras bu ltar //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i shing gi 'bras bu ltar //
translated: Like the fruits of an illusory tree,

original: sprin dang du ba glog ltar yang //
analyzed: sprin dang du ba glog ltar yang //
translated: Like clouds, smoke, and lightning,

original: thub pas rnal 'byor rnam par mthong //
analyzed: thub pas rnal 'byor rnam par mthong //
translated: The Sage has seen the yogis.

original: rdzas la sogs pa'i bzo bzung ltar //
analyzed: rdzas la sogs pa'i bzo bzung ltar //
translated: Like the grasping of substances and so on,

original: 'gro ba bdag gi rnam rtog byung //
analyzed: 'gro ba bdag gi rnam rtog byung //
translated: The conception of a self of beings has arisen.🔽The mind, mental consciousness, and the entities of the three times,

original: yid dang yid kyi rnam shes dang / chos lda'i ngo bo nyid rnams dang / 'jug pa'i rnam shes spyod pa ni //
analyzed: yid dang yid kyi rnam shes dang / chos lda'i ngo bo nyid rnams dang / 'jug pa'i rnam shes spyod pa ni //
translated: The activities of the engaging consciousnesses,

original: bdag med mi gnyis brgyan pa ste //
analyzed: bdag med mi gnyis brgyan pa ste //
translated: Are adorned with non-self and non-duality.

original: bag chags thog ma med pa yi //
analyzed: bag chags thog ma med pa yi //
translated: The beginningless habitual tendencies

original: sems kyi gnas ngan len byung yod //
analyzed: sems kyi gnas ngan len byung yod //
translated: Have arisen as the negative tendencies of the mind.

original: 'od pa'i dba' rlabs 'dra bar ni //
analyzed: 'od pa'i dba' rlabs 'dra bar ni //
translated: Like waves in water,

original: kun gzhi sa la gnas pa yin //
analyzed: kun gzhi sa la gnas pa yin //
translated: They abide in the ālaya ground.

original: rlung gis ji ltar 'od pa la //
analyzed: rlung gis ji ltar 'od pa la //
translated: Just as the wind moves

original: phan tshun dag tu bskyod byas na //
analyzed: phan tshun dag tu bskyod byas na //
translated: The waves back and forth,

original: dpa' rlabs rnams la 'jig pa med //
analyzed: dpa' rlabs rnams la 'jig pa med //
translated: The waves are not destroyed.

original: 'od pa'ang med par mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: 'od pa'ang med par mi 'gyur te //
translated: The water is not destroyed either.

original: snga med bag chags gnas can rnams //
analyzed: snga med bag chags gnas can rnams //
translated: The waves are the basis of the habitual tendencies that did not exist before.

original: 'jug pa'i yul la gzhol ba dag /
analyzed: 'jug pa'i yul la gzhol ba dag /
translated: They are directed toward the objects of engagement.

original: sems brgyad rnams kyi 'jug pa ni //
analyzed: sems brgyad rnams kyi 'jug pa ni //
translated: The engagements of the eight consciousnesses

original: rnam par tha dad ma yin te //🔽dus gcig tu @20a *//
analyzed: rnam par tha dad ma yin te // dus gcig tu @20a *//
translated: Are not different.

original: yang de dag 'byung //
analyzed: yang de dag 'byung //
translated: They arise simultaneously.

original: bar bar du ni rim gyis so //
analyzed: bar bar du ni rim gyis so //
translated: Sometimes, it is gradual.

original: thog ma med nas sems 'jug pa //
analyzed: thog ma med nas sems 'jug pa //
translated: The mind has been operating since beginningless time🔽Like the sun, moon, stars, planets,🔽leaves, flowers, fruits,

original: skar ma gza' yi dkyil 'khor dang / lo ma me tog 'bras bu dang // ri dang sde dang tshal sogs la //
analyzed: skar ma gza' yi dkyil 'khor dang / lo ma me tog 'bras bu dang // ri dang sde dang tshal sogs la //
translated: mountains, armies, forests, etc.

original: rtag tu dus gcig 'jug pa ste //
analyzed: rtag tu dus gcig 'jug pa ste //
translated: It operates always and simultaneously.

original: rim gyis kyang ni shes par byos //
analyzed: rim gyis kyang ni shes par byos //
translated: You should understand it is also gradual.

original: yang dag ma yin snga ma'i yul //
analyzed: yang dag ma yin snga ma'i yul //
translated: The previous objects are not real.

original: mal la gnas bzhin mthong ba yin //
analyzed: mal la gnas bzhin mthong ba yin //
translated: They are seen while lying down.

original: lus kyi 'jug pa rim gyis kyang //
analyzed: lus kyi 'jug pa rim gyis kyang //
translated: The operation of the body is also gradual.

original: srog la brten cing 'byung ba yin //
analyzed: srog la brten cing 'byung ba yin //
translated: It occurs in dependence on life.

original: rdzas dang grangs dang chos rnams la //
analyzed: rdzas dang grangs dang chos rnams la //
translated: In terms of substance, number, and phenomena,

original: tha dad rim gyis 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: tha dad rim gyis 'byung ba ste /
translated: it arises gradually and separately.

original: mur zhing bca' dang bza' rnams la //
analyzed: mur zhing bca' dang bza' rnams la //
translated: In terms of food, drink, and eating,

original: tha dad rim gyis 'da' ba min //
analyzed: tha dad rim gyis 'da' ba min //
translated: it does not pass gradually and separately.

original: ro dang dri yi rnam pa la //
analyzed: ro dang dri yi rnam pa la //
translated: In terms of taste and smell,

original: rim gyis tha dad 'byung ba yin //🔽rim gyis kha dog khyad par gyi //
analyzed: rim gyis tha dad 'byung ba yin // rim gyis kha dog khyad par gyi //
translated: it arises gradually and separately.🔽In terms of the various distinctions of color,

original: sna tshogs la yang dus gcig tu //
analyzed: sna tshogs la yang dus gcig tu //
translated: it is also simultaneous.

original: rgyal po sems ni bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: rgyal po sems ni bsam mi khyab //
translated: O King, the mind is inconceivable.

original: rtag tu rang bzhin 'od can no //
analyzed: rtag tu rang bzhin 'od can no //
translated: It is always naturally luminous.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ste //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ste //
translated: The essence of the Tathāgata

original: rdo ba rnams kyi gser bzhin gnas //
analyzed: rdo ba rnams kyi gser bzhin gnas //
translated: Resides like gold in ore.

original: yid ni kun gyi gzhi las byung //
analyzed: yid ni kun gyi gzhi las byung //
translated: The mind arises from the universal ground.

original: yid kyi rnam shes de bzhin te //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam shes de bzhin te //
translated: The mental consciousness is the same.

original: rnam shes drug po rnam pa mang //
analyzed: rnam shes drug po rnam pa mang //
translated: The six consciousnesses have various aspects.

original: sa yi khyad par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sa yi khyad par byed pa'o //
translated: They create the distinctions of the stages.

original: bag chags sems dang lhan cig tu //
analyzed: bag chags sems dang lhan cig tu //
translated: The habitual tendencies are together with the mind.

original: sa bon kun pa'i kun bzhi ni //
analyzed: sa bon kun pa'i kun bzhi ni //
translated: The universal ground of all the seeds

original: kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag pa'i //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag pa'i //
translated: Is the basis of all the phenomena of saṃsāra and nirvāṇa.

original: rtag tu rang bzhin 'od can gyis //
analyzed: rtag tu rang bzhin 'od can gyis //
translated: It is always naturally luminous,

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs kyi rigs //
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs kyi rigs //
translated: And thus is the family of the Tathāgatas.

original: nges dang ma nges dge ba yin //
analyzed: nges dang ma nges dge ba yin //
translated: It is virtuous, definite and indefinite.

original: rtag @20b tu gnas ltar 'byung ba ni //
analyzed: rtag @20b tu gnas ltar 'byung ba ni //
translated: It arises like the constant abiding

original: rgya mtsho'i rlabs dag ji bzhin du //
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i rlabs dag ji bzhin du //
translated: Of the waves of the ocean.🔽It is the universal ground that pervades

original: tha ma 'bring dang rab rnams su //🔽de bzhin kun gzhis khyab par byed //
analyzed: tha ma 'bring dang rab rnams su // de bzhin kun gzhis khyab par byed //
translated: The highest, middling, and lowest.

original: sa dang sa la rnam dag cing //
analyzed: sa dang sa la rnam dag cing //
translated: It is pure on each stage,

original: gzhan du gyur nas rnam par mdzes //🔽yang dag ji bzhin don ston la //
analyzed: gzhan du gyur nas rnam par mdzes // yang dag ji bzhin don ston la //
translated: And is beautiful when transformed.🔽The vajra essence then said

original: rdo rje snying pos yang smras pa //
analyzed: rdo rje snying pos yang smras pa //
translated: To the one who teaches the meaning just as it is:

original: mthong zhing thos te shes pas na //
analyzed: mthong zhing thos te shes pas na //
translated: Seeing, hearing, and knowing,

original: sa chen bdag po khyod nyid kyis //
analyzed: sa chen bdag po khyod nyid kyis //
translated: You, the lord of the great earth,

original: spobs pa can la bstan par gyis //
analyzed: spobs pa can la bstan par gyis //
translated: Should teach it to the eloquent ones.

original: khyad par du 'o khyad par bdag /
analyzed: khyad par du 'o khyad par bdag /
translated: In particular, I, the special one,🔽The elements of the minor elements,🔽The wheels that turn on the earth,

original: khams phran rnams kyi khams rnams dang // sa la 'khor lo 'khor rnams dang // kun gzhi rnam par dag gyur na /
analyzed: khams phran rnams kyi khams rnams dang // sa la 'khor lo 'khor rnams dang // kun gzhi rnam par dag gyur na /
translated: When the all-base is purified,

original: sa yi rgyal por 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: sa yi rgyal por 'gyur ba yin //
translated: One becomes the king of the earth.

original: dzambu'i gling la dbang ba yi //
analyzed: dzambu'i gling la dbang ba yi //
translated: Having dominion over Jambudvīpa,

original: 'khor lo 'khor bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khor lo 'khor bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: One becomes a wheel-turning monarch.

original: dga' ldan la sogs gzhal med du //
analyzed: dga' ldan la sogs gzhal med du //
translated: In the celestial palaces of Tuṣita and so forth,

original: mtshe ma rab kyi dbang por 'gyur //
analyzed: mtshe ma rab kyi dbang por 'gyur //
translated: One becomes the lord of the Sun and Moon.

original: dbang po'i gnas su dbang por te //
analyzed: dbang po'i gnas su dbang por te //
translated: In the abode of Indra, one is Indra,

original: dbang sgyur gnas su de bzhin no //
analyzed: dbang sgyur gnas su de bzhin no //
translated: And likewise in the abode of the Vaśavartins.

original: 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po'i bdag /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po'i bdag /
translated: One becomes the lord of the desire realm,

original: gzugs khams bdag po'ang de bzhin te //
analyzed: gzugs khams bdag po'ang de bzhin te //
translated: And likewise the lord of the form realm.

original: gzugs med 'du shes med sems can //
analyzed: gzugs med 'du shes med sems can //
translated: In the formless realm, the beings without perception,

original: bsam gtan bde ba'i 'bras bur yang //🔽yang dag mngon bya ma chags pas //
analyzed: bsam gtan bde ba'i 'bras bur yang // yang dag mngon bya ma chags pas //
translated: Are the result of the bliss of concentration.🔽By the perfect manifest, without attachment,

original: yang dag mtha' la ma reg par //
analyzed: yang dag mtha' la ma reg par //
translated: Not touching the limit of reality,

original: 'jigs med seng+ge'i sgra sgrog cing //
analyzed: 'jigs med seng+ge'i sgra sgrog cing //
translated: And roars the lion’s roar of fearlessness.

original: dga' dang ye shes yang dag ldan //
analyzed: dga' dang ye shes yang dag ldan //
translated: Possessing joy and wisdom,

original: bsam gtan dbang gi bde bas ngoms //
analyzed: bsam gtan dbang gi bde bas ngoms //
translated: He is satisfied with the bliss of the power of meditation.

original: de ni stug por smon pa yin //
analyzed: de ni stug por smon pa yin //
translated: That is the aspiration for the thickets.

original: khams gsum spyod pa'i nyes pa yis //🔽chags med mnyam @21a *//
analyzed: khams gsum spyod pa'i nyes pa yis // chags med mnyam @21a *//
translated: The faults of the conduct in the three realms

original: par bzhag pa ste //
analyzed: par bzhag pa ste //
translated: Are the equanimity without attachment.

original: mthar gyis stug por zhugs nas su //
analyzed: mthar gyis stug por zhugs nas su //
translated: Having gradually entered the thickets,

original: rnam par sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sar //
analyzed: rnam par sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sar //
translated: The Buddha, the enlightened one,

original: chos kyi dbang por bdag gyur te //
analyzed: chos kyi dbang por bdag gyur te //
translated: Has become the lord of the Dharma,

original: rten las gzhan du gyur cing bde //
analyzed: rten las gzhan du gyur cing bde //
translated: Happy in his transformation from the basis.

original: rtag pa brtan pa zhi ba'i chos //
analyzed: rtag pa brtan pa zhi ba'i chos //
translated: The eternal, stable, peaceful Dharma

original: stug po'i dkyil na sras dang bcas //
analyzed: stug po'i dkyil na sras dang bcas //
translated: Is in the midst of the thickets with his sons,

original: chos kyi bdag po rnam par mdzes //
analyzed: chos kyi bdag po rnam par mdzes //
translated: The lord of the Dharma, resplendent.

original: 'jigs pa med pa mi yi mchog /
analyzed: 'jigs pa med pa mi yi mchog /
translated: The fearless, supreme among men,

original: mya ngan 'das pa 'jig pa min //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa 'jig pa min //
translated: Is not destroyed by nirvana.

original: mur 'dug rnams kyis jir brjod bzhin //
analyzed: mur 'dug rnams kyis jir brjod bzhin //
translated: As it is said by the extremists,

original: mchog dang tha ma bar ma yi //
analyzed: mchog dang tha ma bar ma yi //
translated: The supreme, the inferior, and the middling

original: rgyal po bcu po'i las rnams kyis //
analyzed: rgyal po bcu po'i las rnams kyis //
translated: Are the ten actions of the king.

original: theg pa gsum du gyur pa ste //
analyzed: theg pa gsum du gyur pa ste //
translated: They become the three vehicles,

original: stug po 'tshol ba'i khyad par yang //
analyzed: stug po 'tshol ba'i khyad par yang //
translated: And the distinctions of seeking the thickets🔽Are the three vehicles.

original: rgyal po yang dag skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rgyal po yang dag skye bar 'gyur //
translated: And the king will be reborn again.

original: sa dang sa la gnas pas so //
analyzed: sa dang sa la gnas pas so //
translated: Because he abides on the stages.

original: 'jig na 'dus byas nyes par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'jig na 'dus byas nyes par 'gyur //
translated: If the world were destroyed, the conditioned would be flawed.

original: 'chi ba rnams la'ang de bzhin te //
analyzed: 'chi ba rnams la'ang de bzhin te //
translated: And so it is with death.

original: rgyal po 'jig pa mthar ma yin //
analyzed: rgyal po 'jig pa mthar ma yin //
translated: The destruction of the world is not the end.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sku //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sku //
translated: The Tathāgata is a body of wisdom.

original: sems can zad cing med 'gyur ba //
analyzed: sems can zad cing med 'gyur ba //
translated: If sentient beings were exhausted and ceased,

original: de ste mya ngan 'das 'jig na //
analyzed: de ste mya ngan 'das 'jig na //
translated: If nirvāṇa were destroyed,

original: sngon gyi mtha' yang 'jig pa dang // sems can 'byung ba med par 'gyur //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' yang 'jig pa dang // sems can 'byung ba med par 'gyur //
translated: The past would be destroyed, and sentient beings would not arise.

original: sems can khams rnams zad gyur na //
analyzed: sems can khams rnams zad gyur na //
translated: If the realms of sentient beings were exhausted,

original: rgyal ba'i shes bya dngos po med //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i shes bya dngos po med //
translated: The knowable objects of the Victor would be nonexistent.

original: mya ngan 'dar med shes bya med //
analyzed: mya ngan 'dar med shes bya med //
translated: In nirvāṇa, there would be no knowable objects.

original: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid kyang med //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid kyang med //
translated: There would be no Buddha, and no Buddhahood.🔽The examples of the burning lamp

original: me mar bsregs pa'i dpe rnams dang // sa bon tshig pa'i dpe dag gi //
analyzed: me mar bsregs pa'i dpe rnams dang // sa bon tshig pa'i dpe dag gi //
translated: and the burnt seed,

original: rtog can thar la mkhas pa rnams //
analyzed: rtog can thar la mkhas pa rnams //
translated: The learned ones who are conceptual about liberation

original: @21b lus can rnams la thar pa ston //
analyzed: @21b lus can rnams la thar pa ston //
translated: Teach liberation to embodied beings.

original: yod dang med pa'i rnam thar gyis //
analyzed: yod dang med pa'i rnam thar gyis //
translated: Through the liberation of existence and nonexistence,

original: thar pa'i bde las de dag ring //
analyzed: thar pa'i bde las de dag ring //
