analyzed: 'byung ba'i rgyu la gnod pa med //
translated: but the cause of the elements is not harmed.

original: 'byung ba'i rgyu ni rnam shes te //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i rgyu ni rnam shes te //
translated: The cause of the elements is consciousness,

original: yid dang rnam shes lnga pa'o //
analyzed: yid dang rnam shes lnga pa'o //
translated: the mind and the five consciousnesses.

original: rang gi rnam rtog mi shes pas //
analyzed: rang gi rnam rtog mi shes pas //
translated: Not knowing one’s own thoughts,

original: dpa' rlabs bzhin du 'byung ba yin //
analyzed: dpa' rlabs bzhin du 'byung ba yin //
translated: they arise like waves.

original: brtag dang rtog las rnam grol ba //
analyzed: brtag dang rtog las rnam grol ba //
translated: Free from investigation and analysis,

original: thub pa kun gyi kun gzhi 'o; ;yod dang med las lha rdzas su //
analyzed: thub pa kun gyi kun gzhi 'o; ;yod dang med las lha rdzas su //
translated: the all-base of all sages,

original: gzhan 'gyur 'jig pa ma yin zhing //
analyzed: gzhan 'gyur 'jig pa ma yin zhing //
translated: it is not destroyed by the transformation into🔽the other, existence and nonexistence.

original: stug po dang ni stug dkyil du //
analyzed: stug po dang ni stug dkyil du //
translated: In the thick and the thick center,

original: zla ba lta bur rab tu mdzes //
analyzed: zla ba lta bur rab tu mdzes //
translated: it is beautiful like the moon.

original: de ni mi 'jig bde bar gnas //
analyzed: de ni mi 'jig bde bar gnas //
translated: He will remain happily without being destroyed.

original: stug po'i dkyil na sras dang bcas //
analyzed: stug po'i dkyil na sras dang bcas //
translated: In the midst of the thick forest, together with his sons,

original: tha dad ma yin mtshan nyid mkhyen //
analyzed: tha dad ma yin mtshan nyid mkhyen //
translated: He will know the characteristics without being separate.

original: ye shes ro gcig nyid du gyur //
analyzed: ye shes ro gcig nyid du gyur //
translated: He will become of one taste with wisdom.

original: bsam yas rnal 'byor yul can te //
analyzed: bsam yas rnal 'byor yul can te //
translated: The inconceivable is the domain of yoga,

original: rgyal po zla ba lta bur spyod //
analyzed: rgyal po zla ba lta bur spyod //
translated: The king will practice like the moon.

original: rgyal @24a *// po phun sum tshogs pa 'di //
analyzed: rgyal @24a *// po phun sum tshogs pa 'di //
translated: This perfection of the king

original: rnal 'byor khyer ba thub rnams kyi //
analyzed: rnal 'byor khyer ba thub rnams kyi //
translated: Is the yoga of the victors.

original: rtag par rgyal po de yi phyir //
analyzed: rtag par rgyal po de yi phyir //
translated: Always for the sake of that king,

original: khyod kyi yid kyang rnal 'byor shog /
analyzed: khyod kyi yid kyang rnal 'byor shog /
translated: May your mind also be of yoga.🔽The six types of desire realm,

original: 'dod gnas rnam pa drug po dang // tshangs pa dag gi bcu gnyis dang // gzugs med shes med sems can du //
analyzed: 'dod gnas rnam pa drug po dang // tshangs pa dag gi bcu gnyis dang // gzugs med shes med sems can du //
translated: The twelve of Brahmā, and the formless realm of non-cognition🔽Are the sentient beings, O King.

original: rgyal po khyod ni dbang por gyis //🔽stug por 'dod pa'ang 'thob par te //
analyzed: rgyal po khyod ni dbang por gyis // stug por 'dod pa'ang 'thob par te //
translated: You should be the lord of those.🔽Even those who desire the thick forest

original: bzang po'i stug por smon pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bzang po'i stug por smon pa'i phyir //
translated: Will attain it, because they aspire to the good thick forest.

original: rgyal po ye shes bcu po rnams //
analyzed: rgyal po ye shes bcu po rnams //
translated: O King, the ten wisdoms

original: bsgoms na stug por 'gro bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bsgoms na stug por 'gro bar 'gyur //
translated: If meditated upon, will lead to the thick forest.

original: chos dang rjes su 'gro shes dang // pha rol sems dang kun rdzob dang // sdug bsngal 'dus pa'i shes pa dang // 'gog dang lam las skyes pa dang // byang ba'i shes dang mi skye dang // khong bzo bsgom pa de bzhin te //
analyzed: chos dang rjes su 'gro shes dang // pha rol sems dang kun rdzob dang // sdug bsngal 'dus pa'i shes pa dang // 'gog dang lam las skyes pa dang // byang ba'i shes dang mi skye dang // khong bzo bsgom pa de bzhin te //
translated: The knowledge of purification, non-arising,🔽And likewise, the cultivation of patience,🔽The Śākya clan, the king of the Tathāgatas,

original: sha kun ta la'i rgyal rigs dang // aig shva khu dang so ma'i rigs //
analyzed: sha kun ta la'i rgyal rigs dang // aig shva khu dang so ma'i rigs //
translated: The Ikṣvāku clan, and the Soma clan,

original: yang dag don ston rgyal po'i mchog /
analyzed: yang dag don ston rgyal po'i mchog /
translated: The supreme king who teaches the true meaning,

original: khyod kyi rigs ni khyad par 'phags //
analyzed: khyod kyi rigs ni khyad par 'phags //
translated: Your clan is especially exalted.

original: de yi rigs su khyod skyes shing //
analyzed: de yi rigs su khyod skyes shing //
translated: You were born into that clan,

original: zhum pa med par stug por song //
analyzed: zhum pa med par stug por song //
translated: And went to the dense forest without hesitation.

original: lta ba'i chos la gnas pa yi //
analyzed: lta ba'i chos la gnas pa yi //
translated: Abiding in the view of phenomena,

original: rnal 'byor can gnas dri med du //🔽sbud pa bzhin du dbugs rgyu zhing //
analyzed: rnal 'byor can gnas dri med du // sbud pa bzhin du dbugs rgyu zhing //
translated: The yogi abides in the stainless state.🔽Breathing like a bellows,

original: 'gro rgyu lug dang 'dra ba ste //🔽rnga phrug bzhin du lus phyed kyis //
analyzed: 'gro rgyu lug dang 'dra ba ste // rnga phrug bzhin du lus phyed kyis //
translated: Moving like a sheep,🔽Going and coming with half the body

original: 'gro zhing 'ong ba byed pa ni //
analyzed: 'gro zhing 'ong ba byed pa ni //
translated: Like a young drum,

original: thams cad lus la yid yin te //
analyzed: thams cad lus la yid yin te //
translated: The mind is in all the body,

original: sgyu ma'i ri dvags bzhin @24b du gnas //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i ri dvags bzhin @24b du gnas //
translated: Abiding like an illusory deer.

original: sgyu ma'i shing ltar shin tu snang //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i shing ltar shin tu snang //
translated: Like an illusory tree, it appears.

original: chu bo'i nang gi me bzhin du //
analyzed: chu bo'i nang gi me bzhin du //
translated: Like fire in the middle of a river,

original: smin ma mig dang yan lag rnams //
analyzed: smin ma mig dang yan lag rnams //
translated: The eyebrows, eyes, and limbs

original: sgyur pas rgyal po bzhin du rtse //
analyzed: sgyur pas rgyal po bzhin du rtse //
translated: Are transformed like a king enjoying himself.

original: sems dang sems las byung dang yid //
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung dang yid //
translated: Mind, mental factors, and the mind,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag //
translated: And the mental consciousness,

original: chos rnams 'di dag dngos po med //
analyzed: chos rnams 'di dag dngos po med //
translated: These phenomena are unreal.

original: sprin gyi tshul du 'byung ba ste //
analyzed: sprin gyi tshul du 'byung ba ste //
translated: They arise in the manner of clouds.

original: kun gzhi thams cad sa bon 'di //
analyzed: kun gzhi thams cad sa bon 'di //
translated: The foundation of all is this seed,

original: bag chags rnams kyis yongs su dkris //
analyzed: bag chags rnams kyis yongs su dkris //
translated: Completely wrapped in traces.🔽Like a jewel with various forms,

original: sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu dang // 'ja' dang glog rnam ji bzhin du //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu dang // 'ja' dang glog rnam ji bzhin du //
translated: Like a rainbow and lightning,

original: lus can rnams kyi lus kyi yul //
analyzed: lus can rnams kyi lus kyi yul //
translated: In the bodies of embodied beings,

original: de lta'i gzugs su snang ba yin //
analyzed: de lta'i gzugs su snang ba yin //
translated: Such forms appear.

original: lu ma'i padmo lta bur dag /
analyzed: lu ma'i padmo lta bur dag /
translated: Pure like lotus flowers in a pond,

original: dri med ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin //
analyzed: dri med ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin //
translated: Like a stainless king of swans,

original: gsal ba gdon mi za ba'i rigs //
analyzed: gsal ba gdon mi za ba'i rigs //
translated: Clearly, undoubtedly,

original: sangs rgyas sprul pa bzhin du gnas //🔽mtshan ma'i mthu las ming 'byung ste //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sprul pa bzhin du gnas // mtshan ma'i mthu las ming 'byung ste //
translated: Resembling a buddha's emanation, it abides.🔽From the power of characteristics, names arise.

original: mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba yin //
analyzed: mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba yin //
translated: Characteristics arise from conditional factors.

original: mtshan ma ming dang 'brel ba yin //
analyzed: mtshan ma ming dang 'brel ba yin //
translated: Are connected with names and signs.

original: rkyen rnams kyis kyang rnam par brtags //
analyzed: rkyen rnams kyis kyang rnam par brtags //
translated: They are also investigated by conditions.

original: mtshan ma'i tshul dang dbyibs dag las //🔽rnam par rtog pa shin tu 'byung //
analyzed: mtshan ma'i tshul dang dbyibs dag las // rnam par rtog pa shin tu 'byung //
translated: From signs, ways, and shapes,🔽Imaginations arise.

original: rnam par rtog pa bskyed pa yis //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa bskyed pa yis //
translated: Imaginations are produced

original: rgyu la rnam pa gnyis su gsungs //
analyzed: rgyu la rnam pa gnyis su gsungs //
translated: And causes are said to be twofold.🔽External signs and minds,

original: phyi rol mtshan ma sems rnams dang // bag chags yid kyang de bzhin te //
analyzed: phyi rol mtshan ma sems rnams dang // bag chags yid kyang de bzhin te //
translated: And traces and dispositions are like that.

original: sems dang lhan cig ldan pa ni //
analyzed: sems dang lhan cig ldan pa ni //
translated: They are associated with the mind

original: khong pa la ni gnas pa yin //
analyzed: khong pa la ni gnas pa yin //
translated: And abide within the body.

original: yid dang dbang por ldan pa ni //
analyzed: yid dang dbang por ldan pa ni //
translated: When the mind is associated with the sense faculties,

original: rnam shes lnga mi rgyu yin te //
analyzed: rnam shes lnga mi rgyu yin te //
translated: The five consciousnesses do not operate.

original: rtag tu yang dag ye shes kyis //🔽'jig rten rgyu la @25a *//
analyzed: rtag tu yang dag ye shes kyis // 'jig rten rgyu la @25a *//
translated: Always with correct wisdom

original: rnam par lta //
analyzed: rnam par lta //
translated: Look at the causes in the world.

original: de ltar byed dang bya ba med //
analyzed: de ltar byed dang bya ba med //
translated: In that way, there is no agent or action.

original: de bzhin nyid 'di rnam gzhan min //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid 'di rnam gzhan min //
translated: Suchness is not otherwise.

original: thams cad chos kyi de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: thams cad chos kyi de bzhin nyid //
translated: The suchness of all phenomena

original: phan tshun stobs kyis 'byung ba ste //🔽rnal 'byor can rnams de ltar lta //
analyzed: phan tshun stobs kyis 'byung ba ste // rnal 'byor can rnams de ltar lta //
translated: Arises through the power of mutual dependence.🔽Yogins and yoginīs see it that way.

original: de bzhin nyid du gsal bar mthong //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du gsal bar mthong //
translated: They clearly see suchness.

original: rang bzhin yongs su grub pa ni //
analyzed: rang bzhin yongs su grub pa ni //
translated: The thoroughly established nature is

original: chos rnams chos nyid de yin te //
analyzed: chos rnams chos nyid de yin te //
translated: The reality of phenomena.

original: brtags pa'i dngos po rang bzhin du //
analyzed: brtags pa'i dngos po rang bzhin du //
translated: The imagined nature is

original: chos rnams thams cad ma skyes pa //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad ma skyes pa //
translated: The non-production of all phenomena.

original: stong pa ngo bo nyid med de //
analyzed: stong pa ngo bo nyid med de //
translated: It is empty and devoid of entity.

original: yod dang med pa'i phyogs spangs pa //
analyzed: yod dang med pa'i phyogs spangs pa //
translated: It is free from the extremes of existence and non-existence.

original: sgyu ma rmi lam rnams dang 'dra //
analyzed: sgyu ma rmi lam rnams dang 'dra //
translated: It is like an illusion or a dream.

original: dri za'i grong khyer lta bu ste //
analyzed: dri za'i grong khyer lta bu ste //
translated: It is like a city of the gandharvas.

original: skra tshogs rnams dang smig rgyu bzhin //
analyzed: skra tshogs rnams dang smig rgyu bzhin //
translated: It is like a mass of hair or a mirage.

original: du ba sprin stug lta bu ni //
analyzed: du ba sprin stug lta bu ni //
translated: It is like smoke or a thick cloud.

original: mtshan ma tshul dang dbyibs rnams kyis //
analyzed: mtshan ma tshul dang dbyibs rnams kyis //
translated: Through signs, modes, and shapes,

original: ji ltar ming du 'jug pa yi //
analyzed: ji ltar ming du 'jug pa yi //
translated: Just as they are designated by names,🔽Many words and letters,

original: tshig dang yi ge mang po dang // ming rnams mang po la yang ste //
analyzed: tshig dang yi ge mang po dang // ming rnams mang po la yang ste //
translated: And many names,

original: kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin yin //
analyzed: kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin yin //
translated: Are the imagined nature.

original: gzhan gyi dbang ni de las gzhan //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang ni de las gzhan //
translated: The dependent nature is different from that.

original: yid don dbang po 'dus pa las //
analyzed: yid don dbang po 'dus pa las //
translated: From the coming together of the mind, objects, and sense faculties,🔽The seed, the all-base, and latent tendencies,

original: sa bon kun can bag chags dang // tha dad ma yin sems dang bcas //
analyzed: sa bon kun can bag chags dang // tha dad ma yin sems dang bcas //
translated: Not separate, along with the mind,

original: rnam par shes pa kun tu 'byung //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa kun tu 'byung //
translated: Consciousness arises.

original: gzhan gyi dbang gi rang bzhin yang //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang gi rang bzhin yang //
translated: The nature of the dependent

original: phan tshun stobs kyi rgyu las so //
analyzed: phan tshun stobs kyi rgyu las so //
translated: Is from the mutual power of causes.

original: so so rang rig shin tu phra //
analyzed: so so rang rig shin tu phra //
translated: It is very subtle, to be known by oneself,

original: mthong ba'i chos la gnas pa ste //
analyzed: mthong ba'i chos la gnas pa ste //
translated: And is based on the visible world.

original: rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs pa 'di //
analyzed: rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs pa 'di //
translated: This nature is completely perfect,

original: 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo //
translated: The domain of the noble ones.

original: 'phags pa'i @25b rang bzhin thugs chud pas //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i @25b rang bzhin thugs chud pas //
translated: The nature of the noble ones is realized,

original: sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sras //🔽rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs pa ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sras // rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs pa ni //
translated: The Buddhas and the Buddha’s sons.🔽The completely perfect nature

original: yang dag mtha' ru gzigs pas na //
analyzed: yang dag mtha' ru gzigs pas na //
translated: Is seen as the limit of reality.

original: skye ba zad ces rnam par gsung //
analyzed: skye ba zad ces rnam par gsung //
translated: Therefore, it is said that birth is exhausted,

original: tshangs pa'i lam yang non ces so //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i lam yang non ces so //
translated: And that the path of Brahma is entered.

original: byas kyis bzod yang bya ba med //
analyzed: byas kyis bzod yang bya ba med //
translated: There is no more to be done,

original: phyin chad 'byung ba med do zhes //
analyzed: phyin chad 'byung ba med do zhes //
translated: And it will not arise again.

original: sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol //🔽g-yo ba thams cad shin tu byung //
analyzed: sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol // g-yo ba thams cad shin tu byung //
translated: It is completely liberated from all suffering.🔽All movements are completely pacified.

original: bag chags ma lus bsregs pas na //
analyzed: bag chags ma lus bsregs pas na //
translated: Since all habitual tendencies are burned,

original: rnam par rtog pa mi 'byung zhing //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa mi 'byung zhing //
translated: Conceptualization does not arise.

original: bdag med shin tu mthong ba ni //
analyzed: bdag med shin tu mthong ba ni //
translated: The complete seeing of selflessness

original: chos dang gang zag bsgrags pa ste //
analyzed: chos dang gang zag bsgrags pa ste //
translated: The proclamation of the Dharma and of the person,

original: sa bon rnams dang bral bas na //
analyzed: sa bon rnams dang bral bas na //
translated: And the seeds,

original: sems kyi tshogs rnams mi 'jug go //
analyzed: sems kyi tshogs rnams mi 'jug go //
translated: The mind does not engage with the aggregates.🔽The negative tendencies of the mind,

original: thog ma med pa'i dus bsags pa'i //🔽yid kyi gnas ngan len rtog pa'i //
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i dus bsags pa'i // yid kyi gnas ngan len rtog pa'i //
translated: Accumulated since beginningless time,

original: spros pa thams cad mngon bsal bas //
analyzed: spros pa thams cad mngon bsal bas //
translated: Are all eliminated through conceptualization,

original: mya ngan 'das pa lcags bsregs bzhin //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa lcags bsregs bzhin //
translated: Like a burning fire of nirvana.

original: ji ltar rab tu bsregs pa'i lcags //
analyzed: ji ltar rab tu bsregs pa'i lcags //
translated: Just as a very hot iron

original: bsil bar gyur kyang 'jig pa med //
analyzed: bsil bar gyur kyang 'jig pa med //
translated: Does not cool down all at once,

original: de bzhin grol ba thams cad kyang //
analyzed: de bzhin grol ba thams cad kyang //
translated: In the same way, all those who are liberated

original: me zad bzhin du bsil ba yin //
analyzed: me zad bzhin du bsil ba yin //
translated: Are cooled like a fire that has gone out.

original: zag pa med pa'i chos dbyings su //
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i chos dbyings su //
translated: Having entered the uncontaminated dharmadhatu,

original: zhugs pa stug po'i dkyil 'khor na //
analyzed: zhugs pa stug po'i dkyil 'khor na //
translated: In the mandala of the dense array,

original: rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras bcas //
analyzed: rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras bcas //
translated: The victors and their bodhisattva heirs

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi zas gnas pa /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi zas gnas pa /
translated: Abide with the food of samadhi.

original: mnyam par bzhag la mnyam bzhag cing //
analyzed: mnyam par bzhag la mnyam bzhag cing //
translated: They are equipoised in equipoise,

original: mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas //
analyzed: mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas //
translated: And abide in bliss in this very life.

original: rgyal po rnal 'byor can gyi yul //
analyzed: rgyal po rnal 'byor can gyi yul //
translated: The kingdom of the king who is a yogi

original: rnal 'byor 'di yin brtsam par gyis //
analyzed: rnal 'byor 'di yin brtsam par gyis //
translated: Is this yoga; practice it!

original: @26a *// de ste rgyal sras dge ba'i gnas //
analyzed: @26a *// de ste rgyal sras dge ba'i gnas //
translated: If you are a child of the victors, you are in a virtuous state.🔽

original: stug por 'gro bar 'dod na ste /
analyzed: stug por 'gro bar 'dod na ste /
translated: If you wish to go to the realm🔽of the bodhisattvas, the abode of virtue,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas //
translated: the realm of the buddhas,

original: zhing gi mchog ni stug po'o;/🔽de phyir rgyal po dge bar rtsoms //
analyzed: zhing gi mchog ni stug po'o;/ de phyir rgyal po dge bar rtsoms //
translated: the supreme realm of the Dense Array,🔽then, O King, practice virtue!

original: rgyal po rnams la'ang dge bar bgyis //
analyzed: rgyal po rnams la'ang dge bar bgyis //
translated: O King, practice virtue!

original: ming ni mtshan ma'i mthu las byung //🔽mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba ste //
analyzed: ming ni mtshan ma'i mthu las byung // mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba ste //
translated: The name arises from the power of signs.🔽Signs arise from conditions.

original: mtshan ma las kyang rnam rtog 'byung //
analyzed: mtshan ma las kyang rnam rtog 'byung //
translated: From signs, thoughts arise.

original: grub pa rnams ni ma gtogs par //
analyzed: grub pa rnams ni ma gtogs par //
translated: Except for the accomplished ones,

original: rdza la sogs pa dbang po'i yul //
analyzed: rdza la sogs pa dbang po'i yul //
translated: pots and so forth are objects of the senses.

original: phung po yon tan ldan pa'i rnams //
analyzed: phung po yon tan ldan pa'i rnams //
translated: The aggregates are endowed with qualities.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma 'di //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma 'di //
translated: This sign of conceptualization

original: skye ba la ni rgyu yin no //
analyzed: skye ba la ni rgyu yin no //
translated: is the cause of birth.

original: khyad par byed pa rnam rtog ste //
analyzed: khyad par byed pa rnam rtog ste //
translated: Conceptualization creates distinctions;

original: gnas kyang rnam par shes par byed //
analyzed: gnas kyang rnam par shes par byed //
translated: the abode is also made known.

original: 'gro dang mi 'gro 'gro ba yi //
analyzed: 'gro dang mi 'gro 'gro ba yi //
translated: The movements of the animate and inanimate world

original: gti mug rnams kyang shin tu skye //
analyzed: gti mug rnams kyang shin tu skye //
translated: arise from delusion.🔽Long and short, colors,

original: ring po thung du kha dog dang // rtsub pa dag dang 'jam pa'i rnams //
analyzed: ring po thung du kha dog dang // rtsub pa dag dang 'jam pa'i rnams //
translated: rough and smooth,

original: sgra dang dri la sogs pa'i yul //
analyzed: sgra dang dri la sogs pa'i yul //
translated: Objects such as sound, smell, and so forth,🔽Sweet, bitter, and hot,

original: mngar dang kha dang tsha ba dang // yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul //
analyzed: mngar dang kha dang tsha ba dang // yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul //
translated: The objects of mental consciousness,🔽As many as there are, virtuous and nonvirtuous,

original: ji snyed dge dang mi dge dang // 'dus byas chos dang 'dus ma byas //
analyzed: ji snyed dge dang mi dge dang // 'dus byas chos dang 'dus ma byas //
translated: Compounded phenomena and uncompounded phenomena,

original: mya ngan 'da' ba ye shes yul //
analyzed: mya ngan 'da' ba ye shes yul //
translated: And the object of wisdom, nirvāṇa,

original: skad cig skad cig rab tu 'byung //
analyzed: skad cig skad cig rab tu 'byung //
translated: Arise moment by moment.

original: byung zhing phyir yang ldog pa ste //
analyzed: byung zhing phyir yang ldog pa ste //
translated: They arise and then cease again.

original: de ni mgyogs par shin tu 'gro /
analyzed: de ni mgyogs par shin tu 'gro /
translated: They move very quickly.

original: rnam par shes pa rgyu las byung //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rgyu las byung //
translated: Consciousness arises from causes.

original: yid dang kun gzhi rab 'brel bas //
analyzed: yid dang kun gzhi rab 'brel bas //
translated: It is closely related to the mind and the ālaya.

original: khab long lta bur shin tu 'khor //
analyzed: khab long lta bur shin tu 'khor //
translated: It revolves like a magnet.🔽Like a snake with two heads,

original: kha gnyis sprul ni ji bzhin @26b pa; ;yid kyi spyod pa de bzhin te //
analyzed: kha gnyis sprul ni ji bzhin @26b pa; ;yid kyi spyod pa de bzhin te //
translated: The activity of the mind is like that.

original: kun gzhi rnam shes yog par byed //
analyzed: kun gzhi rnam shes yog par byed //
translated: It fills the ālaya consciousness.

original: gcig tu 'on kyang rab tu 'byung //
analyzed: gcig tu 'on kyang rab tu 'byung //
translated: It arises as one, but also as many.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes dang bcas //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes dang bcas //
translated: It is accompanied by mental consciousness.

original: rgyu yi dgos pa byas nas ldog //🔽bdag tu dgos pa'ang shin tu byed //
analyzed: rgyu yi dgos pa byas nas ldog // bdag tu dgos pa'ang shin tu byed //
translated: Having fulfilled its causal purpose, it ceases.🔽It also fulfills the purpose of self.

original: bdag gir bya ba'ang 'phel bar byed //
analyzed: bdag gir bya ba'ang 'phel bar byed //
translated: It increases the sense of ownership.

original: lus la drod kyang skyes pa ste //
analyzed: lus la drod kyang skyes pa ste //
translated: And heat is generated in the body.

original: sna tshogs rnam par rab tu spyod //
analyzed: sna tshogs rnam par rab tu spyod //
translated: One engages in various activities,🔽Such as food, drink, and enjoyments,🔽Clothing, incense, and so forth,

original: zas dang skom dang longs spyod dang / gos dang spos sogs rnam spyod dang // mchong ba dag dang rgyug par yang //
analyzed: zas dang skom dang longs spyod dang / gos dang spos sogs rnam spyod dang // mchong ba dag dang rgyug par yang //
translated: Jumping and running,

original: mi yi lus ni 'dzin pa yin //
analyzed: mi yi lus ni 'dzin pa yin //
translated: And taking on a human body.🔽Dancing, laughing, playing,

original: gar dang gad mo rtsed mo dang // yid kyang rtag tu byed pa ste;/
analyzed: gar dang gad mo rtsed mo dang // yid kyang rtag tu byed pa ste;/
translated: And always engaging the mind,🔽Like a whirling firebrand🔽And a gandharva city in a dream,

original: skra tshogs mgal pa bskor ba dang // dri za'i grong khyer rmi lam dang // smig rgyu la'ang de bzhin du //
analyzed: skra tshogs mgal pa bskor ba dang // dri za'i grong khyer rmi lam dang // smig rgyu la'ang de bzhin du //
translated: So too in a mirage,

original: rnam par rtog pa kun tu 'jug /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa kun tu 'jug /
translated: Conceptualization occurs.

original: pra bab kun tu 'khor ba'i sems //
analyzed: pra bab kun tu 'khor ba'i sems //
translated: The mind that wanders everywhere

original: bdag sems khong du mi chud pas //
analyzed: bdag sems khong du mi chud pas //
translated: Does not understand the mind itself.

original: lus dang snod kyi rnam par yang //
analyzed: lus dang snod kyi rnam par yang //
translated: The body and the vessel

original: phyang mo nyug ltar gnas pa'o //🔽nyam chung snying po med pa ste //
analyzed: phyang mo nyug ltar gnas pa'o // nyam chung snying po med pa ste //
translated: Remain like a withered creeper.🔽Weak and insubstantial,

original: rnam par rtog pa rgyu med pa //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa rgyu med pa //
translated: Without a cause for conceptualization,

original: bdag gis brtags pa'i don la spyod //
analyzed: bdag gis brtags pa'i don la spyod //
translated: One engages in the meaning imagined by oneself.

original: mthong nas gnas pa gzugs brnyan bzhin //
analyzed: mthong nas gnas pa gzugs brnyan bzhin //
translated: Having seen, one abides like a reflection.

original: rgyal po rnam shes sa bon ni //
analyzed: rgyal po rnam shes sa bon ni //
translated: The king is the seed of consciousness,

original: lta ba'i yul du g-yo ba ste //
analyzed: lta ba'i yul du g-yo ba ste //
translated: Moving in the field of view,

original: bus pa'i tshogs rnams myos par byed //
analyzed: bus pa'i tshogs rnams myos par byed //
translated: Intoxicating the host of children.

original: 'phags pa ma yin sa yi bdag /🔽rgyal po rnam shes gsum po yi //
analyzed: 'phags pa ma yin sa yi bdag / rgyal po rnam shes gsum po yi //
translated: The unrighteous king of the earth,🔽The king is the entry of the three consciousnesses,

original: 'jug pa rab tu bstan pa ste //
analyzed: 'jug pa rab tu bstan pa ste //
translated: Fully taught.

original: 'di rnams dang bral gab pa yi //
analyzed: 'di rnams dang bral gab pa yi //
translated: Free from these,

original: rang bzhin yang dag nyid yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin yang dag nyid yin no //
translated: The hidden nature is the truth.

original: bye ba phrag zhing ji @27a *//
analyzed: bye ba phrag zhing ji @27a *//
translated: As many as there are koṭis of fields,🔽The holder of power sees,

original: snyed rnams // shugs 'dzin gyi ni mthong ba dang // 'phags pa mong+gal bu yis kyang //
analyzed: snyed rnams // shugs 'dzin gyi ni mthong ba dang // 'phags pa mong+gal bu yis kyang //
translated: And the noble Maudgalyāyana

original: lus dang lus che mdzes pa rnams //
analyzed: lus dang lus che mdzes pa rnams //
translated: The beautiful ones with bodies and large bodies,

original: de dag las ni 'di dag 'phags //
analyzed: de dag las ni 'di dag 'phags //
translated: They are superior to those.

original: stug po'i zhing na sa yi bdag /
analyzed: stug po'i zhing na sa yi bdag /
translated: In the field of Tuṣita, the king of the earth,

original: thams cad zhing na ci mdzes pa //
analyzed: thams cad zhing na ci mdzes pa //
translated: All that is beautiful in the field,

original: de dag dpe'am char mi rung //🔽bde ba yod dang mngon dga' dang // 'og gi zhing rnams bye ba dag /
analyzed: de dag dpe'am char mi rung // bde ba yod dang mngon dga' dang // 'og gi zhing rnams bye ba dag /
translated: Is not comparable to it.🔽In the field of Sukhāvatī, the field of Abhirati,

original: de dang de na gang bzhugs pa'i //
analyzed: de dang de na gang bzhugs pa'i //
translated: And in the koṭis of lower fields,🔽The buddhas who dwell there,

original: sangs rgyas de dag stug la bstod //
analyzed: sangs rgyas de dag stug la bstod //
translated: Praise Tuṣita.

original: stug ces bya yod sngon mtha' med //
analyzed: stug ces bya yod sngon mtha' med //
translated: Tuṣita is said to be without beginning.

original: rang byung 'phrul pa de yin te //
analyzed: rang byung 'phrul pa de yin te //
translated: That is the self-originated marvel.

original: zag pa med pa'i sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i sangs rgyas so //
translated: It is the immaculate buddha.

original: 'byung ba gsum las 'das te gnas //
analyzed: 'byung ba gsum las 'das te gnas //
translated: It abides beyond the three elements.

original: de ni bde ba nyer len med //
analyzed: de ni bde ba nyer len med //
translated: It is bliss without appropriation.

original: khyod dang nga yir spyod dang bral //
analyzed: khyod dang nga yir spyod dang bral //
translated: It is free from the conduct of “I” and “mine.”

original: ther zug mchog tu rtag pa ste //
analyzed: ther zug mchog tu rtag pa ste //
translated: It is the supreme, constant, and eternal.

original: brtan pa stug por 'dus ma byas //
analyzed: brtan pa stug por 'dus ma byas //
translated: It is stable, dense, and unconditioned.

original: yang dag sangs rgyas byang chub tu //
analyzed: yang dag sangs rgyas byang chub tu //
translated: In the enlightenment of the perfect Buddha,

original: 'tshang rgya 'og min gnas mchog tu //🔽sangs rgyas ma gyur 'dod khams su //
analyzed: 'tshang rgya 'og min gnas mchog tu // sangs rgyas ma gyur 'dod khams su //
translated: one awakens to buddhahood in the supreme abode of Akaniṣṭha.🔽Without becoming a buddha,🔽one does not perform buddha activities in the desire realm.

original: sangs rgyas mdzad pa mi mdzad de; ;de dag stug po'i zhing gshegs nas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mdzad pa mi mdzad de; ;de dag stug po'i zhing gshegs nas //
translated: Having gone to the buddhafield of Tuṣhita,

original: sangs rgyas sprul pa bye ba yis //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sprul pa bye ba yis //
translated: with emanations of buddhas in the ten directions,

original: rtag tu rnal 'byor mnyam par bzhag /
analyzed: rtag tu rnal 'byor mnyam par bzhag /
translated: one always rests in equipoise in yoga.

original: sprul pa dag dang thabs gcig rol //
analyzed: sprul pa dag dang thabs gcig rol //
translated: One plays together with the emanations.

original: thams cad zhing du zla ba ltar //
analyzed: thams cad zhing du zla ba ltar //
translated: Like the moon in all the fields,

original: gang la gang gis dbang 'gyur pa //
analyzed: gang la gang gis dbang 'gyur pa //
translated: whatever is the power of whatever,

original: de la de ltar 'byung ba ste //
analyzed: de la de ltar 'byung ba ste //
translated: that arises in that way.

original: 'phrul pa'i sprul pa dag gis kyang //
analyzed: 'phrul pa'i sprul pa dag gis kyang //
translated: Even with emanated emanations,

original: sa bcu pa yi mdo mchog dang / sdong pos @27b brgyan dang dru ma yi //
analyzed: sa bcu pa yi mdo mchog dang / sdong pos @27b brgyan dang dru ma yi //
translated: The sutra of the trunk ornament, and the sutra of the seed,

original: gang yang rnam par sprul pa'i mdo //
analyzed: gang yang rnam par sprul pa'i mdo //
translated: And also the sutra of emanation,🔽The explanation of the garland of glory,

original: dpal gyi phreng ba la bshad dang // rnam par snang ba'i mdo sde dang / sgyu ma dpal las 'gro ba sogs //
analyzed: dpal gyi phreng ba la bshad dang // rnam par snang ba'i mdo sde dang / sgyu ma dpal las 'gro ba sogs //
translated: The sutra of Vairocana, and the sutra of the glory of illusion,

original: mdo sde rnam pa sna tshogs dag /
analyzed: mdo sde rnam pa sna tshogs dag /
translated: And various other sutras,

original: stug po'i rgyan nas rnam par 'byung //
analyzed: stug po'i rgyan nas rnam par 'byung //
translated: Arise from the Densely Arrayed.

original: stug po'i rgyan gyi mdo sde 'di //
analyzed: stug po'i rgyan gyi mdo sde 'di //
translated: This sutra of the Densely Arrayed

original: mdo sde kun las 'phags pa yin //
analyzed: mdo sde kun las 'phags pa yin //
translated: Is superior to all other sutras.

original: rgyal po 'di la rim grong yang //
analyzed: rgyal po 'di la rim grong yang //
translated: The king should honor it

original: rgyal po rnams dang bcas pas gyis //
analyzed: rgyal po rnams dang bcas pas gyis //
translated: Together with the other kings.🔽The formless realm, the desire realm, and the form realm,

original: gzugs med 'dod dang gzugs rnams dang // 'du shes med pa de bzhin te //🔽gnas las 'das te sangs rgyas dpang //
analyzed: gzugs med 'dod dang gzugs rnams dang // 'du shes med pa de bzhin te // gnas las 'das te sangs rgyas dpang //
translated: And likewise the realm of non-perception,🔽The Buddha, the witness,

original: bzhugs so stug po'i dkyil 'khor na //
analyzed: bzhugs so stug po'i dkyil 'khor na //
translated: Resides beyond the realms, in the mandala of the Densely Arrayed.

original: padmo 'dra ba'i gzhal med khang //
analyzed: padmo 'dra ba'i gzhal med khang //
translated: In the palace resembling a lotus,

original: gzugs mang rnam pa sna tshogs na //
analyzed: gzugs mang rnam pa sna tshogs na //
translated: In the many forms of various kinds,

original: lha rdzas smad kyi ye shes te //
analyzed: lha rdzas smad kyi ye shes te //
translated: The wisdom of divine substances,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam dag gis //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam dag gis //
translated: The pure one of the tathagatas,

original: rnam grol rnal 'byor can rnams dang // de na bcom ldan thabs gcig bzhugs //
analyzed: rnam grol rnal 'byor can rnams dang // de na bcom ldan thabs gcig bzhugs //
translated: The Blessed One is there, alone.

original: stug po'i dkyil bzhugs bsam gtan zhugs //
analyzed: stug po'i dkyil bzhugs bsam gtan zhugs //
translated: Abiding in the heart of the dense thicket, he is absorbed in concentration.

original: sangs rgyas sa mchog rnam bzhi la //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sa mchog rnam bzhi la //
translated: On the four supreme levels of buddhahood,

original: de na bzhugs shing gzugs 'dzin pa //
analyzed: de na bzhugs shing gzugs 'dzin pa //
translated: Abiding there, he perceives forms.

original: rnal 'byor mkhas pa nyid tshul gyis //
analyzed: rnal 'byor mkhas pa nyid tshul gyis //
translated: By the method of being skilled in yoga,

original: de yi mtha' ma mi gzigs pas //
analyzed: de yi mtha' ma mi gzigs pas //
translated: Not seeing an end to them,

original: gzugs rnams dang ni yul rnams kyi //
analyzed: gzugs rnams dang ni yul rnams kyi //
translated: The forms and objects,

original: thub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnams //
analyzed: thub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnams //
translated: The sages who are skilled in yoga,

original: gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyang //
analyzed: gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyang //
translated: The various aspects of forms,

original: stug po'i dkyil na rnam bzhugs shing //
analyzed: stug po'i dkyil na rnam bzhugs shing //
translated: Abiding in the heart of the dense thicket,

original: thams cad rnal 'byor @28a *//🔽can gyis bstan //
analyzed: thams cad rnal 'byor @28a *// can gyis bstan //
translated: All are taught by the yogins.

original: ba bla gser dang zla 'od tsampa ka /
analyzed: ba bla gser dang zla 'od tsampa ka /
translated: The color of the sky, gold, moonlight, campaka,

original: rma bya'i mgrin pa padmo 'dra //
analyzed: rma bya'i mgrin pa padmo 'dra //
translated: The throat of a peacock, like a lotus,

original: de yi sa la bzhugs pa'i lha //
analyzed: de yi sa la bzhugs pa'i lha //
translated: The gods who abide on that level

original: lha yi gzugs ni rnam par mdzes pa ste //
analyzed: lha yi gzugs ni rnam par mdzes pa ste //
translated: Have beautiful divine forms.

original: de gzugs lha rgyal go pa ka dag glog dang 'ol ma byu ru'i 'od bzhin du //
analyzed: de gzugs lha rgyal go pa ka dag glog dang 'ol ma byu ru'i 'od bzhin du //
translated: Their forms are like the king of gods Gopaka, lightning, a rainbow, and the light of coral.

original: la las bal chung sku dang na bza' lo ma rtsva la sogs pa'i mal bzhugs par; ;mthong ngo nyi ma stong ltar shin tu rnam par 'bar ba'i sku gzugs mnga' ba la //
analyzed: la las bal chung sku dang na bza' lo ma rtsva la sogs pa'i mal bzhugs par; ;mthong ngo nyi ma stong ltar shin tu rnam par 'bar ba'i sku gzugs mnga' ba la //
translated: while others see him with a body blazing like a thousand suns.

original: thub can la las rnal 'byor dbang la stug dbus chu skyes re rer bzhugs par mthong //
analyzed: thub can la las rnal 'byor dbang la stug dbus chu skyes re rer bzhugs par mthong //
translated: Some yogins see him sitting on a lotus in the middle of a thicket,

original: thub pa'i thor tshugs tshogs ni lag gis 'gro ba yi mgo bo klad pa bzhin du ste //
analyzed: thub pa'i thor tshugs tshogs ni lag gis 'gro ba yi mgo bo klad pa bzhin du ste //
translated: while others see him with a topknot held up by his hand, like the head of Brahmā.🔽Some see him with a body adorned with a crown studded with diamonds and sapphires,🔽while others see him with a body marked with the signs of a great being.

original: la lar gzugs ni rdo rje aanda rnyil gyis spras pa'i cod pan brgyan par ro //
analyzed: la lar gzugs ni rdo rje aanda rnyil gyis spras pa'i cod pan brgyan par ro //
translated: Some see him like a rainbow in the sky,🔽while others see him as a cloud in the sky.🔽Some see him as a wish-fulfilling tree,🔽while others see him as a wish-fulfilling jewel.🔽Some see him as a wish-granting cow,

original: la las la lar thub pa de la 'khor lo ri mo nya dung bcas par mthong //
analyzed: la las la lar thub pa de la 'khor lo ri mo nya dung bcas par mthong //
translated: while others see him as a wish-granting vase.🔽Some see him as a universal monarch,🔽while others see him as a cakravartin king.🔽Some see him as a great brahman,🔽while others see him as a great kṣatriya.🔽Some see him as a great vaiśya,🔽while others see him as a great śūdra.🔽Some see him as a great ascetic,🔽while others see him as a great householder.🔽Some see him as a great monk,🔽while others see him as a great brahmin.🔽Some see him as a great bodhisattva,🔽while others see him as a great pratyekabuddha.

original: la las ji ltar nam mkha'i rgyu pa'i lam la 'ja' zug bzhin du thub pa mthong //
analyzed: la las ji ltar nam mkha'i rgyu pa'i lam la 'ja' zug bzhin du thub pa mthong //
translated: Some see him as a great śrāvaka,🔽while others see him as a great buddha.🔽Some see him as a great god,🔽while others see him as a great nāga.🔽Some see him as a great yakṣa,

original: lha rdzas phyag sor can gyi sna tshogs yul can ri rab phyag tu rab gzhog cing //
analyzed: lha rdzas phyag sor can gyi sna tshogs yul can ri rab phyag tu rab gzhog cing //
translated: while others see him as a great gandharva.🔽Some see him as a great kumbhāṇḍa,🔽while others see him as a great piśāca.🔽Some see him as a great rākṣasa,🔽while others see him as a great kinnara.🔽Some see him as a great mahoraga,🔽while others see him as a great garuḍa.🔽Some see him as a great human,🔽while others see him as a great non-human.🔽Some see him as a great king of the asuras,🔽while others see him as a great king of the garuḍas.🔽Some see him as a great king of the kinn

original: khams gsum chu srin gnas dang chu gnas de bzhin ba lang mig par shong bar mdzad //
analyzed: khams gsum chu srin gnas dang chu gnas de bzhin ba lang mig par shong bar mdzad //
translated: The three realms are the abode of the sea monster, and the water-abode is like the eye of the ox.

original: sbyin pa'i shugs kyis mi yi bdag po'i gtsug gi cod pan rnams kyis rab mchod cing //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i shugs kyis mi yi bdag po'i gtsug gi cod pan rnams kyis rab mchod cing //
translated: By the power of giving, the crowns of the lords of men are well-worshipped.

original: la la dag na rgyal dang rgyal po'i 'khor na dgos pa rnams @28b na mkhas gyur cing //
analyzed: la la dag na rgyal dang rgyal po'i 'khor na dgos pa rnams @28b na mkhas gyur cing //
translated: In some places, the wise become necessary in the retinue of kings and kings.

original: chad pas gcod par snang ngo stug po'i dbus na gzhan du rnam par snang ba ni //
analyzed: chad pas gcod par snang ngo stug po'i dbus na gzhan du rnam par snang ba ni //
translated: In the midst of the thick appearance of punishment, the appearance elsewhere

original: thub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i ye shes rnal 'byor shin tu byed pa rnams la ste //
analyzed: thub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i ye shes rnal 'byor shin tu byed pa rnams la ste //
translated: Is for the yogis of the sages, the yogis of the wisdom of the wise, the very active ones.

original: rang gi yul rnams sngon gyi rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag rnal 'byor gyis ston cing //
analyzed: rang gi yul rnams sngon gyi rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag rnal 'byor gyis ston cing //
translated: The lands of their own are taught by the yogis, those taught by the previous victors.🔽Some have a very different abode, view, mind, and intellect,

original: la las gnas dang lta ba yid dang blo rnams shin tu gzhan du gyur pa dang // dbang dang ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs ting nge 'dzin dang yid bzhin sku mnga' bar //
analyzed: la las gnas dang lta ba yid dang blo rnams shin tu gzhan du gyur pa dang // dbang dang ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs ting nge 'dzin dang yid bzhin sku mnga' bar //
translated: And various powers and wisdoms, with a wish-fulfilling body of samadhi.

original: la las yul la chags med spyod yul rig pa'i blo yi bya ba gcod par te //🔽'di dang gzhan med sreg med gyur pas tshig bya med phyir mya ngan 'das par ro //
analyzed: la las yul la chags med spyod yul rig pa'i blo yi bya ba gcod par te // 'di dang gzhan med sreg med gyur pas tshig bya med phyir mya ngan 'das par ro //
translated: Some say that nirvana is the cessation of the activity of the mind that knows the sphere of objects, without attachment to objects.🔽Others say that nirvana is the absence of this world and the next, the absence of burning, because there is nothing to be burned.

original: snum dang 'od 'phro med pas ji ltar 'jig rten 'di na me bzhin shin tu mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: snum dang 'od 'phro med pas ji ltar 'jig rten 'di na me bzhin shin tu mya ngan 'das //
translated: Still others say that nirvana is like a fire that has gone out, because there is no more oil or flame.

original: la las pha rol phyin pa'i mchod sbyin mchod bcug mchod sbyin byed pa dag tu ste //
analyzed: la las pha rol phyin pa'i mchod sbyin mchod bcug mchod sbyin byed pa dag tu ste //
translated: Some say that nirvana is the performance of the sacrifice of the perfections, the performance of the sacrifice of worship.

original: sbyin dang mchod dang thub pa dag kyang rnam pa tshul bzhin mdzad pa shin tu mthong //
analyzed: sbyin dang mchod dang thub pa dag kyang rnam pa tshul bzhin mdzad pa shin tu mthong //
translated: They see the perfect performance of generosity, worship, and the perfections.

original: bde ba yod ces bya ba'i zhing mchog de na skyes bu yod pa de dag ni //
analyzed: bde ba yod ces bya ba'i zhing mchog de na skyes bu yod pa de dag ni //
translated: In the supreme realm called Sukhāvatī, those beings

original: mngal nas skyes pa ma yin bde bar 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can dag ste //
analyzed: mngal nas skyes pa ma yin bde bar 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can dag ste //
translated: are not born from a womb, but are born in a lotus, with a blissful body of light.

original: lha rdzas gser ltar 'bar ba zla ba lta bu'i lus 'chad rnal 'byor can gyi bdag /
analyzed: lha rdzas gser ltar 'bar ba zla ba lta bu'i lus 'chad rnal 'byor can gyi bdag /
translated: They are like divine gold, blazing like the moon, with bodies that are like the sky, with the light of the sun.

original: lha rdzas 'od bzang de dang gang yang mi na brnal 'byor can gyi dbang po'i yul //
analyzed: lha rdzas 'od bzang de dang gang yang mi na brnal 'byor can gyi dbang po'i yul //
translated: The objects of the senses of the yogis are not like those of the gods.

original: de dag brgya char mi phod rnal 'byor can gyi dbang pho @29a *//
analyzed: de dag brgya char mi phod rnal 'byor can gyi dbang pho @29a *//
translated: They are not even a hundredth part of the objects of the senses of the yogis.

original: dag gi de bde la //
analyzed: dag gi de bde la //
translated: The objects of the senses of the yogis are blissful.

original: gzhan du bdag cag nyid kyis bshams pa'i longs spyod pa yi zhing gi mi de dag /
analyzed: gzhan du bdag cag nyid kyis bshams pa'i longs spyod pa yi zhing gi mi de dag /
translated: In other realms, the beings who enjoy the enjoyments that we ourselves have created🔽are the bodhisattvas in the realm of Sukhāvatī, which has infinite light.

original: mtha' yas 'od kyi bde ba can na rgyal ba'i sras rnams lha rdzas 'od 'khor can //
analyzed: mtha' yas 'od kyi bde ba can na rgyal ba'i sras rnams lha rdzas 'od 'khor can //
translated: They are the sons of the victors, who have halos of light that are divine.🔽They are the lords of sages, the bulls among men, who enjoy the nectar of concentration,

original: rnal 'byor yang dag nyid mos thub dbang khyu mchog bsam gtan bdud rtsi myong byed dang // rnam pa tha dad sna tshogs rin po che dag yal ga dpyangs pa'i gnas tshal zhing //
analyzed: rnal 'byor yang dag nyid mos thub dbang khyu mchog bsam gtan bdud rtsi myong byed dang // rnam pa tha dad sna tshogs rin po che dag yal ga dpyangs pa'i gnas tshal zhing //
translated: and who have a realm that is a forest with branches hanging down, which are various kinds of jewels.

original: lha rdzas gser phye'i khams las bsags pa'i zhing gi mchog de shin tu rnam par mdzes //
analyzed: lha rdzas gser phye'i khams las bsags pa'i zhing gi mchog de shin tu rnam par mdzes //
translated: That supreme realm, which is made of the element of divine gold dust, is very beautiful.

original: gser dang rin chen sna tshogs me tog padmo de ni mchog tu rab tu brgyan //
analyzed: gser dang rin chen sna tshogs me tog padmo de ni mchog tu rab tu brgyan //
translated: It is supreme, and is adorned with gold and various kinds of jewels and lotuses.

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas zhing gi gter yin dpe med de kun mi yang padmo skyes //
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas zhing gi gter yin dpe med de kun mi yang padmo skyes //
translated: This is the treasure of the Buddha-field, incomparable, all-pervading, lotus-born.

original: thub pa de la dad cing bsam gtan mkhas la sangs rgyas la ni rab tu smos //
analyzed: thub pa de la dad cing bsam gtan mkhas la sangs rgyas la ni rab tu smos //
translated: Faithful to the Sage, skilled in meditation, he extols the Buddha.

original: bdag gi ston pa la ni bdag bstan yid can padmo dag las skye ba ste //
analyzed: bdag gi ston pa la ni bdag bstan yid can padmo dag las skye ba ste //
translated: “I am the disciple of the Teacher, born from the lotus of the mind,

original: sangs rgyas zhing gi mchog na gnas pa'i mi ni bzang po'i mtshan gyis kun nas brgyan //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhing gi mchog na gnas pa'i mi ni bzang po'i mtshan gyis kun nas brgyan //
translated: Dwelling in the supreme Buddha-field, a man adorned with auspicious marks.

original: dpe byad bzang po bcas pas rmad du 'bar ba'i lus can dpal gyi be'u dang bcas //
analyzed: dpe byad bzang po bcas pas rmad du 'bar ba'i lus can dpal gyi be'u dang bcas //
translated: With the minor marks, his body blazes wondrously, with the auspicious urna hair-tuft,

original: yod dang med pa'i rnam rtog rtog pa med pas dri med rdzub pa dag go //
analyzed: yod dang med pa'i rnam rtog rtog pa med pas dri med rdzub pa dag go //
translated: Free from the concepts of existence and nonexistence, stainless, pure.

original: de ltar na 'di dag rnam par bstan nas rdo rje khyu mchog mthe bo tsam du gyur //
analyzed: de ltar na 'di dag rnam par bstan nas rdo rje khyu mchog mthe bo tsam du gyur //
translated: Thus, having shown these, the Vajra Bull becomes the size of a thumb,

original: sro ma rdul phran shin tu phra ba'i skra yi brgyad cha'i @29b gzugs su'ang de bzhin gyur //
analyzed: sro ma rdul phran shin tu phra ba'i skra yi brgyad cha'i @29b gzugs su'ang de bzhin gyur //
translated: Or the size of a grain of dust, or an atom, or an eighth part of a hair-tip.

original: la lar b de gshegs rang rgyal nyan thos gzugs dang de bzhin sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang //
analyzed: la lar b de gshegs rang rgyal nyan thos gzugs dang de bzhin sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang //
translated: To some he shows the form of a pratyekabuddha or śrāvaka, and likewise various other forms.

original: gang dang gang la sems kyi spyod pa ji bzhin de 'dra'i gzugs kyi khyad par dag /
analyzed: gang dang gang la sems kyi spyod pa ji bzhin de 'dra'i gzugs kyi khyad par dag /
translated: In whatever form a being has a mind to approach, in that form the bodhisattva appears.

original: rnal 'byor mkhas pa rdo rje zhes byas mtshad med gzugs kyi yul dag rnam par spangs //
analyzed: rnal 'byor mkhas pa rdo rje zhes byas mtshad med gzugs kyi yul dag rnam par spangs //
translated: The skilled yogin, called Vajra, abandons the objects of formlessness and form.

original: de skad bshad nas yang smras pa /
analyzed: de skad bshad nas yang smras pa /
translated: Having explained thus, he further said:

original: sna tshogs gzugs cha rgyal ba'i sras //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs cha rgyal ba'i sras //
translated: “The various forms are the parts of the Victor’s sons.

original: sa rnams de bzhin dbang rnams dang // ma nyams mngon par shes pa dang // sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de ltar yid bzhin lus kyang ste //
analyzed: sa rnams de bzhin dbang rnams dang // ma nyams mngon par shes pa dang // sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de ltar yid bzhin lus kyang ste //
translated: The stages, the powers, the uncorrupted higher perceptions, the illusion-like samādhi, and likewise the wish-fulfilling body,

original: gzungs dang rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang // rnam thar tha dad yang dag rig /
analyzed: gzungs dang rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang // rnam thar tha dad yang dag rig /
translated: the dhāraṇīs, the bases of supernatural powers, and the correct discernments of the different liberations,

original: stobs dang 'jigs pa med pa dang // phung po khams rnams zag med pa //
analyzed: stobs dang 'jigs pa med pa dang // phung po khams rnams zag med pa //
translated: the strengths, the fearlessnesses, and the aggregates and elements without outflows—

original: 'di dag gzhan du gyur nas 'thob //
analyzed: 'di dag gzhan du gyur nas 'thob //
translated: these are attained through the transformation of others.

original: rtag pa'i sangs rgyas sa yang ngo //
analyzed: rtag pa'i sangs rgyas sa yang ngo //
translated: And also the stage of the eternal Buddha.

original: chos rnams lnga yi rang bzhin dang // rnam par shes pa brgyad rnams dang // bdag med gnyis po rab rtogs nas; ;gzhan du 'gyur ba 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: chos rnams lnga yi rang bzhin dang // rnam par shes pa brgyad rnams dang // bdag med gnyis po rab rtogs nas; ;gzhan du 'gyur ba 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: the transformation of the basis occurs.

original: yid bzhin lus ni bcu po dag /
analyzed: yid bzhin lus ni bcu po dag /
translated: The ten bodies of the wish-fulfilling jewel

original: sgyu ma dpa' bar 'gro bas bskor //
analyzed: sgyu ma dpa' bar 'gro bas bskor //
translated: are surrounded by the heroes of illusion.🔽The ten inexhaustible aspirations

original: mi zad smon lam bcu po dang // lam gyi rnams kyis shin tu sprul //
analyzed: mi zad smon lam bcu po dang // lam gyi rnams kyis shin tu sprul //
translated: are emanated by the path of yoga.

original: rmi lam me long gzugs brnyan nam //
analyzed: rmi lam me long gzugs brnyan nam //
translated: Like a dream, a reflection in a mirror,

original: chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong //
analyzed: chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong //
translated: or the moon in the water,

original: rnal 'byor lam la thub pa'i rnams //
analyzed: rnal 'byor lam la thub pa'i rnams //
translated: the sages on the path of yoga

original: sangs rgyas la zhugs pa dang // rgyal ba @30a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas la zhugs pa dang // rgyal ba @30a *//
translated: enter into buddhahood.

original: padmo'i gdan bzhugs pa //
analyzed: padmo'i gdan bzhugs pa //
translated: The Victorious Ones sit on lotus seats,

original: rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun du byas //🔽yod dang med pa phyogs bral pa //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun du byas // yod dang med pa phyogs bral pa //
translated: surrounded by the Victorious Ones’ heirs.🔽Free from the extremes of existence and nonexistence,

original: rdul phran rnam par 'jig rnams kyis //
analyzed: rdul phran rnam par 'jig rnams kyis //
translated: the atoms are destroyed.🔽The king of accomplished gandharvas

original: dri za grub pa'i rgyal po dang // lha yi gnas na 'khod pa'i tshogs //
analyzed: dri za grub pa'i rgyal po dang // lha yi gnas na 'khod pa'i tshogs //
translated: and the assembly dwelling in the celestial realms

original: ri rabs la 'dong rgyu zhing //
analyzed: ri rabs la 'dong rgyu zhing //
translated: travel to Mount Meru.

original: nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'dod spyod kyang //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'dod spyod kyang //
translated: Though they enjoy the celestial realm,

original: ji ltar snang bar ma gyur ba //
analyzed: ji ltar snang bar ma gyur ba //
translated: And do not appear as they are

original: de bzhin rgyal sras bcas pa'i rnams //
analyzed: de bzhin rgyal sras bcas pa'i rnams //
translated: The bodhisattvas and the buddhas

original: rnal 'byor med pas mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnal 'byor med pas mi mthong ngo //
translated: Are not seen by those without yoga.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dang ldan //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dang ldan //
translated: Endowed with various forms,

original: sa dang zhing rnams bye ba na //
analyzed: sa dang zhing rnams bye ba na //
translated: In millions of lands and fields,

original: rgyal ba mchod la mngon par mos //
analyzed: rgyal ba mchod la mngon par mos //
translated: They are dedicated to making offerings to the victors.

original: smon dbang la gnas pa'i rnams //
analyzed: smon dbang la gnas pa'i rnams //
translated: Those who abide in the power of aspiration

original: padmo'i khang par rab tu skye //
analyzed: padmo'i khang par rab tu skye //
translated: Are born in the palace of the lotus.

original: dbang dang bsam gtan sems pa dag /
analyzed: dbang dang bsam gtan sems pa dag /
translated: Those who contemplate the absorptions

original: zhing dang zhing du mya ngan 'da'//
analyzed: zhing dang zhing du mya ngan 'da'//
translated: Pass into nirvana in the fields.

original: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa ston //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa ston //
translated: They manifest from the samadhi

original: lhun gyis grub par thams cad du //
analyzed: lhun gyis grub par thams cad du //
translated: In all places, spontaneously.

original: chur byung zla ba 'dra bar te //
analyzed: chur byung zla ba 'dra bar te //
translated: Like the moon in the water,

original: nyi ma lta bur khyad med pa //
analyzed: nyi ma lta bur khyad med pa //
translated: Like the sun, without distinction,

original: snang ba sems can spyod yul du //
analyzed: snang ba sems can spyod yul du //
translated: The light in the realm of sentient beings

original: yang dag mtha' la mi reg par //
analyzed: yang dag mtha' la mi reg par //
translated: Does not touch the limit of reality.

original: ting nge 'dzin la rab tu ldog /🔽gru la gnas pa'i bud pa dag /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la rab tu ldog / gru la gnas pa'i bud pa dag /
translated: They turn back from samadhi.🔽Like a fire on a boat

original: gangs chen mtsho la 'gro ba bzhin //
analyzed: gangs chen mtsho la 'gro ba bzhin //
translated: Going to the great ocean,

original: gang du gru 'gro der rgyug ste //
analyzed: gang du gru 'gro der rgyug ste //
translated: Wherever the boat goes, there it goes.

original: dpag tshed shin tu mang bar yang //🔽thugs rjes nyon mongs dma' pa'i lus //
analyzed: dpag tshed shin tu mang bar yang // thugs rjes nyon mongs dma' pa'i lus //
translated: And are extremely numerous.🔽Through compassion, they see the bodies of those with low afflictions

original: sdug bsngal can gzigs de bzhin du //
analyzed: sdug bsngal can gzigs de bzhin du //
translated: And those who suffer, and likewise

original: de dag 'byung bar rab tu ston //🔽phyir ldog bdag med pa yang ste //
analyzed: de dag 'byung bar rab tu ston // phyir ldog bdag med pa yang ste //
translated: They teach them the means of emergence.🔽They also know the retrogressions and selflessnesses

original: 'jig pa dag @30b kyang rnam mkhyen nas //
analyzed: 'jig pa dag @30b kyang rnam mkhyen nas //
translated: And the destructions,

original: zad pa'i dus su mi gnas pa //🔽gzung dang 'dzin gyis 'phangs pa'i rnams //
analyzed: zad pa'i dus su mi gnas pa // gzung dang 'dzin gyis 'phangs pa'i rnams //
translated: And do not remain at the time of destruction.🔽Those who are projected by the apprehended and apprehender

original: gzung dang 'dzin la spyod pa'i rnams //
analyzed: gzung dang 'dzin la spyod pa'i rnams //
translated: And who engage in the apprehended and apprehender🔽Are generated by the apprehended and apprehender,

original: gzung dang 'dzin gyis bskyed pas na; ;mtshan ma'i gzhi med mtshan nyid med //
analyzed: gzung dang 'dzin gyis bskyed pas na; ;mtshan ma'i gzhi med mtshan nyid med //
translated: So they are without a basis and without characteristics.

original: 'khor ba'i rgyun gyis khyer ba'i rnams //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rgyun gyis khyer ba'i rnams //
translated: Those who are carried away by the stream of saṃsāra

original: yang dang yang zhing skye ba yin //
analyzed: yang dang yang zhing skye ba yin //
translated: Are born again and again.

original: bcags med mtsho yi gter gyur la //
analyzed: bcags med mtsho yi gter gyur la //
translated: The treasure of the unmoving ocean

original: gcig la gcig 'ju'i spre'u ltar yang //
analyzed: gcig la gcig 'ju'i spre'u ltar yang //
translated: Is like a monkey swinging from one to another,

original: byed pa gru la gnas kyis mthong //
analyzed: byed pa gru la gnas kyis mthong //
translated: But the doer sees it as resting on a boat.

original: 'ju ba'i gnas dang rten med par //
analyzed: 'ju ba'i gnas dang rten med par //
translated: Without a place of entry and support,

original: de bzhin rgyal ba rgyal sras rnams //
analyzed: de bzhin rgyal ba rgyal sras rnams //
translated: Likewise, the victors and their heirs

original: sred pas rnam par dkrugs pa yi; ;rnam rtog sdug bsngal gnas pa'i rnams //
analyzed: sred pas rnam par dkrugs pa yi; ;rnam rtog sdug bsngal gnas pa'i rnams //
translated: “Those who are disturbed by craving,🔽who dwell in the suffering of conceptualization,

original: sa yi gnas nas nyon mongs phyir //
analyzed: sa yi gnas nas nyon mongs phyir //
translated: are afflicted by the afflictions of the earth realm.🔽“They go forth and then return,

original: rab tu 'byung dang phyir ldog dang // sbyin dang mchod pa dag kyang 'byung //🔽'di 'dra rnal 'byor can gyis chos //
analyzed: rab tu 'byung dang phyir ldog dang // sbyin dang mchod pa dag kyang 'byung // 'di 'dra rnal 'byor can gyis chos //
translated: and they give and make offerings.🔽Such are the various Dharmas

original: rnam pa sna tshogs bsgom par gyis ////
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs bsgom par gyis ////
translated: that the yogis cultivate.

original: 'phags pa rgyan stug po //🔽bam po gnyis pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa rgyan stug po // bam po gnyis pa /
translated: The Noble Dense Ornament

original: kun tu bzang po mi yi bdag /
analyzed: kun tu bzang po mi yi bdag /
translated: Samantabhadra, lord of humans,

original: gzi brjid chen po sna tshogs gzugs //
analyzed: gzi brjid chen po sna tshogs gzugs //
translated: great splendor, various forms,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches //
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva

original: rdo rje'i snying po la smras pa //
analyzed: rdo rje'i snying po la smras pa //
translated: spoke to Vajra Heart:🔽“The lords of the agreeable abodes, the other gods,

original: mthun pa dag la dbang byed dang // lha gnas 'khod pa gzhan dag dang // rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang / gang yang stug po'i dkyil 'khor pa'i //
analyzed: mthun pa dag la dbang byed dang // lha gnas 'khod pa gzhan dag dang // rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang / gang yang stug po'i dkyil 'khor pa'i //
translated: the various jeweled palaces, and those in the maṇḍala of the dense🔽forest,

original: rgyal sras rnal 'byor ldan pa dag /🔽gang gis stug ces bya thos te //
analyzed: rgyal sras rnal 'byor ldan pa dag / gang gis stug ces bya thos te //
translated: the bodhisattvas endowed with yoga,🔽having heard what is called ‘dense,’

original: thos nas nan tan byed pa'i rnams @31a *//
analyzed: thos nas nan tan byed pa'i rnams @31a *//
translated: having heard, those who practice

original: gzhan du 'gyur la gzhol ba dag /
analyzed: gzhan du 'gyur la gzhol ba dag /
translated: They are intent on the transformation of others,

original: gzhan du 'gyur ba'i tshul thos shing //
analyzed: gzhan du 'gyur ba'i tshul thos shing //
translated: And they hear the way of the transformation of others.

original: ting 'dzin de yi tshul song ba //
analyzed: ting 'dzin de yi tshul song ba //
translated: They have entered the way of that meditative absorption,

original: stug par ring bor mi thogs 'gro //
analyzed: stug par ring bor mi thogs 'gro //
translated: And they will soon go to the thickets.

original: sangs rgyas yang dag 'gro la mos //
analyzed: sangs rgyas yang dag 'gro la mos //
translated: They are inspired by the Buddha’s true way,🔽And they hold the world, and hold its power,🔽And they are Mañjuśrī’s emanations,

original: 'gro ba 'dzin dang shugs 'dzin dang // 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul ba dang // mthu chen 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dzin dang shugs 'dzin dang // 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul ba dang // mthu chen 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang //
translated: And they are noble ones with great power, and lords of the world.

original: zla ba la sogs gzugs dbang rgyal //
analyzed: zla ba la sogs gzugs dbang rgyal //
translated: They are lords of forms such as the moon,🔽And they have very pure minds,

original: blo gros shin tu zhe ba dang // lte ba rdo rje rnal 'byor rig /
analyzed: blo gros shin tu zhe ba dang // lte ba rdo rje rnal 'byor rig /
translated: And they know the vajra yoga of the navel,🔽And they are the sky-dwelling bees.🔽They are Vajrapāṇis with great minds,

original: dru ma nam mkha'i bdag po dang // phyag na rdo rje blo chen dang // rnal 'byor can dang rgyal sras rnams //
analyzed: dru ma nam mkha'i bdag po dang // phyag na rdo rje blo chen dang // rnal 'byor can dang rgyal sras rnams //
translated: And they are yogis, and they are bodhisattvas.

original: gang yang bye ba'i zhing dag nas //
analyzed: gang yang bye ba'i zhing dag nas //
translated: And those who have come from ten million fields

original: chos mnyan phyir ni 'ongs pa'i rnams //
analyzed: chos mnyan phyir ni 'ongs pa'i rnams //
translated: To listen to the Dharma,

original: stug po'i rgyal la gzhol ba dag /
analyzed: stug po'i rgyal la gzhol ba dag /
translated: They are intent on the king of the thickets.

original: rgyal ba ma 'ongs mthong nas kyang //
analyzed: rgyal ba ma 'ongs mthong nas kyang //
translated: And they see the future victors,

original: khong nas snying rje snying brtse ste //
analyzed: khong nas snying rje snying brtse ste //
translated: And they are compassionate and kind.

original: rnal 'byor ldan can dbang po'i gtso //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ldan can dbang po'i gtso //
translated: “The chief of the senses, endowed with yoga,

original: sna tshogs gzugs la rab tu smras //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs la rab tu smras //
translated: spoke to the one of various forms:

original: rnal 'byor can gyi gtso la dris //
analyzed: rnal 'byor can gyi gtso la dris //
translated: ‘Ask the chief of the yogis,

original: 'jigs med rdo rje snying po la //
analyzed: 'jigs med rdo rje snying po la //
translated: the fearless Vajra Essence,🔽‘“The various jeweled houses

original: rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang // dbang sgyur khang pa bzang por yang //
analyzed: rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang // dbang sgyur khang pa bzang por yang //
translated: and the excellent houses of the powerful

original: ji ltar gang gis sna tshogs byas //
analyzed: ji ltar gang gis sna tshogs byas //
translated: are made by whom and how?

original: sna tshogs gzugs can khyod kyis smros //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs can khyod kyis smros //
translated: Tell me, you of various forms!

original: dngos po kun gyi sna tshogs nyid //
analyzed: dngos po kun gyi sna tshogs nyid //
translated: ‘“The various things of all entities

original: 'gro ba dag gi yang rab 'byung //🔽rdza la sogs pa'i dngos po dag /
analyzed: 'gro ba dag gi yang rab 'byung // rdza la sogs pa'i dngos po dag /
translated: are also produced in the world.🔽Things such as clay pots

original: ji ltar chu 'jim thal sbyar las //
analyzed: ji ltar chu 'jim thal sbyar las //
translated: are made from water, clay, and a potter.

original: las su bya ba thams cad bskyed //
analyzed: las su bya ba thams cad bskyed //
translated: All the things that are made

original: 'gro ba 'di @31b dag de bzhin byas //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'di @31b dag de bzhin byas //
translated: are produced in the same way in this world.

original: rnga dang pi wang sgra la sogs //
analyzed: rnga dang pi wang sgra la sogs //
translated: ‘“The sounds of drums, flutes, and so on

original: las su bskyed las dbyangs 'byin te //
analyzed: las su bskyed las dbyangs 'byin te //
translated: are produced from the action of making sounds.

original: de bzhin 'jig rten 'di yang ci //
analyzed: de bzhin 'jig rten 'di yang ci //
translated: In the same way, is this world

analyzed: rdza ma'i phyogs la yon tan bzhin //

analyzed: 'gro ba gang gi phyogs la gnas //

analyzed: yon @32a *// tan mi 'bral yon tan can //

analyzed: yon tan med dang yon tan gnas //

analyzed: ma yin phan tshun 'brel bas na //

original: yon tan tshogs su rnam par gnas //
analyzed: yon tan tshogs su rnam par gnas //

original: nor pa sna tshogs de bzhin du //
analyzed: nor pa sna tshogs de bzhin du //

analyzed: ga la'ang de bzhin gnas yin nam //

original: 'gro ba rnam pa sna tshogs rnams //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnam pa sna tshogs rnams //

original: sa rnams la ni gang snang ba //
analyzed: sa rnams la ni gang snang ba //

analyzed: 'on tam tshangs pas phyung ba'am //

analyzed: ser skya yis sam rang gis sam //

analyzed: rang bzhin gyis sam dbang pos sam //

original: dus dang phyogs kyis bskyed pa'am //
analyzed: dus dang phyogs kyis bskyed pa'am //

original: 'on tam ma rig sred pas sam //
analyzed: 'on tam ma rig sred pas sam //

analyzed: lha yi drang srong the tshom za //

analyzed: lha yi tshogs kyang de bzhin te; ;grub dang dri za'i rgyal po rnams //

analyzed: sa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor can //

analyzed: 'on tam 'di dag mig 'phrul lam //

original: 'gro ba dri za 'dra zhig gam //
analyzed: 'gro ba dri za 'dra zhig gam //

analyzed: rmi lam yin nam smig rgyu'am //

analyzed: sngon med rnam par rtog yin nam // gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por yang //

original: kha gnyis sprul bzhin gnas pa'am //
analyzed: kha gnyis sprul bzhin gnas pa'am //

original: 'on tam rang bzhin 'di med dam //🔽'khrul 'khor ro langs bzhin gnas sam //
analyzed: 'on tam rang bzhin 'di med dam // 'khrul 'khor ro langs bzhin gnas sam //

original: mgal pa bskor ba 'dra ba'am //
analyzed: mgal pa bskor ba 'dra ba'am //

original: 'on tam skra'i tshogs lta bu'am //
analyzed: 'on tam skra'i tshogs lta bu'am //

original: byed dang las kyis ma byas shing //
analyzed: byed dang las kyis ma byas shing //

original: dbang po @32b ku be ras ma byas //
analyzed: dbang po @32b ku be ras ma byas //

analyzed: mchod sbyin sbyin sreg mchod 'bras sam //

analyzed: smrang gi gzhung gi lam gyis sam //

original: rgyu rnams shin tu phal che bas //
analyzed: rgyu rnams shin tu phal che bas //

original: nan tan rtag pa ma yin te //
analyzed: nan tan rtag pa ma yin te //

original: 'gro ba 'dzin pa med pa'ang min //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dzin pa med pa'ang min //

original: rgyu rnams kyi yang rgyu dag ste //
analyzed: rgyu rnams kyi yang rgyu dag ste //

original: 'gro ba ngo bo nyid kyis grub //
analyzed: 'gro ba ngo bo nyid kyis grub //
translated: The world is established by its own nature.

original: las kyi bag chags rnams las byung //
analyzed: las kyi bag chags rnams las byung //

original: rnam shes brgyad po'i skyes bu ni //
analyzed: rnam shes brgyad po'i skyes bu ni //
translated: The person of the eight consciousnesses

original: kun gzhi zhes kyang bya ba ste //
analyzed: kun gzhi zhes kyang bya ba ste //

original: des ni sna tshogs 'di dag kun //
analyzed: des ni sna tshogs 'di dag kun //

analyzed: rdza ma'i 'khrul 'khor bzhin du bskor // til bkrum til mar ji bzhin du //
translated: Like a potter’s wheel.🔽Just as sesame seeds are produced from sesame seeds,

original: lan tshva'i tsha bro ji lta bar //
analyzed: lan tshva'i tsha bro ji lta bar //

original: gzugs la mi rtag nyid ji bzhin //
analyzed: gzugs la mi rtag nyid ji bzhin //

original: skyes bu 'di yang de bzhin gnas //
analyzed: skyes bu 'di yang de bzhin gnas //

original: ji ltar bsung la sogs las dri //
analyzed: ji ltar bsung la sogs las dri //

original: yon tan rnams la yon tan mtshan //
analyzed: yon tan rnams la yon tan mtshan //

original: nyi zla gnyis kyi 'od zer bzhin //
analyzed: nyi zla gnyis kyi 'od zer bzhin //

original: de ltar skyes bu gnas pa yin //
analyzed: de ltar skyes bu gnas pa yin //

original: dgos dang byed pa med pa ste //
analyzed: dgos dang byed pa med pa ste //

original: yod dang med kyi phyogs kyis spangs //
analyzed: yod dang med kyi phyogs kyis spangs //

original: gcig dang tha dad med pa ste //
analyzed: gcig dang tha dad med pa ste //

original: mur 'dug phyogs kyis rnam par spangs //
analyzed: mur 'dug phyogs kyis rnam par spangs //

original: rjes su 'gro ba'i shes pa med //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba'i shes pa med //

original: nam yang rnam par mi brtag ste //
analyzed: nam yang rnam par mi brtag ste //

original: grol ba'i so so rang rig pa //
analyzed: grol ba'i so so rang rig pa //

original: sangs rgyas sar skyes thub can gyi //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sar skyes thub can gyi //

original: gzung dang 'dzin pa med pa ste //
analyzed: gzung dang 'dzin pa med pa ste //

original: snga med sems dang sems byung gis //
analyzed: snga med sems dang sems byung gis //

original: rnam shes brgyad dang bral ba ste //
analyzed: rnam shes brgyad dang bral ba ste //

original: nam yang rnam par mi brtag pa'o //
analyzed: nam yang rnam par mi brtag pa'o //
translated: It is never conceptualized.

analyzed: de la gnas pa chu rlabs bzhin // phan tshun mtshan @33a *//

original: nyid tha mi dad //
analyzed: nyid tha mi dad //

original: 'byung zhing phyir yang ldog pa ste //
analyzed: 'byung zhing phyir yang ldog pa ste //

original: de yi ldan pa rig pa min //
analyzed: de yi ldan pa rig pa min //

analyzed: ji ltar thub pa'i rnal 'byor dang // rdzu 'phrul can gyi rdzu 'phrul bzhin; ;mnyam par bzhag pas rab tu mthong //

original: rnal 'byor 'gro ba gzhan gyis min //
analyzed: rnal 'byor 'gro ba gzhan gyis min //

original: de bzhin 'jug pa'i rnam shes rnams //
analyzed: de bzhin 'jug pa'i rnam shes rnams //
translated: In the same way, the engaging consciousnesses

original: de dag kun gzhi lhan cig gnas //
analyzed: de dag kun gzhi lhan cig gnas //

original: rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong //
analyzed: rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong //

original: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras de bzhin //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras de bzhin //

original: des ni 'di dag thams cad kyang //🔽ji ltar nor bu phug pa rnams //
analyzed: des ni 'di dag thams cad kyang // ji ltar nor bu phug pa rnams //
translated: In this way, all of these🔽Are like a string of pearls

analyzed: skud la brgyus dang 'khor lo bzhin //

original: las kyi rlung gis skor byed pa //
analyzed: las kyi rlung gis skor byed pa //

analyzed: ji ltar rdza mkhan 'khor lo dang // lag dang thal sbyor bskor ba yis //

analyzed: kun tu bskor cing snod byed pa //

original: yon tan sna tshogs rnam par ldan //
analyzed: yon tan sna tshogs rnam par ldan //

original: de bzhin rnam shes brgyad kyi mi //
analyzed: de bzhin rnam shes brgyad kyi mi //

original: khams kyi gzugs brnyan lhan cig tu //
analyzed: khams kyi gzugs brnyan lhan cig tu //

original: sa ni rnam par byed pa ste //
analyzed: sa ni rnam par byed pa ste //

analyzed: phyi nang rgyu ba'i 'gro ba rnams //

analyzed: gang la 'jig rten 'di dag kun //

analyzed: nam mkha' skar tshogs ji bzhin du //

original: gnas shing rnam pa sna tshogs gnas //
analyzed: gnas shing rnam pa sna tshogs gnas //

analyzed: rlung gi rta yis shin tu bskor //

analyzed: ji ltar mkha' la bya rnams kyi; ;rjes ni snang ba ma yin te //

original: bar snang yod pa ma yin na'ang //
analyzed: bar snang yod pa ma yin na'ang //

analyzed: bya rnams rgyu ba'i byed pa med //

original: de bzhin rnam par shes pa'i mi //
analyzed: de bzhin rnam par shes pa'i mi //

original: bdag yod ma yin gzhan med min //
analyzed: bdag yod ma yin gzhan med min //

analyzed: @33b rnam dag par snang 'dra ba dang // dpa' rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung //

original: bag chags rnam pa'i nyes pa yis //
analyzed: bag chags rnam pa'i nyes pa yis //
translated: Due to the fault of the various latent tendencies,

analyzed: mi chags padmo'i zla ba bzhin //

original: padmo la ni chu med min //
analyzed: padmo la ni chu med min //

original: chu la zla gzugs med pa yang //
analyzed: chu la zla gzugs med pa yang //

original: chu song zla ba yod pa ste //
analyzed: chu song zla ba yod pa ste //

original: padmo'i 'dab la de bzhin chu //
analyzed: padmo'i 'dab la de bzhin chu //
translated: and likewise, water on the petals of a lotus.

analyzed: mig la bud med gzhon nu dag /

original: mig gis mthong ba jir mi 'gyur //
analyzed: mig gis mthong ba jir mi 'gyur //
translated: are not seen by the eyes.

original: de bzhin kun gzhi rnam par shes //
analyzed: de bzhin kun gzhi rnam par shes //
translated: In the same way, the consciousness of the foundation

original: las rnams cig car byed pa ste //
analyzed: las rnams cig car byed pa ste //
translated: simultaneously performs all actions.

original: 'gro ba dag gi lus la ni //
analyzed: 'gro ba dag gi lus la ni //

original: khyab gnas sa bon kun can no //
analyzed: khyab gnas sa bon kun can no //

original: stug po'i sprin dang 'dra bar yang //
analyzed: stug po'i sprin dang 'dra bar yang //

original: sa rnams yog par shin tu gnas //
analyzed: sa rnams yog par shin tu gnas //
translated: And the levels are completely filled.

original: tshe dang rnam shes kun nas yog /
analyzed: tshe dang rnam shes kun nas yog /

original: drod kyang de bzhin stobs chen gyis //
analyzed: drod kyang de bzhin stobs chen gyis //

original: sna tshogs gzugs kyi lus can gyi //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs kyi lus can gyi //

original: rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs kyang ston //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs kyang ston //

original: rdza mkhan ji ltar sa snod la //
analyzed: rdza mkhan ji ltar sa snod la //

original: spyod pa ji bzhin de lta'o //
analyzed: spyod pa ji bzhin de lta'o //

original: ba lang sogs pa'i rva mthong zhing //
analyzed: ba lang sogs pa'i rva mthong zhing //

original: bong bu rva ni med pa ste //
analyzed: bong bu rva ni med pa ste //

original: ma mthong bar ni med pa med //
analyzed: ma mthong bar ni med pa med //

original: ba lang rva yi med pa yang //🔽phyin ci log tu dmigs pas med //
analyzed: ba lang rva yi med pa yang // phyin ci log tu dmigs pas med //
translated: The non-existence of a cow's horns🔽Is non-existent due to mistaken perception.

original: phyin ci log tu mnar sems la //
analyzed: phyin ci log tu mnar sems la //
translated: In mistaken hostility,

original: shin tu phra ba'i rdul gshig na //
analyzed: shin tu phra ba'i rdul gshig na //
translated: When the extremely subtle particles are destroyed,

original: yod pa de dag med par 'gro //
analyzed: yod pa de dag med par 'gro //

original: med pa yod pa'i rgyu las te //🔽med pa yod ces rtog pa ni //
analyzed: med pa yod pa'i rgyu las te // med pa yod ces rtog pa ni //
translated: Non-existence is from the cause of existence.🔽The conception of non-existence as existence

original: yod pa med las bltos pa ste //
analyzed: yod pa med las bltos pa ste //
translated: Depends on the non-existence of existence.

original: phan tshun ltos pa'i rgyu las so //
analyzed: phan tshun ltos pa'i rgyu las so //
translated: From the cause of mutual dependence,

original: blo dang rtogs bya med pa ste //
analyzed: blo dang rtogs bya med pa ste //
translated: There is no mind and object of understanding.

original: khong du chud pa skye @34a *//
analyzed: khong du chud pa skye @34a *//
translated: The realization arises.

original: med // mgal ba'i 'khor lo 'khor lo min //
analyzed: med // mgal ba'i 'khor lo 'khor lo min //
