original: ji ltar skra tshogs mthong ba bzhin //
analyzed: ji ltar skra tshogs mthong ba bzhin //
translated: Just as one sees a mass of hair.

original: dri za'i grong khyer sgyu ma dag /
analyzed: dri za'i grong khyer sgyu ma dag /
translated: Like a magical gandharva city,

original: ci zhig mthong nas 'byung ba bzhin //🔽blo yi 'byung ba rgyu med par //
analyzed: ci zhig mthong nas 'byung ba bzhin // blo yi 'byung ba rgyu med par //
translated: What is seen?🔽The elements of the mind do not exist without a cause.

original: yod pa ma yin rnam rtog pa //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin rnam rtog pa //
translated: The imagination

original: rtog bya rnam par rtog pas bskyed //
analyzed: rtog bya rnam par rtog pas bskyed //
translated: Is produced by the imagination of the object of imagination.

original: lus can rnams kyi yid skyes te //
analyzed: lus can rnams kyi yid skyes te //
translated: The mind of embodied beings arises

original: ming dang 'du shes 'brel ba dang // rang bzhin gnyis kyi bag chags kyi //
analyzed: ming dang 'du shes 'brel ba dang // rang bzhin gnyis kyi bag chags kyi //
translated: In connection with name and conception,

original: mi yi sems ni rab tu 'byung //
analyzed: mi yi sems ni rab tu 'byung //
translated: And the human mind arises🔽From the latent tendencies of the two natures.

original: grub pa'i don ni mi skye'o //
analyzed: grub pa'i don ni mi skye'o //
translated: The accomplished object does not arise.

original: thog ma med pa'i dus na bsags //
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i dus na bsags //
translated: Accumulated since beginningless time,

original: gnas ngan len gyi yul las byung //
analyzed: gnas ngan len gyi yul las byung //
translated: Arising from the domain of negative tendencies,

original: rab tu spros pas bsgos yid las //
analyzed: rab tu spros pas bsgos yid las //
translated: The mind, thoroughly tainted by conceptual proliferation,🔽Gives rise to the collection of consciousnesses.

original: sems kyi tshogs ni 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sems kyi tshogs ni 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: The human mind arises

original: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por yang //🔽kun tu skye ba mi yi sems //
analyzed: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por yang // kun tu skye ba mi yi sems //
translated: In the form of the apprehended and the apprehender.

original: rdza la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi dbyibs //
analyzed: rdza la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi dbyibs //
translated: The shapes of forms such as clay

original: snang ba gzhan yod ma yin te //
analyzed: snang ba gzhan yod ma yin te //
translated: Do not exist as other appearances.

original: 'di dag thams cad blo tsam pas //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad blo tsam pas //
translated: All of these are mere mind.

original: rtogs bya'i dngos po yod pa min //
analyzed: rtogs bya'i dngos po yod pa min //
translated: The things to be realized do not exist.

original: blo dang rtogs bya'i dngos por ni //
analyzed: blo dang rtogs bya'i dngos por ni //
translated: The mind and the things to be realized

original: bdag nyid rab tu 'jug pa ste //🔽byis pa rnams kyis mi rigs pa //
analyzed: bdag nyid rab tu 'jug pa ste // byis pa rnams kyis mi rigs pa //
translated: are what engage with the self.🔽The childish, who are insane due to traces,

original: bag chags rnams kyis sems myos rnams //
analyzed: bag chags rnams kyis sems myos rnams //
translated: do not understand this.🔽The eight and the seven

original: rnam pa brgyad dang rnam bdun dang // dus gcig tu yang 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rnam pa brgyad dang rnam bdun dang // dus gcig tu yang 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: occur simultaneously.

original: sngon med bag chags ldan pas na //
analyzed: sngon med bag chags ldan pas na //
translated: Since there are no traces prior to it,

original: kun gzhi sa bon thams cad can //
analyzed: kun gzhi sa bon thams cad can //
translated: the all-base has all the seeds.

original: rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs ji bzhin du //
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs ji bzhin du //
translated: Like waves in the ocean,

original: @34b rlung gi rkyen gyis bskyod pa ltar //
analyzed: @34b rlung gi rkyen gyis bskyod pa ltar //
translated: it is moved by the conditions of the winds.

original: gar byed cing ni rab tu 'byung //
analyzed: gar byed cing ni rab tu 'byung //
translated: It arises and dances

original: rnam par rgyun kyang mi 'chad do //
analyzed: rnam par rgyun kyang mi 'chad do //
translated: without interruption.

original: blo yi 'od pa de bzhin rtag /
analyzed: blo yi 'od pa de bzhin rtag /
translated: The light of the mind is likewise constant.

original: yul dang reg pas bskul ba'i phyir //
analyzed: yul dang reg pas bskul ba'i phyir //
translated: Since it is activated by objects and contact,

original: sna tshogs bdag rtog rnam shes kyis //
analyzed: sna tshogs bdag rtog rnam shes kyis //
translated: the consciousness that conceives of a self

original: bdag la bdag gir 'dzin par byed //
analyzed: bdag la bdag gir 'dzin par byed //
translated: grasps the self as mine.

original: ji ltar sa la rnam rtog med //
analyzed: ji ltar sa la rnam rtog med //
translated: Just as earth has no concepts,

original: 'gyur med rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs //
analyzed: 'gyur med rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs //
translated: it is unchanging and has various forms.

original: dgos pa'i rnam par gyur pa ni; ;de 'dra kun gzhi rnam shes la'o //
analyzed: dgos pa'i rnam par gyur pa ni; ;de 'dra kun gzhi rnam shes la'o //
translated: is like that of the foundation consciousness.

original: ji ltar mi zhig lag pa yis //
analyzed: ji ltar mi zhig lag pa yis //
translated: Just as a person with a hand🔽touches his own body,

original: rang gi lus la mnyed pa dang // phyogs kyi glang po bdag lus la //
analyzed: rang gi lus la mnyed pa dang // phyogs kyi glang po bdag lus la //
translated: or as Airāvaṇa with his trunk🔽sprays water on his body,

original: bdag gis sna yis chu 'thor dang; ;ji ltar shed can la la dag /
analyzed: bdag gis sna yis chu 'thor dang; ;ji ltar shed can la la dag /
translated: just as someone with a goiter

original: bdag gi lus la sos 'debs pa //
analyzed: bdag gi lus la sos 'debs pa //
translated: touches his own body with his hand,

original: de bzhin blo ni brtags don la //
analyzed: de bzhin blo ni brtags don la //
translated: in the same way, the mind engages

original: don gnyis tshul du 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: don gnyis tshul du 'jug pa'o //
translated: in the two modes of object.

original: blo yi yul du bya ba 'di //
analyzed: blo yi yul du bya ba 'di //
translated: This object of the mind

original: khams gsum rnam par khyab par gnas //
analyzed: khams gsum rnam par khyab par gnas //
translated: exists pervading the three realms.🔽The wise yogin sees

original: phyi dang nang gi bya bar yang //🔽rnal 'byor mkhas pas mthong ba yin //
analyzed: phyi dang nang gi bya bar yang // rnal 'byor mkhas pas mthong ba yin //
translated: both the outer and inner.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di kun gzigs //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di kun gzigs //
translated: The buddhas see all this

original: sa la ji snyed snang ba dag /
analyzed: sa la ji snyed snang ba dag /
translated: as it appears on the earth.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs dbyibs kyi gzugs //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs dbyibs kyi gzugs //
translated: The various forms of shape

original: sa la rnam pa sna tshogs so //
analyzed: sa la rnam pa sna tshogs so //
translated: are various on the earth.🔽This Dharma is explained correctly,

original: chos 'di yang dag bshad pa dang // rdo rje snying po 'jigs med pa //
analyzed: chos 'di yang dag bshad pa dang // rdo rje snying po 'jigs med pa //
translated: and the fearless vajra essence

original: mi smra'i dngos la dag rgyur te //
analyzed: mi smra'i dngos la dag rgyur te //
translated: is the cause of purity in the state of silence.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab chos dbyings kyi //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab chos dbyings kyi //
translated: The inconceivable realm of phenomena,

original: lha yi bsam gtan mi g-yo ba //
analyzed: lha yi bsam gtan mi g-yo ba //
translated: The unshakable concentration of the gods,

original: sangs rgyas spyod yul zhugs pa dang // stug po nas ni 'ongs pa'i @35a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas spyod yul zhugs pa dang // stug po nas ni 'ongs pa'i @35a *//
translated: Having entered the sphere of activity of the buddhas,🔽The form that has come from the Dense Array,

original: gzugs // mthong nas rnal 'byor lam gnas pa //
analyzed: gzugs // mthong nas rnal 'byor lam gnas pa //
translated: Having seen it, abiding on the path of yoga,

original: thub pa de yi lha rdzas lus //
analyzed: thub pa de yi lha rdzas lus //
translated: The divine body of that Sage,

original: rnal 'byor btang ste yang gnas so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor btang ste yang gnas so //
translated: Abandoning yoga, again abides.🔽The realms of desire, form, and formlessness,

original: 'dod dang gzug dang gzugs med dang // 'du shes med pa'i gnas rnams kyi //
analyzed: 'dod dang gzug dang gzugs med dang // 'du shes med pa'i gnas rnams kyi //
translated: And the state of non-perception,

original: mun pa'i tshogs nas phyir byung ste //
analyzed: mun pa'i tshogs nas phyir byung ste //
translated: Having emerged from the mass of darkness,

original: stug po de nas 'dir 'ongs so //
analyzed: stug po de nas 'dir 'ongs so //
translated: From the Dense Array, it has come here.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi bzhugs pa'i gnas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi bzhugs pa'i gnas //
translated: The abode of the buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas zhing ni mchog rab nas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhing ni mchog rab nas //
translated: From the supreme buddha field,

original: gzugs kyi rnam pa du ma yi //
analyzed: gzugs kyi rnam pa du ma yi //
translated: The various aspects of form,

original: sangs rgyas sku yang rnam byung nas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sku yang rnam byung nas //
translated: The buddha body also arises,

original: mi yi khams na rnam par 'phrul //
analyzed: mi yi khams na rnam par 'phrul //
translated: Emanating in the human realm.

original: su blo ci 'dod phan par ro //
analyzed: su blo ci 'dod phan par ro //
translated: For whomsoever, whatever is beneficial,

original: stug po yi ni ming phyung nas //
analyzed: stug po yi ni ming phyung nas //
translated: Having extracted the name of the Dense Array,

original: rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad kyang //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad kyang //
translated: All the sons of the Victorious Ones,

original: phan tshun gcig la gcig bltas te //
analyzed: phan tshun gcig la gcig bltas te //
translated: They looked at each other

original: gcig la gcig ni rab smras pa //
analyzed: gcig la gcig ni rab smras pa //
translated: And said to each other:

original: stug po dri med bsod nams te //
analyzed: stug po dri med bsod nams te //
translated: “This is the dense, stainless merit,

original: sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed //
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed //
translated: Which destroys all evil.

original: rnal 'byor can gyi gnas kyi mchog /
analyzed: rnal 'byor can gyi gnas kyi mchog /
translated: The supreme abode of the yogis,

original: sangs rgyas zhing gi dam pa phul //🔽yu bus de yi sgra thos te //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhing gi dam pa phul // yu bus de yi sgra thos te //
translated: The best of the buddha-fields,🔽The father and mother heard that sound,

original: thos nas bdag cag dga' ba'i yid //🔽stug po rnal 'byor can gnas kyi //
analyzed: thos nas bdag cag dga' ba'i yid // stug po rnal 'byor can gnas kyi //
translated: And having heard, they were delighted.🔽“We will attain the abode of the dense yogis,

original: brtan lam bdag cag thob par bya /
analyzed: brtan lam bdag cag thob par bya /
translated: The path of the steadfast.”

original: 'og min tshangs pa thor tshugs can //
analyzed: 'og min tshangs pa thor tshugs can //
translated: The Akaniṣṭhas, Brahmās, and Śikhin,

original: gtsang ma'i gnas kyis rnam spangs pa //
analyzed: gtsang ma'i gnas kyis rnam spangs pa //
translated: Having abandoned the pure abodes,🔽The wonders and spectacles of the field,

original: zhing gi ngo mtshar ltad mo dang // sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i sras kyi yab //
analyzed: zhing gi ngo mtshar ltad mo dang // sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i sras kyi yab //
translated: The father of the Victorious One’s sons,

original: tshangs pas de tshe gsol nas su //
analyzed: tshangs pas de tshe gsol nas su //
translated: Brahmā, having made this request,

original: gtsang ma'i @35b gnas kyi 'jigs med rnams //
analyzed: gtsang ma'i @35b gnas kyi 'jigs med rnams //
translated: The fearless ones in the pure abodes

original: de dag thams cad sems pa ni //
analyzed: de dag thams cad sems pa ni //
translated: All thought,

original: tshangs pa stug por 'gro mi 'gro //
analyzed: tshangs pa stug por 'gro mi 'gro //
translated: “Will Brahmā go to the dense one or not?”

original: tshangs pa rnal 'byor chen po can //
analyzed: tshangs pa rnal 'byor chen po can //
translated: Brahmā, the great yogi,

original: mun pas de dag bslad par gyur; ;thub pa mi shes thub rig gi /
analyzed: mun pas de dag bslad par gyur; ;thub pa mi shes thub rig gi /
translated: How can the Sage, who knows what is to be known,

original: ji ltar gnas ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: ji ltar gnas ni thob par 'gyur //
translated: attain a state of abiding?

original: tshangs pa de na kun tu sems //
analyzed: tshangs pa de na kun tu sems //
translated: Brahmā, in that case, thinks

original: blo yis tshangs par rig pa'i mchog /
analyzed: blo yis tshangs par rig pa'i mchog /
translated: that the mind is the supreme knower of Brahmā.

original: 'dod dang gzugs kyi bdag po dag /
analyzed: 'dod dang gzugs kyi bdag po dag /
translated: The lords of the desire and form realms

original: rgyu ba de na med pa ste //🔽nam mkha' khang pa gnas rnams dang / 'du shes med pa de bzhin te //
analyzed: rgyu ba de na med pa ste // nam mkha' khang pa gnas rnams dang / 'du shes med pa de bzhin te //
translated: do not exist there.

original: mur 'dug gzhan la grags pa yi //
analyzed: mur 'dug gzhan la grags pa yi //
translated: Space, the abode of the celestial palaces, and the state of non-perception are like that.

original: rnal 'byor can rnams der mi 'gro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor can rnams der mi 'gro //
translated: The yogis do not go there,🔽which is renowned to others as the summit.

original: bdag gis bya ba byas sam ci //
analyzed: bdag gis bya ba byas sam ci //
translated: Have I done what needed to be done?

original: bsams te 'dir yang 'ongs par gyur //
analyzed: bsams te 'dir yang 'ongs par gyur //
translated: Thinking thus, I have come here.

original: bdag 'gro'ang brtan zhing rtag pa yi //
analyzed: bdag 'gro'ang brtan zhing rtag pa yi //
translated: If I go, it is to the stable and permanent,🔽the solid and unconditioned.

original: ther zug 'dus ma byas stug tu; ;gal te yang na thub pa de //
analyzed: ther zug 'dus ma byas stug tu; ;gal te yang na thub pa de //
translated: Or perhaps the Sage,

original: rnal 'byor mnga' ba lha'i yang lha'i //🔽mthu yis rnal 'byor mkhyen rnams kyi //
analyzed: rnal 'byor mnga' ba lha'i yang lha'i // mthu yis rnal 'byor mkhyen rnams kyi //
translated: the lord of yogis, the god of gods,🔽by the power of yoga,

original: pho brang stug po der 'gro'am //
analyzed: pho brang stug po der 'gro'am //
translated: will go to that solid palace of the knowers of yoga.

original: thub pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: thub pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to that Sage!

original: de skad smras nas thor tshugs can //
analyzed: de skad smras nas thor tshugs can //
translated: Having said this, Jaṭila

original: mthong ba shin tu 'bar ba yi //
analyzed: mthong ba shin tu 'bar ba yi //
translated: The buddhas who dwell on the path of seeing,

original: sangs rgyas lam na bzhugs pa rnams //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lam na bzhugs pa rnams //
translated: who are blazing with splendor,

original: gsungs shig gsungs shig thub pa'i rnams //
analyzed: gsungs shig gsungs shig thub pa'i rnams //
translated: “Please speak, please speak, O sages!

original: khyed la rtsi 'tshal ci gyis shig /
analyzed: khyed la rtsi 'tshal ci gyis shig /
translated: What can we do to please you?

original: sangs rgyas dbang po bka' stsal gsol //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dbang po bka' stsal gsol //
translated: Please tell us, O lord of the buddhas,

original: stug po ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: stug po ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur //
translated: how to attain the dense array.

original: gzugs yul 'di las phyir log gcig @36a *//
analyzed: gzugs yul 'di las phyir log gcig @36a *//
translated: “ ‘Turn away from this realm of form!

original: der 'gro med pa gzugs can rnams //
analyzed: der 'gro med pa gzugs can rnams //
translated: Those who go there are not embodied beings.

original: stug po de ni thub chen yul //
analyzed: stug po de ni thub chen yul //
translated: That dense array is the realm of the great sages,

original: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas zhing //🔽'du shes med pas mi 'thob ste; ;de bzhin 'dod pa'i khams dbang gi /🔽mur 'dug gzhan na grags pas kyang //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas zhing // 'du shes med pas mi 'thob ste; ;de bzhin 'dod pa'i khams dbang gi / mur 'dug gzhan na grags pas kyang //
translated: the unsurpassed buddhafield.🔽“ ‘It is not attained by those without perception,🔽nor by those who are attached to the desire realm,

original: rnal 'byor rig lam stug mi 'thob //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rig lam stug mi 'thob //
translated: nor by those who are known as extremists.

original: tshangs pa nyid kyis de gsung thos //
analyzed: tshangs pa nyid kyis de gsung thos //
translated: “ ‘Brahmā heard that statement

original: mchod sbyin gsol ba'i zhal na ste //
analyzed: mchod sbyin gsol ba'i zhal na ste //
translated: and replied, “I will perform a sacrifice.”

original: de ni de nas phyir log ste //
analyzed: de ni de nas phyir log ste //
translated: Then he turned back

original: tshangs pa'i gnas su yang song ngo //🔽de yi phyir na der 'gro ba //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i gnas su yang song ngo // de yi phyir na der 'gro ba //
translated: and returned to the realm of Brahmā.🔽“ ‘Therefore, even Brahmā himself

original: tshangs pa yis kyang mi thob pas //
analyzed: tshangs pa yis kyang mi thob pas //
translated: cannot attain that realm.

original: gzugs med 'dod dang gzugs can rnams //
analyzed: gzugs med 'dod dang gzugs can rnams //
translated: The formless, the desire, and the form,

original: der 'gro yod pa yod ma yin //
analyzed: der 'gro yod pa yod ma yin //
translated: The going there, and the non-existence of existence.

original: ci phyir dad pa 'di 'dra rnyed //
analyzed: ci phyir dad pa 'di 'dra rnyed //
translated: Why is such faith found?

original: stug po'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba yang //
analyzed: stug po'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba yang //
translated: The vision of the mandala of the dense

original: rnal 'byor can gyi gnas kyi mchog /
analyzed: rnal 'byor can gyi gnas kyi mchog /
translated: Is the supreme abode of the yogis.

original: de phyir ngo mtshar thob par gyur //
analyzed: de phyir ngo mtshar thob par gyur //
translated: Therefore, I have attained the wondrous.

original: sgyu ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul //
translated: The realm of the illusory samadhi

original: rnal 'byor can gnas stug po de //
analyzed: rnal 'byor can gnas stug po de //
translated: Is the dense abode of the yogis.

original: 'di ni gcig nas gcig tu thos //
analyzed: 'di ni gcig nas gcig tu thos //
translated: This is heard from one to another,

original: de nas byung bas rnam par bsnyad //
analyzed: de nas byung bas rnam par bsnyad //
translated: And then it is proclaimed.

original: sna tshogs tshig 'di thos pa ni //🔽thub can rdo rje snying po yi //
analyzed: sna tshogs tshig 'di thos pa ni // thub can rdo rje snying po yi //
translated: Having heard these various words,🔽You, the vajra-hearted son of the Victorious One,

original: rgyal sras khyod kyis smra bar gyis //
analyzed: rgyal sras khyod kyis smra bar gyis //
translated: Speak!

original: rgyal ba'i sras rnams nyan par 'dod //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras rnams nyan par 'dod //
translated: The sons of the Victorious One wish to listen.

original: dbang sgyur rgyal po de bzhin gyis //
analyzed: dbang sgyur rgyal po de bzhin gyis //
translated: The king of the powerful, do the same!

original: gzi brjid chen po ma thogs shig /
analyzed: gzi brjid chen po ma thogs shig /
translated: Do not be obstructed, O greatly majestic one!🔽The Yāma gods, the Tuṣita gods,

original: mtshe ma rab dang dga' ldan dang // gtsang gnas 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams //🔽thub pa'i @36b bka' ni ma lus par //
analyzed: mtshe ma rab dang dga' ldan dang // gtsang gnas 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams // thub pa'i @36b bka' ni ma lus par //
translated: The Śuddhāvāsa gods, the fearless ones,🔽Who could speak

original: smra bar su zhig nus pa yod //
analyzed: smra bar su zhig nus pa yod //
translated: All the words of the Sage?

original: gzhan du khyod dang sangs rgyas rnams //
analyzed: gzhan du khyod dang sangs rgyas rnams //
translated: You and the buddhas,

original: thub chen thub pa bsnams pa dag /
analyzed: thub chen thub pa bsnams pa dag /
translated: the great sages, the holders of the great sage’s lineage,

original: sangs rgyas yul ni bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: sangs rgyas yul ni bsam mi khyab //
translated: the realm of the buddhas is inconceivable.

original: mchog gi gtso bos sangs rgyas kyi //
analyzed: mchog gi gtso bos sangs rgyas kyi //
translated: The supreme leaders,

original: rnal 'byor rnal 'byor med pa la //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rnal 'byor med pa la //
translated: the yogis and yoginis,

original: su yis ji ltar bstan par nus //
analyzed: su yis ji ltar bstan par nus //
translated: who can teach it and how?🔽The sons of the victorious ones,

original: mtshe ma rab dang shugs 'dzin dang // dbang sgyur rgyal ba'i sras po dag /
analyzed: mtshe ma rab dang shugs 'dzin dang // dbang sgyur rgyal ba'i sras po dag /
translated: Aśvajit, Bhadrika, Vāṣpa, and Mahānāman,

original: gcig pa'i dbyangs su yang smras te //
analyzed: gcig pa'i dbyangs su yang smras te //
translated: spoke in a single voice:

original: gsungs shig gsungs shig rgyal ba'i sras //
analyzed: gsungs shig gsungs shig rgyal ba'i sras //

original: bshad par de phyir dad pa med //
analyzed: bshad par de phyir dad pa med //
translated: Therefore have no faith in teaching.

original: 'di dag thams cad mkhas pa ste //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad mkhas pa ste //
translated: All of these are wise ones

original: de bzhin nyid blo shes pa'i rnams //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid blo shes pa'i rnams //
translated: And the suchness of the mind.🔽

original: sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam yas pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam yas pa //
translated: The domain of the buddhas is inconceivable.

original: de phyir smra bar dad pa med //
analyzed: de phyir smra bar dad pa med //
translated: Therefore, I have no faith in speaking.

original: 'on kyang brjod do thub pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: 'on kyang brjod do thub pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: Nevertheless, I will speak through the yoga of the sage.

original: de ring bdag las nyon cig rgyal sras rnams //
analyzed: de ring bdag las nyon cig rgyal sras rnams //
translated: Today, listen to me, O sons of the victors!

original: sna tshogs tshig gi don ldan thub pa'i bka'//
analyzed: sna tshogs tshig gi don ldan thub pa'i bka'//
translated: The meaningful words of the sage's speech

original: dpe med sems dang yid las rnam par 'das //
analyzed: dpe med sems dang yid las rnam par 'das //
translated: Are beyond the mind and thought, incomparable.

original: ji ltar bung bas me tog ro 'thungs shing //
analyzed: ji ltar bung bas me tog ro 'thungs shing //
translated: Just as a bee drinks the nectar of a flower

original: lhag ma gzhan dag 'thung bar byed pa bzhin //
analyzed: lhag ma gzhan dag 'thung bar byed pa bzhin //
translated: And leaves the rest for others to drink,🔽The supreme sages drink the essence,

original: snying khu thub pa'i mchog rnams kyis 'thungs te; ;de yi 'thungs lhag bdag gis de ring bshad //🔽de ni yid dang tshig gis kyang //
analyzed: snying khu thub pa'i mchog rnams kyis 'thungs te; ;de yi 'thungs lhag bdag gis de ring bshad // de ni yid dang tshig gis kyang //
translated: And I will now explain what remains of it.🔽That cannot be shown

original: bstan par nus pa ma yin la //
analyzed: bstan par nus pa ma yin la //
translated: By mind or words.

original: lha yi lha yi yul yin te //
analyzed: lha yi lha yi yul yin te //
translated: It is the domain of the god of gods,

original: mkhas rnams dge ba @39b 'phel bar byed //
analyzed: mkhas rnams dge ba @39b 'phel bar byed //
translated: Which increases the virtue of the wise.

original: mi yi gzugs su byas nas su //
analyzed: mi yi gzugs su byas nas su //
translated: Having taken on human form,

original: sangs rgyas zhes ni mtshan ldan pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes ni mtshan ldan pa //
translated: The one with the name Buddha

original: cod pan can dang gzhan la snang //
analyzed: cod pan can dang gzhan la snang //
translated: Appears to others with a crown.

original: gzhan med khang gnas gzhan la yang /
analyzed: gzhan med khang gnas gzhan la yang /
translated: In other places, in houses without others,🔽The maṇḍala of light, the wheel,

original: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang // mtshan bzang rnam pa sna tshogs su //
analyzed: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang // mtshan bzang rnam pa sna tshogs su //
translated: And the various good signs

original: sa la sna tshogs snang ba ni //
analyzed: sa la sna tshogs snang ba ni //
translated: Appear in various ways on the ground.

original: mur 'dug 'dus pa'i dregs pa sel //
analyzed: mur 'dug 'dus pa'i dregs pa sel //
translated: The arrogance of the assembly of extremists is dispelled.

original: dus rnams bzhi po thams cad du //
analyzed: dus rnams bzhi po thams cad du //
translated: In all four times,

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi dus dus la //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi dus dus la //
translated: The buddhas, at the right time,

original: stug na bzhugs pas dus sprul te //
analyzed: stug na bzhugs pas dus sprul te //
translated: Emanate from the thick forest

original: rnam par phye ba rab tu mdzad //
analyzed: rnam par phye ba rab tu mdzad //
translated: And perform the various activities.🔽The good time, the third, and the other side of the two bad times,

original: bzang dus de bzhin gsum pa dang // gnyis kyi pha rol dus ngan dang // de dag tu yang ci dgos pa //
analyzed: bzang dus de bzhin gsum pa dang // gnyis kyi pha rol dus ngan dang // de dag tu yang ci dgos pa //
translated: And in those times, whatever is necessary

original: sa la lus can rnams kyis te //
analyzed: sa la lus can rnams kyis te //
translated: For embodied beings on the ground,

original: ldan pa de dag thams cad mdzad //
analyzed: ldan pa de dag thams cad mdzad //
translated: All of that is performed by those endowed with the body.

original: stug po'i dkyil na bzhugs shing ste //
analyzed: stug po'i dkyil na bzhugs shing ste //
translated: Residing in the thick forest,

original: stug po de ni dri med gnas //
analyzed: stug po de ni dri med gnas //
translated: That thick forest is the abode of the stainless.

original: sbyor chen rnams kyi bde ba'i gzhi //
analyzed: sbyor chen rnams kyi bde ba'i gzhi //
translated: The basis of bliss for those of great union,

original: ngan dang gnyis kyi pha rol mtshams //
analyzed: ngan dang gnyis kyi pha rol mtshams //
translated: The boundary of the bad and the two others,

original: thub pa gzugs ni rnam bzung nas //
analyzed: thub pa gzugs ni rnam bzung nas //
translated: The sage, having taken on a form,

original: dri med stug na rnal 'byor ldan //
analyzed: dri med stug na rnal 'byor ldan //
translated: Endowed with yoga in the stainless thick forest,

original: zla ba bzhin du 'gro la snang //
analyzed: zla ba bzhin du 'gro la snang //
translated: Appears to the world like the moon.

original: sna tshogs 'gro ba gang shes kyis //
analyzed: sna tshogs 'gro ba gang shes kyis //
translated: Whoever knows the various migrations,

original: sna tshogs gzugs su mdzes pa ni //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs su mdzes pa ni //
translated: The beautiful in various forms,

original: gang la gang snang gang gis kyang //
analyzed: gang la gang snang gang gis kyang //
translated: Whatever appears to whomever,

original: ji ltar gang la de ba de ba //🔽de dag de la thams cad du //
analyzed: ji ltar gang la de ba de ba // de dag de la thams cad du //
translated: Whatever is, is just as it is.

original: de phyir cha yis mig la gnas //
analyzed: de phyir cha yis mig la gnas //
translated: Therefore, it abides in the eye in parts.

original: shes can yul can thub pa ni //
analyzed: shes can yul can thub pa ni //
translated: The knower of objects, the sage,

original: rnal 'byor mkhyen pa shes pas snang //
analyzed: rnal 'byor mkhyen pa shes pas snang //
translated: Appears to the knowledge of the yogi.

original: dbang po che gzugs @40a *//
analyzed: dbang po che gzugs @40a *//
translated: The great sense organ, form,

original: gzhan dag dang // 'jug 'dod kyi dang de bzhin gzhan //
analyzed: gzhan dag dang // 'jug 'dod kyi dang de bzhin gzhan //
translated: And others, and likewise others,

original: ser skya yi yang gzugs su ste //
analyzed: ser skya yi yang gzugs su ste //
translated: The form of Kapila,

original: thub pa la lar mkha' bzhugs pa //🔽shes byed shes la yang dag snang //
analyzed: thub pa la lar mkha' bzhugs pa // shes byed shes la yang dag snang //
translated: The sage sometimes abides in space.

original: sa nad sa nan da na la //
analyzed: sa nad sa nan da na la //
translated: It appears correctly to the knowledge of the knower.🔽In Sānanda, Sānanada, and Sānanda,🔽The young Sānanda, and the maidens,

original: sa nad gzhon nu me dag dang // sgra gcan mi ci tum bu ru //
analyzed: sa nad gzhon nu me dag dang // sgra gcan mi ci tum bu ru //
translated: Rāhu, kiṃnara, and Tumburu,

original: aig shva ku dang / zla ba'i rigs //
analyzed: aig shva ku dang / zla ba'i rigs //
translated: Aihikṣa, and the lunar family,

original: thams cad sa yi rgyal po la //
analyzed: thams cad sa yi rgyal po la //
translated: All are kings of the earth.

original: thams cad sa yang mchod pa ste //
analyzed: thams cad sa yang mchod pa ste //
translated: All are worshiped on the earth.

original: sku ni su su ci 'dod bzhin /
analyzed: sku ni su su ci 'dod bzhin /
translated: The body is just as one wishes.

original: la lar mur 'dug spyod sprul te //
analyzed: la lar mur 'dug spyod sprul te //
translated: to some as a Rakshasa,🔽to some as a Piśāca,🔽to some as a Bhujanga,

original: ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyis mthong //
analyzed: ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyis mthong //
translated: to some as a human,🔽to some as a non-human,

original: tshul gyi gtsug lag ston par yang //
analyzed: tshul gyi gtsug lag ston par yang //
translated: to some as a god,🔽to some as a demon,🔽to some as a ghost,🔽to some as a hungry ghost,

original: ci bzhin rigs par rab ston cing //
analyzed: ci bzhin rigs par rab ston cing //
translated: to some as a hell being,🔽to some as a man,🔽to some as a woman,🔽to some as a boy,🔽to some as a girl,

original: rdo rje dngul dang gser dag dang // zangs dang lcags kyi 'byung khungs dang // ro nye zha nye mu tig dang // padma r'a dang aanda rnyil //
analyzed: rdo rje dngul dang gser dag dang // zangs dang lcags kyi 'byung khungs dang // ro nye zha nye mu tig dang // padma r'a dang aanda rnyil //
translated: to some as a king,🔽to some as a minister,

original: bee d'u rya dang shel dag dang // aa sma garba mu sa ra //
analyzed: bee d'u rya dang shel dag dang // aa sma garba mu sa ra //
translated: to some as a brahmin,🔽to some as a merchant,🔽to some as a worker,🔽to some as a householder,

original: tshul dang rtag pa thams cad ldan //
analyzed: tshul dang rtag pa thams cad ldan //
translated: to some as a renunciant,🔽to some as a monk,🔽to some as a nun,🔽to some as a male lay practitioner,🔽to some as a female lay practitioner,

original: mkhan po bla ma kun 'gro dang // gang gis lus can su su cir //
analyzed: mkhan po bla ma kun 'gro dang // gang gis lus can su su cir //
translated: to some as a universal monarch,🔽to some as a wheel-turning monarch,🔽to some as a cakravartin,🔽to some as a wheel-holding monarch,

original: sa la bde ba skye ba bzhin //🔽de la de bde thams cad du //
analyzed: sa la bde ba skye ba bzhin // de la de bde thams cad du //
translated: to some as a wheel-turning king,🔽to some as a wheel-turning emperor,🔽to some as a wheel-turning ruler,🔽to some as a wheel-turning lord,🔽to some as a wheel-turning sovereign,

original: thub pa'i rnal 'byor rab las byung /
analyzed: thub pa'i rnal 'byor rab las byung /
translated: to some as a wheel-turning master,🔽to some as a wheel-turning commander,🔽to some as a wheel-turning leader,🔽to some as a wheel-turning guide,🔽to some as a wheel-turning protector,

original: lha yi bu mos mi spyod do //
analyzed: lha yi bu mos mi spyod do //
translated: to some as a wheel-turning supporter,

original: de bzhin dri za'i bud med kyis //
analyzed: de bzhin dri za'i bud med kyis //
translated: to some as a wheel-turning lord of men,🔽to some as a wheel-turning lord of the world,🔽to some as a wheel-turning lord of the earth,🔽to some as a wheel-turning lord of the realm,🔽to some as a wheel-turning lord of the country,

original: 'dod khams dbang po'i bud med dang // de bzhin klu yi bud med kyis //
analyzed: 'dod khams dbang po'i bud med dang // de bzhin klu yi bud med kyis //
translated: to some as a wheel-turning lord of the land,🔽to some as a wheel-

original: mi ci lha min bu mo dang // gnod sbyin bu mos de bzhin no //
analyzed: mi ci lha min bu mo dang // gnod sbyin bu mos de bzhin no //
translated: are also like that.

original: de ni 'dod pa'i yul las rgyal //
analyzed: de ni 'dod pa'i yul las rgyal //
translated: He is victorious over the objects of desire.

original: gzugs can rnams @40b kyi yul de bzhin //
analyzed: gzugs can rnams @40b kyi yul de bzhin //
translated: The objects of the form realm are also like that.🔽The sphere of infinite space, the sphere of infinite consciousness,

original: nam mkha' rnam shes mtha' yas dang // cung zad med pa'ang de bzhin te //
analyzed: nam mkha' rnam shes mtha' yas dang // cung zad med pa'ang de bzhin te //
translated: and the sphere of nothingness are also like that.

original: 'du shes yod mi na ma yin gyi //
analyzed: 'du shes yod mi na ma yin gyi //
translated: It is not that there is no perception,

original: gnas na rnam par rmongs pa med //
analyzed: gnas na rnam par rmongs pa med //
translated: but that there is no delusion in that state.

original: kun tu la sogs 'di dag lam //
analyzed: kun tu la sogs 'di dag lam //
translated: These, beginning with the all-bases, are the paths

original: rnal 'byor can gyi 'ching ba'i dngos //
analyzed: rnal 'byor can gyi 'ching ba'i dngos //
translated: of the yogis, the actual bonds.

original: ma zhi mi dge gzhan dag kyang //🔽srog chags rnams kyi sa yod pa //
analyzed: ma zhi mi dge gzhan dag kyang // srog chags rnams kyi sa yod pa //
translated: The others are not pacified, not virtuous,🔽and exist for living beings.

original: lus can rnams kyi lus kyi yul //
analyzed: lus can rnams kyi lus kyi yul //
translated: The objects of the body of embodied beings

original: stug kyi zhing rab ste //
analyzed: stug kyi zhing rab ste //
translated: are the fields of the dense

original: stug po de ni yun du rtag /
analyzed: stug po de ni yun du rtag /
translated: that dense forest is permanent and enduring.

original: mnga' rnams bcu po de dag dang // stobs dang mngon mkhyen ting nge 'dzin //
analyzed: mnga' rnams bcu po de dag dang // stobs dang mngon mkhyen ting nge 'dzin //
translated: Those ten powers, the strengths, the higher knowledges, and the concentrations,

original: yid kyi rgyu las byung ba'i skus //
analyzed: yid kyi rgyu las byung ba'i skus //
translated: with a body produced from the mind,

original: sangs rgyas de na rnam par mdzes //
analyzed: sangs rgyas de na rnam par mdzes //
translated: the Buddha is radiant there.

original: sa rnams bcu po kun bsgoms te //
analyzed: sa rnams bcu po kun bsgoms te //
translated: Having cultivated all ten stages,

original: rnam thar bden pa stong pa nyid //
analyzed: rnam thar bden pa stong pa nyid //
translated: the liberations, the truths, and emptiness,

original: mtshan med smon pa med pa dang // pha rol phyin drug de bzhin te //
analyzed: mtshan med smon pa med pa dang // pha rol phyin drug de bzhin te //
translated: Signless, wishless, and the six perfections,🔽And through meditation, generosity, discipline, and wisdom,

original: bsgom dang sbyin dang tshul khrims dang // shes rab rnams kyis de sku 'thob //
analyzed: bsgom dang sbyin dang tshul khrims dang // shes rab rnams kyis de sku 'thob //
translated: One attains that buddha body.

original: yan lag gzugs kun me tog gi /
analyzed: yan lag gzugs kun me tog gi /
translated: The body of all forms is a collection of flowers,

original: 'dus ma byas pa sangs rgyas sku'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas pa sangs rgyas sku'o //
translated: The unconditioned is the buddha body.

original: rtog med rtog dang bral ba ste //
analyzed: rtog med rtog dang bral ba ste //
translated: Non-conceptual, free from concepts,

original: bdag med yid dang dbang po rnams //
analyzed: bdag med yid dang dbang po rnams //
translated: Selfless, with mind and senses,

original: shes rab dbang po'i sgor ldan zhing //
analyzed: shes rab dbang po'i sgor ldan zhing //
translated: Endowed with the gateway of wisdom and senses,

original: mtshan gyis kun nas shin tu bsags //🔽sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs kyi //
analyzed: mtshan gyis kun nas shin tu bsags // sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs kyi //
translated: Fully gathered with the major marks,🔽Through the virtuous actions

original: dkar po'i las rnams @41a *//🔽byas pas na //🔽sangs rgyas sku yi gnas kyi mchog /
analyzed: dkar po'i las rnams @41a *// byas pas na // sangs rgyas sku yi gnas kyi mchog /
translated: Of generosity, discipline, and so forth,🔽One attains the supreme abode of the buddha body,

original: stug po'i ris su 'thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: stug po'i ris su 'thob par 'gyur //
translated: The realm of the Densely Arrayed.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas gnas //🔽nyi zla rnam par spangs pa ste //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas gnas // nyi zla rnam par spangs pa ste //
translated: The abode of the Thus-Gone One is divine,🔽Beyond the sun and moon,🔽With the light of stars and constellations,

original: rgyu skar skar phran snang ba dang // zla ba dus dang ltad mo med //
analyzed: rgyu skar skar phran snang ba dang // zla ba dus dang ltad mo med //
translated: Without the moon or seasonal shows.

original: rnal 'byor can gyi 'od 'char dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od kyis kyang //
analyzed: rnal 'byor can gyi 'od 'char dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od kyis kyang //
translated: and the light of the buddhas,

original: kun nas bzang po'i stug po de //
analyzed: kun nas bzang po'i stug po de //
translated: That beautiful and dense

original: nyi ma bzhin du kun nas snang //
analyzed: nyi ma bzhin du kun nas snang //
translated: light shines everywhere like the sun.

original: dus kyi 'bri ba de na med //
analyzed: dus kyi 'bri ba de na med //
translated: There is no decrease of time there,

original: nad rnams gang yang yod pa min //
analyzed: nad rnams gang yang yod pa min //
translated: and no illness at all.

original: 'chi rga med pa'i gnas yin te //
analyzed: 'chi rga med pa'i gnas yin te //
translated: It is a place without death or old age,

original: stug po de ni zhing gi mchog /
analyzed: stug po de ni zhing gi mchog /
translated: that dense place, the supreme field.

original: thams cad gzugs ldan zhi ba'i gnas //
analyzed: thams cad gzugs ldan zhi ba'i gnas //
translated: It is a place of peace, with all forms,

original: dri med mthong ba'i chos can gyi //
analyzed: dri med mthong ba'i chos can gyi //
translated: the stainless, the visible.

original: sangs rgyas zhing stug bsod nams te //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhing stug bsod nams te //
translated: The dense field of the buddhas is merit,

original: lha rnams kun gyis smon par bya //
analyzed: lha rnams kun gyis smon par bya //
translated: aspired to by all the gods.

original: rnal 'byor can rnams khyad par du //
analyzed: rnal 'byor can rnams khyad par du //
translated: Especially for the yogis and yoginis,

original: sa dang sa la gnas pa dag /
analyzed: sa dang sa la gnas pa dag /
translated: those abiding on the stages and levels,

original: sems tsam rang bzhin dngos po rnams //
analyzed: sems tsam rang bzhin dngos po rnams //
translated: The nature of things is mind only.

original: gang phyir rab tu bstan pas na //
analyzed: gang phyir rab tu bstan pas na //
translated: Because it is taught in that way,

original: yid dang sems dang kun gzhi'i tshul //🔽rang bzhin gsum po de bzhin te //
analyzed: yid dang sems dang kun gzhi'i tshul // rang bzhin gsum po de bzhin te //
translated: the mind, the mental factors, and the way of the foundation consciousness,🔽those three natures,

original: chos la bdag med rang bzhin can //
analyzed: chos la bdag med rang bzhin can //
translated: are the nature of the selflessness of phenomena.

original: gnas ni gzhan du 'gyur pa ste //
analyzed: gnas ni gzhan du 'gyur pa ste //
translated: The place is transformed.

original: lus ni shin tu gnas gyur pas //
analyzed: lus ni shin tu gnas gyur pas //
translated: The body is transformed into a very stable state.

original: thub pa rnams ni der 'dong ste //
analyzed: thub pa rnams ni der 'dong ste //
translated: The sages go there

original: rnal 'byor can gyi gnas kyi mchog /
analyzed: rnal 'byor can gyi gnas kyi mchog /
translated: to the supreme abode of the yogis,

original: stug po zhing rab dam par ro //
analyzed: stug po zhing rab dam par ro //
translated: to the most excellent field of the dense array.

original: stug por 'jug pa zhes bya ba ste le'u gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: stug por 'jug pa zhes bya ba ste le'u gsum pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the third chapter on entering the dense array.

original: @41b lus ni rdzas dgu'i rang bzhin can //
analyzed: @41b lus ni rdzas dgu'i rang bzhin can //
translated: The body is composed of nine substances.

original: 'dus byas rdul phran tshogs yin te //
analyzed: 'dus byas rdul phran tshogs yin te //
translated: The compounded is a collection of atoms.

original: yon tan tshogs kyis rnam sna tshogs //
analyzed: yon tan tshogs kyis rnam sna tshogs //
translated: The collection of qualities is diverse.

original: 'byung dang 'byung gnas tshogs yin te //
analyzed: 'byung dang 'byung gnas tshogs yin te //
translated: The collection of elements and abodes is

original: khu chu khrag las kun 'byung ba //
analyzed: khu chu khrag las kun 'byung ba //
translated: arisen from semen and blood.

original: sngon med rnam par 'phel pa ste //
analyzed: sngon med rnam par 'phel pa ste //
translated: It is a non-existent development.

original: stong gzugs 'og tu 'gro ba yin //
analyzed: stong gzugs 'og tu 'gro ba yin //
translated: The empty form goes below.

original: sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor thog ma med //
analyzed: sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor thog ma med //
translated: The wheel of suffering is beginningless.

original: las kyi rnam pa brgyas kyang g-yog /🔽dug gi shing gis sa bzhin du //
analyzed: las kyi rnam pa brgyas kyang g-yog / dug gi shing gis sa bzhin du //
translated: It is served by a hundred types of karma.🔽Like the earth with its poisonous trees,

original: dpa' dang rdul gyis de bzhin du //
analyzed: dpa' dang rdul gyis de bzhin du //
translated: like the hero with his dust,

original: mun pas kyang ni gsos pa ste //
analyzed: mun pas kyang ni gsos pa ste //
translated: and like the darkness with its nourishment,

original: lam rgyud dog par shin tu 'phyan //
analyzed: lam rgyud dog par shin tu 'phyan //
translated: it moves along the narrow path of the continuum.

original: dus kyis bskul cing rab tu skye //
analyzed: dus kyis bskul cing rab tu skye //
translated: It is born by the urging of time.

original: yon tan las kyis 'da' ba ni //
analyzed: yon tan las kyis 'da' ba ni //
translated: The qualities are beyond action.

original: phyugs dang mi yi mngal skyes pas //
analyzed: phyugs dang mi yi mngal skyes pas //
translated: Born from the womb of an animal or a human,🔽Or in the realm of nāgas, pretas, piśācas,

original: klu dang yi dvags sha za dang // 'bar ba lha yi nang du yang //
analyzed: klu dang yi dvags sha za dang // 'bar ba lha yi nang du yang //
translated: Or in the blazing divine realm,

original: skye 'am lha min 'jig rten nam //
analyzed: skye 'am lha min 'jig rten nam //
translated: Or in the world of asuras,

original: sngags 'chang rigs su de bzhin te //
analyzed: sngags 'chang rigs su de bzhin te //
translated: Or likewise in the family of mantra holders,

original: 'on tam rnal 'byor can dbus su //
analyzed: 'on tam rnal 'byor can dbus su //
translated: Or perhaps in the center of the yogis,

original: bsam gtan zhig cing mngon skye ba //
analyzed: bsam gtan zhig cing mngon skye ba //
translated: The meditation is destroyed and manifests.

original: 'khor lo 'khor rigs dam par yang //
analyzed: 'khor lo 'khor rigs dam par yang //
translated: In the supreme family of the turning wheel,

original: bar bar du ni skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bar bar du ni skye bar 'gyur //
translated: One will be born in between.

original: skyes nas rig pa 'dzin pa ni //
analyzed: skyes nas rig pa 'dzin pa ni //
translated: Having been born, the vidyādhara

original: gang tshe dbang po 'phel ba na //
analyzed: gang tshe dbang po 'phel ba na //
translated: When the faculties increase,

original: su yi gang gi gang tshe las //
analyzed: su yi gang gi gang tshe las //
translated: Whose, whose, and when

original: lhan cig skyes pa rab byung zhing //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa rab byung zhing //
translated: The innate arises,

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i las tshul gyis //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i las tshul gyis //
translated: By the method of innate karma,

original: lam dang lam du rab tu 'jug /
analyzed: lam dang lam du rab tu 'jug /
translated: One enters the path and the path.

original: brtag med rtog dang bral ba yi //
analyzed: brtag med rtog dang bral ba yi //
translated: When the non-conceptual, non-imagined

original: gang tshe chos ni mngon rtogs na //
analyzed: gang tshe chos ni mngon rtogs na //
translated: Dharma is realized,

original: thar pa rnams kyi thar gsum ste //
analyzed: thar pa rnams kyi thar gsum ste //
translated: The three liberations of the liberated

original: yi ge yi ge med byas @42a *//
analyzed: yi ge yi ge med byas @42a *//
translated: Are made without syllables or with syllables.

original: pa'o // 'byung ba thams cad rgyu yi tshogs //
analyzed: pa'o // 'byung ba thams cad rgyu yi tshogs //
translated: The collection of causes of all the elements.

original: de ni 'od snang mchog yin te //
analyzed: de ni 'od snang mchog yin te //
translated: That is the supreme light of radiance,

original: yang dag bla nas blar sbyangs pa //
analyzed: yang dag bla nas blar sbyangs pa //
translated: Completely purified from above and below,

original: stug po'i dkyil na rnam par gnas //
analyzed: stug po'i dkyil na rnam par gnas //
translated: Dwelling in the midst of the dense.

original: bye ba'i zhing dang mnyam lus kyis //
analyzed: bye ba'i zhing dang mnyam lus kyis //
translated: With a body equal to a million fields,

original: sprul pas khyab par byas shing gnas //
analyzed: sprul pas khyab par byas shing gnas //
translated: Emanations pervade and dwell.

original: de ste de shes yod na ni //
analyzed: de ste de shes yod na ni //
translated: If that is known,

original: dog pa'i lam nas 'grol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dog pa'i lam nas 'grol bar 'gyur //
translated: It will be released from the narrow path.

original: de lta'i skyes bu skyes pa ni //
analyzed: de lta'i skyes bu skyes pa ni //
translated: Such a person is born

original: khyad par shes zhes rnam par brjod //
analyzed: khyad par shes zhes rnam par brjod //
translated: And is called 'one who knows the distinction'.

original: lha yi lha yis yang dag gsungs //
analyzed: lha yi lha yis yang dag gsungs //
translated: The god of gods has spoken

original: rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun byas shing //🔽mngal gyi skye ba 'byung ba ni; ;byas pa yin no mi rnams kyi //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun byas shing // mngal gyi skye ba 'byung ba ni; ;byas pa yin no mi rnams kyi //
translated: And is attended by the Victor's sons.🔽The arising of womb birth

original: ma rig sred dang las skyes min //
analyzed: ma rig sred dang las skyes min //
translated: Is for humans, not from ignorance, craving, and karma.

original: nyon mongs las las shin tu byung //🔽mtshan ma med pa mngon gyur cing //
analyzed: nyon mongs las las shin tu byung // mtshan ma med pa mngon gyur cing //
translated: It arises from afflictions and karma.🔽Manifesting the signless,

original: mtshan ma med las rab 'das te //
analyzed: mtshan ma med las rab 'das te //
translated: Completely transcending the signless,

original: yi ge med pa de byung nas //
analyzed: yi ge med pa de byung nas //
translated: Having arisen from the signless,

original: spros pa thams cad rab bral zhing //
analyzed: spros pa thams cad rab bral zhing //
translated: Free from all elaborations,

original: stug po'i dkyil du rab tu 'gro //
analyzed: stug po'i dkyil du rab tu 'gro //
translated: And enter the thickets of the forest.

original: dmigs las sems zhig 'gyur ba ni //
analyzed: dmigs las sems zhig 'gyur ba ni //
translated: “The mind is destroyed by the object,

original: rnal 'byor can gyi sgra rmongs pas //
analyzed: rnal 'byor can gyi sgra rmongs pas //
translated: And the yogi is confused by sound.🔽Confused by the divine women,

original: rtsed mo la sogs lha rdzas dang // mtho ris bud med bsten rmongs kyis //
analyzed: rtsed mo la sogs lha rdzas dang // mtho ris bud med bsten rmongs kyis //
translated: By play and so forth,

original: gang tshe thub chen ma 'dug pa //
analyzed: gang tshe thub chen ma 'dug pa //
translated: “When the great sage does not remain,

original: de tshe sems ni 'byung ba ste //
analyzed: de tshe sems ni 'byung ba ste //
translated: Then the mind arises.

original: lam las skyod ces bya ba yi //
analyzed: lam las skyod ces bya ba yi //
translated: It is said that the mind moves from the path.

original: ting 'dzin 'dod pa'i khams skyes pa //
analyzed: ting 'dzin 'dod pa'i khams skyes pa //
translated: “The samādhi born in the desire realm

original: gzugs dang gzugs med 'gro ba na //
analyzed: gzugs dang gzugs med 'gro ba na //
translated: Goes to the form and formless realms,

original: ting nge 'dzin ni rab tu skye //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ni rab tu skye //
translated: And the samādhi arises there.🔽“In the realm of beings without perception,

original: sems can 'du shes med song @42b na; ;ting nge 'dzin las bral bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sems can 'du shes med song @42b na; ;ting nge 'dzin las bral bar 'gyur //
translated: The samādhi is lost.

original: nam mkha' rnam shes mtha' yas kyi //
analyzed: nam mkha' rnam shes mtha' yas kyi //
translated: In the realms of infinite space and infinite consciousness,

original: ting nge 'dzin la dbang med 'gyur //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la dbang med 'gyur //
translated: The samādhi is powerless.

original: rgyas la gang tshe thub dbang gyur //🔽gnyis dang bral bas byang ba yi //
analyzed: rgyas la gang tshe thub dbang gyur // gnyis dang bral bas byang ba yi //
translated: “When one becomes a lord of sages,🔽The mind does not arise,

original: sems ni mngon par mi 'byung ngo //🔽de bden de ni rnal 'byor te //
analyzed: sems ni mngon par mi 'byung ngo // de bden de ni rnal 'byor te //
translated: Free from the two, purified.🔽“That is true, that is yoga,

original: bsam gtan pa yi bsam gtan yin //
analyzed: bsam gtan pa yi bsam gtan yin //
translated: That is the concentration of the meditator.

original: bsam gtan rtag tu bsam gtan bya //
analyzed: bsam gtan rtag tu bsam gtan bya //
translated: One should always meditate in the forest.

original: de ste stug dkyil 'dod na'o //
analyzed: de ste stug dkyil 'dod na'o //
translated: If one desires the center of the thicket,

original: mngal gyi skye ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi pa'o ////
analyzed: mngal gyi skye ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi pa'o ////
translated: This is the fourth chapter, called “The Origin of the Womb of Birth.”

original: rnam brgyad rnam pa dgu yi sems //
analyzed: rnam brgyad rnam pa dgu yi sems //
translated: The mind is eightfold and ninefold.🔽Ignorance is the cause of the world;

original: ma rig 'jig rten rgyu yin te; ;'di ni sems dang sems 'byung mthu //
analyzed: ma rig 'jig rten rgyu yin te; ;'di ni sems dang sems 'byung mthu //
translated: This is the power of mind and mental factors.

original: gang gnas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gnas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o //
translated: It is the various abodes.

original: de yi mthus kyang 'jug pa ni //
analyzed: de yi mthus kyang 'jug pa ni //
translated: By its power, the engagement

original: rnam shes rnams dang dbang po rnams //
analyzed: rnam shes rnams dang dbang po rnams //
translated: Of the consciousnesses and the faculties

original: ma rig la sogs rnam pa 'di //
analyzed: ma rig la sogs rnam pa 'di //
translated: Is this kind of ignorance and so forth.

original: rtsa ba'i sems ni brtan gnas pa //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sems ni brtan gnas pa //
translated: The root mind is the stable abode.🔽It is the cause of the destruction of the world🔽With its twelve branches,🔽The elements and their sources,🔽The objects and faculties,

original: yan lag bcu gnyis thams cad dang // 'byung ba rnams dang 'byung gnas dang // yul dang dbang po 'jig rten dang // skad cig 'jig pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: yan lag bcu gnyis thams cad dang // 'byung ba rnams dang 'byung gnas dang // yul dang dbang po 'jig rten dang // skad cig 'jig pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: And the momentary destruction.

original: thub pa lha yi lhas gsungs pa //
analyzed: thub pa lha yi lhas gsungs pa //
translated: The Sage, the god of gods, has said

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu spangs pa ste //🔽tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mthar thug gi /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu spangs pa ste // tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mthar thug gi /
translated: That it is the abandonment of cause and effect.🔽It is the end of the world of Brahmā.

original: 'gro ba dbang por bcas pa 'di //
analyzed: 'gro ba dbang por bcas pa 'di //
translated: This world with its sense faculties

original: 'jig rten btsal bas ma bskyed de //
analyzed: 'jig rten btsal bas ma bskyed de //
translated: The world is not produced by a creator.

original: bdag nyid rdza ma bzhin 'jig pa //
analyzed: bdag nyid rdza ma bzhin 'jig pa //
translated: Like a pot, it is destroyed by itself.

original: nang dang phyi dag rtag par te //
analyzed: nang dang phyi dag rtag par te //
translated: The inner and outer are always

original: 'gro ba gnas dang g-yo ba dag /
analyzed: 'gro ba gnas dang g-yo ba dag /
translated: The moving and unmoving worlds

original: lha yi lha yi yul @43a *//
analyzed: lha yi lha yi yul @43a *//
translated: Are the objects of the god of gods.

original: yin te // sa la sus kyang mi mthong ba //
analyzed: yin te // sa la sus kyang mi mthong ba //
translated: No one sees them on earth.

original: mur 'dug grags pa gzhan dag ste //
analyzed: mur 'dug grags pa gzhan dag ste //
translated: The other famous ones are the extremists,

original: thub grags mtshan ma can gyis so //
analyzed: thub grags mtshan ma can gyis so //
translated: The famous sages are the ones with signs.

original: phan tshun bcings pas bcings pa ni //
analyzed: phan tshun bcings pas bcings pa ni //
translated: Bound by mutual bondage,

original: sred pa sna tshogs rnam pas te //
analyzed: sred pa sna tshogs rnam pas te //
translated: They are various kinds of craving.

original: rnam shes myur du 'gro bas na //
analyzed: rnam shes myur du 'gro bas na //
translated: Because consciousness moves quickly,

original: sems kyi rnam par mi rtogs so //
analyzed: sems kyi rnam par mi rtogs so //
translated: The mind does not understand its nature.🔽Through sacrifices that last

original: lo stong mtha' ru thug pa yi //🔽mchod sbyin rnams kyis tshangs pa'i thabs //
analyzed: lo stong mtha' ru thug pa yi // mchod sbyin rnams kyis tshangs pa'i thabs //
translated: A thousand years, one may attain

original: thob nas slar du ldog pa ni //
analyzed: thob nas slar du ldog pa ni //
translated: Brahma’s state, but then one falls back.

original: sa ma ya ru rigs sems pa //
analyzed: sa ma ya ru rigs sems pa //
translated: The Sāṃkhyas think that

original: 'dod sbyor bkag srog 'bras bu dang // gang yang zla ba'i 'bras bu dang // mer gzhug pa yi 'bras bu dang // gang gzhan mchod sbyin 'bras bu dang // phyugs bcing ba yi 'bras bu yang //
analyzed: 'dod sbyor bkag srog 'bras bu dang // gang yang zla ba'i 'bras bu dang // mer gzhug pa yi 'bras bu dang // gang gzhan mchod sbyin 'bras bu dang // phyugs bcing ba yi 'bras bu yang //
translated: the fruit of the sacrifice of cattle,

original: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas ldog go //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas ldog go //
translated: all of these are turned away from the world of Brahma.

original: chos gsum can gyi 'gro ba dag /
analyzed: chos gsum can gyi 'gro ba dag /
translated: The three-natured beings,

original: ci nyes mi rig thor tshugs can //
analyzed: ci nyes mi rig thor tshugs can //
translated: with matted hair, are not known to have any fault.

original: yon tan gsum gyi 'bru 'brel ba //
analyzed: yon tan gsum gyi 'bru 'brel ba //
translated: The three qualities are connected like seeds,

original: chu skyes bzhin du snying po med //
analyzed: chu skyes bzhin du snying po med //
translated: but are as insubstantial as a lotus.

original: 'di yis thar pa mi rnyed pa //
analyzed: 'di yis thar pa mi rnyed pa //
translated: By this, liberation is not attained,

original: stug po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas //
analyzed: stug po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas //
translated: but the dense abode of the Tathagatas

original: de ni rnal 'byor gyis 'thob ste //
analyzed: de ni rnal 'byor gyis 'thob ste //
translated: is attained by yoga.

original: stug po rnal 'byor rig pa'i gnas //
analyzed: stug po rnal 'byor rig pa'i gnas //
translated: The dense abode of the knowledge of yoga

original: de bas tshul gcig tshangs pa'i bdag /
analyzed: de bas tshul gcig tshangs pa'i bdag /
translated: is thus the one principle of the lord of Brahma.

original: rnal 'byor can rnams 'jug brtson par //
analyzed: rnal 'byor can rnams 'jug brtson par //
translated: Those who strive to enter into yoga,

original: 'di la bdag gnyen gang dag kyang //
analyzed: 'di la bdag gnyen gang dag kyang //
translated: even those who are related to me,

original: skye zhing 'chi ba yong med de //
analyzed: skye zhing 'chi ba yong med de //
translated: are not born and do not die.

original: mi chod gzhig tu med pa ni //
analyzed: mi chod gzhig tu med pa ni //
translated: They are indestructible and cannot be destroyed,

original: lus can kun gyi rnam par shes //
analyzed: lus can kun gyi rnam par shes //
translated: but are the consciousness of all embodied beings.

original: bag chags kyis ni mi gos @43b pa; ;sngon med dus nas byung bas so //
analyzed: bag chags kyis ni mi gos @43b pa; ;sngon med dus nas byung bas so //
translated: Because it has existed since beginningless time.

original: yid kyi gnas ngan len bsags pa'i //
analyzed: yid kyi gnas ngan len bsags pa'i //
translated: The accumulation of negative tendencies of the mind

original: spros pas kyang ngo cir mi 'jug /
analyzed: spros pas kyang ngo cir mi 'jug /
translated: Is also not engaged in by conceptual elaboration.🔽Just as the divine water-born [lotus]🔽And the sky are not sullied by dust,

original: ji ltar lha rdzas chu skyes dang // nam mkha' la yang phyag dar dang // sprin gyi dri mas nyi zla la //
analyzed: ji ltar lha rdzas chu skyes dang // nam mkha' la yang phyag dar dang // sprin gyi dri mas nyi zla la //
translated: And the sun and moon by the stains of the clouds,

original: de bzhin mi gos rnal 'byor can //
analyzed: de bzhin mi gos rnal 'byor can //
translated: So too the yogi is unsullied.

original: ma bshol rab tu brtson par gyis //
analyzed: ma bshol rab tu brtson par gyis //
translated: Do not delay, but strive well!

original: thams cad sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: thams cad sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs //
translated: Everything is blessed by the Buddha.

original: rnal 'byor bde gshegs lha yi rdzas //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bde gshegs lha yi rdzas //
translated: The yogi is the divine substance of the Sugata.

original: rnal 'byor can gyi tshul bskyed pa //
analyzed: rnal 'byor can gyi tshul bskyed pa //
translated: The yogi generates the way.

original: tshul khrims can gyi tshul 'thungs te //
analyzed: tshul khrims can gyi tshul 'thungs te //
translated: The one with discipline drinks the way.

original: ye shes can gyis shes 'thungs shing //
analyzed: ye shes can gyis shes 'thungs shing //
translated: The one with wisdom drinks knowledge.

original: mchog gi ye shes 'thungs nas kyang //
analyzed: mchog gi ye shes 'thungs nas kyang //
translated: Having drunk the supreme knowledge,

original: 'khor ba las ni 'da' bar gyis //
analyzed: 'khor ba las ni 'da' bar gyis //
translated: Pass beyond saṃsāra.

original: 'di la khams rnams gang yang med //
analyzed: 'di la khams rnams gang yang med //
translated: Here there are no elements at all.

original: phung po lnga dang rnam shes kyang //
analyzed: phung po lnga dang rnam shes kyang //
translated: The five aggregates and consciousness

original: ming dang gzugs dag rgyur byas shing //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs dag rgyur byas shing //
translated: Are made the cause of name and form.

original: lus can rnams kyi yid kyang skye; ;ji ltar me ni shing dbang gis //
analyzed: lus can rnams kyi yid kyang skye; ;ji ltar me ni shing dbang gis //
translated: Just as fire arises in dependence on fuel.

original: 'bar te 'bar bar rtog pa med //
analyzed: 'bar te 'bar bar rtog pa med //
translated: Fire does not think, “I burn!”

original: de bzhin phung po shing rta stong //
analyzed: de bzhin phung po shing rta stong //
translated: The aggregates and the chariot are empty.

original: ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya //🔽ri dvags sred dang dri za yi //
analyzed: ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya // ri dvags sred dang dri za yi //
translated: Why do yogis not engage in analysis?🔽The place of the thirsty deer and the gandharvas,

original: gnas dang skra tshogs snang ba ru //
analyzed: gnas dang skra tshogs snang ba ru //
translated: The appearance of a mass of hair,

original: ri dvags bus pa la sogs mthong //🔽yang dag ma yin ltas bslad pas //
analyzed: ri dvags bus pa la sogs mthong // yang dag ma yin ltas bslad pas //
translated: Is seen by the young deer and so on.

original: de bzhin yul las byung ba'i sems //
analyzed: de bzhin yul las byung ba'i sems //
translated: The mind that arises from objects

original: khab long lta bur 'khor ba ste //
analyzed: khab long lta bur 'khor ba ste //
translated: Is like a magnet that attracts iron.

original: gang yang 'di la dngos med pa //
analyzed: gang yang 'di la dngos med pa //
translated: But there is nothing real here.

original: 'byung ba rnams dang 'byung ba yo //
analyzed: 'byung ba rnams dang 'byung ba yo //
translated: The elements and the elemental evolutes,

original: g-yo ba dro ba bsher sra bar //
analyzed: g-yo ba dro ba bsher sra bar //
translated: The moving, the hot, the wet, and the solid,

original: bus pa rnams ni rtag tu rtog /
analyzed: bus pa rnams ni rtag tu rtog /
translated: Are always imagined by the childish.

original: 'byung ba sems kyi tshogs las na //
analyzed: 'byung ba sems kyi tshogs las na //
translated: The elements arise from the mind’s continuum.
